review_text: Everything was great from how to check-in to checking in on us to making sure everything was good. Daniel made bread and it was delicious. The apartment was clean and stocked with some essentials. I recommend staying there and if we ever get back to Fairbanks we will definitely try and stay there again.

Staying at Dans place was perfect. He gave clear instructions and plenty of suggestions for activities. The fresh Rosemary sourdough loaf was delicious and. Wry thoughtful. We also got to try his sourdough pizza at Pioneer Park, highly recommend trying it. WE will I’ll definitely tell our friends to stay there! Can’t say enough about the quality of stay and great nights rest to rejuvenate us daily for long hours of touristing.

If I could give more than 5 stars I would…we thought this was a once in a lifetime trip… next time (lol) we’ll skip the resort/cruise part and spend a lot more time with this as our “home base”. Thank you for your hospitality !! And the bread is excellent!!
Great host, great person. Cannot speak highly enough of the service and quality. A bit out of town which we were looking for. Recommend to everyone. Thanks Daniel for the sourdough as well

Daniel's place was comfortable, clean and had great views off the back deck. The apartment was well stocked with everything you could need including groceries for our breakfast!! Daniel was an amazing host treating us to his freshly baked bread and sharing spot-on recommendations for things to do in Fairbanks. He definitely went above and beyond. We would definitely love to stay here again if we make it back to Fairbanks!

This was a terrific place to stay! Dan’s place was light and spacious and comfortable, thoughtfully appointed and generously supplied (and the bread was delicious ;) ! Dan was a very responsive host, not only answering questions but offering many local recommendations. I hope to stay here again on my next visit!

I was right at home in Daniel’s place and looking forward to next visit! Dan’s sourdough is the greatest I’ve enjoyed!
Sincerely,
Dr. C. Reese
April 2024
Alaska

Me and my new wife decided on a 12 day honeymoon to Alaska- she was responsible for planning the wedding; I planned the honeymoon. After looking through reviews and comparing prices I decided on Daniels Airbnb. We arrived around 1:30am exhausted from the flight- clear instructions to get in no hassle. Place was clean and looked exactly as shown, nothing super fancy, but all we needed while we were there. Dans place provided us a central location to tour Fairbanks, get to Chena Hot Springs for a days fun, travel to Denali park for a hike, and go for a flight tour in Talkeetna. Believe me we got the entire Alaska experience and never had to travel more than 3 1/2 hours from Fairbanks. We even got to see the Aurora from Chena Lakes- about a 35 minute drive! It was visible from Dans place too but the city lights from Fairbanks hinder the view in April- late in the Aurora season. Dan provided us 3 loaves of his homemade bread for free and was always very friendly!Would 100% stay here again!

Staying at Dan’s place was fantastically. The extra amenities were so thoughtful and appreciated. Dan was very helpful and friendly. A really great place to stay. I will definitely recommend it to anyone going to Fairbanks!!!!

Such an incredible time! Dan made us feel right at home and greeted us with a loaf of his personal sourdough bread (Absolutely Divine!). The bread was so good, I even bought a loaf to go. The view was spectacular giving us plenty of windows to try and view the aurora lights. We were able to get some beautiful pictures of the lights over Dans house and off the balcony. If you have ever dreamed of seeing the northern lights, Dan place is worth every penny. It was such peaceful getaway with a generous amount of amenities. Fairbanks was a blast and had a variety of options of things to do ranging from free to very affordable. I would highly recommend Dans place for an experience of a life time.
Lovely stay at Daniel’s. Wish we could have stayed longer!!!
Can’t recommend this place enough! It was literally the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. Well stocked, clean, great location with a gorgeous view, and wonderful hosts!

We loved everything about Sourdough Dan's place! The place was super spacious and cozy with great views of Fairbanks. The neighborhood was quiet and some awesome local trails to wander through. Access to downtown was super easy. I would 100% recommend this place and look forward to visiting again soon! Thanks Dan!!!

Daniel’s place is amazing and he is the consummate host: friendly, informative, and easy to communicate with. He sets the standard for Air BnB hosts. We were fortunate as well to be gifted with a loaf of his homemade sourdough bread. The place is beautiful, the location is peaceful, and the view is amazing. I can recommend his place without qualification, and we hope someday to return.

A perfect location if visiting Fairbanks & area! A wonderful host and exceptional apartment! We had a few nights viewing the Aurora from the deck in sub zero weather instead of driving and trying to keep warm in a car! Will definitely stay again!

The bed was comfortable, blankets soft, pillows fluffy, and the place was clean and cozy. My husband and I had a wonderful stay. The view was spectacular. The hosts are very thoughtful, and responsive. We definitely will be staying here again!
The place and the host are awesome !!!

Daniel was a great host! He provided tips and recommendations about Fairbanks. He’s been responsive and really helpful. The place is beautiful and peaceful, we loved the deck views. Daniel also let us try his handmade sourdough bread! 100% Recommended!

Dan was proactive in communication before and during stay. if you cone during the winter and need vehicle. highly recommend getting 4wd or awd...because of where Dan's place is at as we as getting to some activities. Eggs and fish baked bread upon arrival. Pancake mix stocked! Beautiful scenery off deck and from windows!!

Dan was a wonderful host! He ensured we were comfortable, had local recommendations, and was very responsive and timely if we needed anything. He also gives a loaf of his delicious bread to his guests. Highly recommend!

Daniel and Nisha are by far the best Airbnb hosts we've ever had!
Absolutely helpful and accommodating.. and his bread is dreamy!
The area where the house is is beautiful and we were able to watch the northern lights from the balcony in the evening!
We are already planning our next vacation with Daniel and Nisha.

Daniel and Nisha are great hosts. The apartment was spotless, comfortable with plenty of space for all our luggage and had everything we needed for our stay. Dan was always quick to answer any questions and had some great recommendations for local places to visit and fun stuff to do. We are looking forward to coming back and staying a little longer in the future.

My fiancée and I had the most amazing stay at Dan’s! Not only was the location and living space absolutely perfect, but Dan went above and beyond to make sure we felt at home. Dan gave us the best recommendations for around Fairbanks, as well as gifting us a loaf of his AMAZING sourdough bread. We truly are so thankful for his incredible hospitality and if we are ever in the area again, we will be certainly staying at this location.

We stayed for Christmas and definitely enjoyed our trip. Place was so clean, Daniel left for us oatmeal, eggs, coffee which helped us to not rush in the morning to find place to eat so we could eat home after late flight. Daniel was super responsive and helpful, he also left us fresh made bread and we loved it! Definitely recommend Daniel’s place and can’t wait to come back for summer!

Staying at Dan's place was incredible. He prepared everything so carefully. Dan's sourdough bread was our breakfast every day, and we loved it. The local places he recommended were also excellent. I especially enjoyed the little room inside the main bedroom. The view from the window was stunning. I hope to come back here again in the summertime.

We absolutely loved our stay at Dan’s place! He was incredibly helpful with local suggestions and was very responsive anytime we contacted him. We were lucky enough to try his fresh sourdough bread as well- it’s DELICIOUS! Location is close to town but far enough away that you feel like you’re tucked away, which was perfect for us.
Great place, super recommended, welcoming hosts.The view from

We've been fortunate to stay at some great places over some years of travelling and Sourdough Dan's is easily one of my favorites. The place has a home away from home sort of coziness. The views are gorgeous. And Daniel not only covered all the bases that make a great stay, he also provided invaluable local insight and a delicious loaf of bread (seriously good). Truly went above and beyond as a host. Thank you!!!

We had a great stay at Sourdough Dan's place, the place was easy to find, clean and had great windows to enjoy the views outside. Sourdough Dan left some eggs and Rosemary sourdough bread for us! The kitchen was well stocked up too with spices, oil, butter, coffee etc.
Highly recommend staying at Dan's place next time you are in Fairbanks!

Beautiful little apartment with large windows overlooking the valley. The beds were cozy and the aurora danced away for us! Dan gave us a warm loaf of sourdough bread, which was absolutely delicious! We had toast and eggs (that he also provided) every morning for breakfast. Very sweet space and thoughtful accommodations. Clean and Dan was a dream host! Book it!

Daniel's place was perfect for a stay in Fairbanks. Perfect for Aurora viewing, close to Downtown in car. The place was comfortable, like being at home. He contacted me before arriving to informed me there were groceries ready for breakfast and even brought his Delicious sourdough bread!!!
Definitely will try to visit again and recomend.
DANS PLACE WAS perfect right outside the city witch gives you serenity vibes I would love to come back...
Dan was an excellent host, made us feel at home. Have lots of places to see and eat. We got to try his fresh garlic sourdough bread. Amazing. We will definitely stay again when we travel to Alaska.

I loved my stay at Daniel's place. It was just as described and much more. Daniel is an awesome host in every way. Upon arrival I met and talked with him and instantly felt right at home. His local recommendations were spot on along with his incredible homemade garlic sourdough bread. The living space was large, clean, comfortable, beautiful, and very well supplied. The views from the deck were outstanding. If and when again in Fairbanks I'll be looking to stay at Sourdough Dan's!

Hands down the best AirBnB host we’ve ever had. Daniel is super friendly and willingly offers his take on the best things to see and do in Fairbanks. He is super responsive, and his sourdough is absolutely fantastic! Can’t recommend this place enough :)

I absolutely loved Dans place! Felt like home, fully studied, amazing views! Got great pics of the northern lights.
Dan is a great host, the sourdough bread was a definite plus 🥰

Daniel is a fantastic host. He reached out and welcomed us immediately. He offered information on the local area, things to do and places to eat. His place is spotless and very comfortable. He has thought of everything to make you feel right at home and then some. We had the opportunity to see the Aurora as a bonus. It doesn’t get any better than this. We will definitely stay with Daniel our next trip to Fairbanks.

We had a great stay at Dan’s place. Pantry was very well equipped with lots of extras. Location was peaceful but only a short drive to town. We even saw the northern lights from our balcony. Thanks for a great stay

We stayed at Daniel's place in the middle of a two week road trip through Alaska and it was perfect! Clean, very comfortable, and so relaxing. It is just outside of town so very relaxing and quiet, but still convenient. Daniel was very friendly and gave great local recommendations. Communication was clear and easy. The apartment was very well stocked and so comfortable. We saw the Northern lights on our last night there from the deck. Would definitely stay here again!

Dan's place is in a scenic, peaceful location, and is extremely well-stocked with various kitchen amenities. Smart TV with ability to log in to any app that we were interested in. If Dan leaves you a loaf of his freshly baked sourdough bread as he did for us, make sure that you try it.

Daniel is a great host, one of the best! And the apartment is perfectly convenient to Fairbanks while still feeling “away from it all.” We had a great stay and would recommend Sourdough Dan’s to anyone!

The house is a hidden gem in Fairbanks. A perfect spot to enjoy the sounds from nature. We loved the sky colors on sunset from the balcony. The house is comfortable to rest, cook and explore Fairbanks area. Dan was a perfect host with nice tips, a delicious home made bread and a well-stocked kitchen. Thank you, “king of breads”!

Loved this place! Daniel was there when we arrived and came out and spoke to us. Have us lots of recommendations and was very friendly. The loaf of garlic sourdough bread that he baked was most excellent as described! We used it for our sandwiches the rest of the trip. The view was great and the place was clean. We hope to visit in the winter sometime and this is where we will be staying!

I have visited Dan's Airbnb several times. I am always impressed with Dan's friendliness and his attention to details in preparation for my arrival. The scenery is outstanding and the location is excellent. The location is in the mountains; but, you are also within minutes of downtown Fairbanks and any items you might need. While I was there, I visited Chena Hot Springs, the Denali National Park, North Pole, Golden Heart Plaza, and many other noteworthy locations. I even saw 2 moose within 3 hours one day. You will be very glad that you chose Sourdough Dan's Airbnb for your visit to Fairbanks! I plan to return.

What an awesome place! The location is close to town but feels very remote. The view from the private porch is awesome and the house is immaculate.
We had the famous sourdough bread with bacon and eggs for breakfast. I have to add that it was the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in while traveling.
We would definitely stay again.
nice place and nice host super friendly
My family has a great stay at Sourdough Dan's! Everything was comfortable, the view was beautiful, and it felt like home. Would love to come back for another stay in the future.
Great place for the money. He is a baker and made us some fresh bread to go with the eggs he had ready in the room for us.

Top to bottom, our experience with Dan was absolutely amazing! if we could give him more than 5 stars, we would. From the beginning he made life easier for us. For instance, our flight arrived very late, but Dan had a fully stocked fridge waiting for us when we got to Fairbanks. He even texted us to welcome us to his place! The next morning, he met us as we were getting ready to leave for Denali. We had a great chat and he offered to make us a loaf of bread. While driving he reached out to Dan for evening dinner recommendations and questions about the solstice celebration. He texted a few ideas, but then called to share more recommendations. To say that Dan was superior is an understatement. He is truly fantastic. If you are ever in Fairbanks, you must stay with Dan.

The most outstanding place I have stayed in my Airbnb experiences. The space was very quiet spotless and plenty of space. Dan was proactive and took care of any needs. Truly a first class experience from a first class person. The Jalapeno Sourdough bread was delicious. If you are in Fairbanks or plan on visiting, and his place is available, it is a 100% must book. Don't look anywhere else or wait. You will not regret the experience.

Views off the porch and the rooms were great. Everything was super clean. Dan provided one of the best stocked kitchens ever in an airBNB. really appreciated the phenomenal sourdough bread. Very comfortable bed. If you are in Fairbanks this is the only place you should stay. Period.

Daniels listing was a great place for us to stay and explore the city. It is located in a quiet neighborhood. Super clean and comfortable. It’s on the second floor with stairs. Daniel greeted us in person and gave a loaf of sourdough bread, that he makes himself. I plan on coming back sometime in the future to see the northern lights. I hope to stay with Daniel again.
Wonderful place to stay. Plenty of food supplies and the place is clean and convenient. Very quiet, beautiful setting. His bread is the best!!

Dan was an excellent host. He was readily available for any needs we had while also being respectful of our privacy. He went out of his way to make sure we enjoyed our time and were comfortable. The space was spacious, clean and well stocked with everything you might need. Easy and quick to get to from the airport. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful place to relax on their Alaskan Adventures.

Daniel is a great host, he was super responsive and helpful. We loved our stay - it was very spacious, clean, and had great views. We felt right at home as soon as we arrived. The kitchen was well stocked, I especially enjoyed the variety of coffee pods for the Keurig. It is also an easy drive from Fairbanks. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone else who is traveling to Fairbanks!
Very clean and nice owners

Dan was so easy to have as our host! He left us a fresh loaf of bread that was delicious! The apartment was well stocked, clean and had very comfortable beds!! He gave us great suggestions for local things to do, and places to eat! We really enjoyed our time in Fairbanks!!

The apartment is super equipped and very clean. As we arrived late at the property on the day of arrival, we were very happy that Daniel had provided with a well-stocked fridge. We were also well supplied with coffee, tea and pancakes for breakfast, among other things. Daniel has been really very attentive, surprised us with his homemade bread, gave us tips for excursions in the area, and questions were always answered within a very short time. If we travel to Fairbanks again, we would book his place again.

I LOVED staying at Dan’s place. His apartment is beautifully furnished and has lots of windows. Dan included lots of staples in his kitchen that were really appreciated. —and the sourdough bread he makes was amazing. The bed was super comfortable and he had lots of different thicknesses of pillows which is always a plus. Nice hot shower.
Dan recommended a lot of places and things to do in Fairbanks including The Crepery. Awesome breakfast crepes and good coffee. He knows a lot about Alaska and even drove me over to see the Pipeline, something I hadn’t planned on doing but was very glad I did.
I got to see the aurora on Wednesday and Thursday night. Dan’s place is perfect for aurora sightings and it was something I’ll never forget.
Thanks for a great stay Dan. Hope I get to come back.
Dolores 4/10-4/17/23

We loved our stay with Sourdough Dan! It was pretty close to everything and remote enough to be peaceful and see the northern lights at the same time! Dan was a wonderful host - reaching out with checkin instructions the day of, stocking the fridge, and giving local recommendations!

Wow, what a platinum experience! Host was very responsive on all occassions!
How we were welcomed: A kitchen stocked with coffee, tea, oatmeal, eggs, and waffles- and Dan shared a loaf of his incredible homemade sourdough bread! So nice to be able to get settled in without immediately having to stock up.
Appreciated extras like handwarmers, a handy first aid kit, and tons of extra linens and blankets.
The bathroom was fully stocked with great shower supplies and plenty of towels.
Wonderful coming in several days on to our trip to have a W/D to catch up on laundry, and dry clothes for repacking.
The view from the balcony and windows was magnificent. Beautiful snow covered trees and mountains all the way to the horizon.
The property is about a 5 min drive from town, and located in a quiet neighborhood of hilltop homes. The roads were well maintained and easily navigable.
Got to see the Northern Lights the day we arrived!
By far, the best AirBNB experience ever.
Book here!

We had an amazing stay at sourdough dan‘s place. The location is perfect to get into Fairbanks quickly but not so close that it takes away from the wildlife. There are close by viewing spots for the Aurora and we were able to catch some pretty active shows multiple nights of our stay. Dan was always available for help and we cannot thank him enough for coming over when we had trouble with a frozen door. He was always a call away and willing to give suggestions on how to make the most of our stay. We cant wait to visit again!
We really enjoyed our stay! Daniel is a great host and his bread is delicious too. The place is very clean, cozy and has an epic view. We hope to come stay here again someday.

This place is fabulous!
The accommodation is very comfortable, clean and well stocked with everything you need, including warm, cozy beds and fresh breakfast Items. Dan’s own sourdough bread is delicious!
Spectacular views and perfectly positioned for Northern Lights viewing. Close to town to eat out but far enough away to get away from the ‘busy’ downtown feel.
Dan himself was absolutely ready and willing to go way above and beyond for us when we locked ourselves out in the freezing cold late night hours!

The place was cozy and convenient. The stocked kitchen including Dan's delicious bread saved us from having to spend money on breakfast. The location is close to town yet far enough away that we saw the Aurora from the balcony. All the views from the windows were amazing as well. It was nice having a bathroom and shower indoors. Coming from Texas, I know we couldn't have survived in -28 degree temps using an outhouse. The 2nd bedroom which connects to the main bedroom has a single bed with a trundle bed underneath. Would be a great room for kids. The bathroom was also stocked with toiletries. Overall well worth the memories we created. Thanks for sharing your place with us Dan!

What a fantastic stay! Dan is beyond accommodating and the apartment was great! Ideal place to stay during your adventure in Fairbanks. Highly recommend and would rebook in a heartbeat. We were able to see amazing northern lights from the comfort of a warm, cozy, and well equipped apartment…it was incredible!

We had a fabulous time at Sourdough Dan's during our stay in Fairbanks. He was extremely responsive to our questions, had great restaurant suggestions and his place was such a beautiful location for our first visit to the area. The view across the valley is good for your soul. His bread is amazing and we enjoyed several grilled cheese sandwiches during the week based on his suggestion. The kitchen is well stocked, better than most places we've stayed. We had 10 inches of snow the day before we left and he assured me he would help us get out, which he did. He plowed the street and cleared the walkway for us. Great service, great host, great vacation.

Sourdough dans apt was super quaint. Everything was really clean and organized, Dan himself was very nice and helpful. The windows all pointed to the sky making it really easy to see the northern lights. I absolutely loved my stay here.

We had a wonderful stay at Daniel's place! Daniel was super communicative and was very patient with all of our questions. He provided suggestions on things to do around and outside of Fairbanks. The kitchen was very well stocked with coffee, tea, breakfast items, and some staples, and the rosemary sourdough bread he made for us was absolutely amazing! The view was just spectacular....we really enjoyed it! Daniel's place was easy to find and in a great location. We highly recommend! Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Thank you Dan for all your hospitality. Your place is one of the best I’ve been to. Roomy, stocked well, beautiful views and very comfortable. The sourdough bread was delicious. If we’re ever in Fairbanks again, we’ll definitely stay with you.
very well appointed. would love to come back. five stars all around!!
The space was absolutely great. Daniel was an excellent host and I appreciated the bread. I will definitely be looking to stay the next time I come to Fairbanks.

The house is beautiful and clean. It’s also a quiet neighborhood that we saw the aurora lights easily on the balcony of the house! The owner of the house is super nice and gave us lots of pieces of advice and we had a wonderful time staying right there. This place has everything that helps a visitor to enjoy the trip in Fairbanks, I highly recommend this place.

Daniel was super responsive and willing to help with anything we needed. We enjoyed the privacy of the apartment with the comfort of knowing we weren't totally alone if we needed anything. The bread was phenomenal, the views were amazing, and the apartment was clean and very thoughtfully stocked. Cannot recommend it enough!

We had a great stay, even with a little plumbing issue at first Daniel and Nisha were incredibly accommodating. Great recommendations on what to do around town and all the restaurants we tried on his word were amazing! Can’t recommend this place enough!
Dan was easy and friendly and made us feel at home. He was there when we needed him and helped with local suggestions...and a loaf of his home made bread.

Daniel’s place was an incredible value for all the amenities available to us as well as the location. We were super comfortable staying here and felt like everything we could need and more was provided. The homemade bread he gave to us was delicious and truly the icing on top of a great stay! What really stood out was Dan’s amazing responsiveness to our questions- with all his recommendations we felt very taken into consideration which helped make our trip in Fairbanks run smoothly. Could not say enough good things about this bnb and host!

We had a lovely experience at Daniel’s place. Centrally located, close to airport. Beautiful surroundings. Fully equipped kitchen. Daniel was so nice, he even provided us bread, eggs, water, etc. also a Sled for the kids to play. We’ll definitely want to stay there again when we go back to Fairbanks.

We enjoyed everything here. We arrived on thanksgiving and the host left a holiday cuisine for us. We were also lucky to get his sourdough - tastes good! The property is well placed - on a hill, second floor, city view with little light pollution. When the clouds cleared, we saw magnificent arora from living room, balcony, and in bed. This is definitely a good place to stay, well worth the price.
Excellent view. Clean house with comprehensive supplies. Dan is extremely nice and communicative. His bread is soooooo delicious
Dan is a literal angel. He made our stay one to remember by going above & beyond for us. I will only ever book with him when in Alaska.

Great place to stay the night...or the week, on this amazing spot. close to the city but far enough to let you see the sky without many surrounding artificial lights. Daniel is a great host, very responsive to any of your questions or concerns, friendly and awesome baker, try his sourdough bread!

Daniel’s apartment in Fairbanks was the perfect cozy getaway that we needed on our trip to Alaska during the freezing cold! The apartment is a perfect fit for three people, with all the amenities in great condition. The kitchen was fully stocked- everything we could possibly need was thought of- and we were even left a loaf of the famous Dan’s sourdough, which was excellent!
The apartment is about 12 minutes from downtown, making it convenient to access the city, yet away from the bustle.
It was amazing! Daniel was a super host for sure!

I cannot say enough about my amazing stay at Daniel’s place!!!
My husband and I work on the North Slope of AK and traveled to Fairbanks for some much needed R&R. Upon arrival , we were met with delicious fresh sourdough bread made by the host! The bed was so comfortable, the place was clean, and our stay was so lovely!
Daniel gave amazing recommendations for things to do and places to eat around Fairbanks.
His kindness was above and beyond.
We’d happily return and stay any time we’re in the area.

Dan's apartment is perfect for viewing the Northern Lights. There is a full wall of northwest facing windows, so you can turn out all the lights, and just watch for the Aurora Borealis.
The apartment is exactly as described. It is VERY well stocked with everything you need to cook. And, if you are smart enough to arrive on a Sunday or a Thursday, Dan will give you a loaf of fresh baked sourdough bread. If you are from Alaska, then you are likely already familiar with Sourdough Dan's bread. They are sold in the Carr's around Alaska.
The one thing that you should know is there are 15 steps up to the apartment, but if you get past this fact, then you will have the best view of the Alaska sky.
You are going to love this place!

Dans place is absolutely amazing. We will never stay any other place. If you are looking for a clean, comfortable place to stay this is it. I have never met someone more accommodating and considerate.
Dan is an amazing host, he gave great suggestions. This place was great and I would stay again.

Daniel’s place was amazing. It’s on the first floor, is super clean and is a perfect place to stay if your main goal for visiting Fairbanks is to view the northern lights. We were able to see the lights all 3 nights we stayed there (from the balcony as well as from the bedroom window)!
The place looks exactly like the pictures and Dan gave us a few recommendations for restaurants and places to go which were great! Dan’s sourdough bread was also awesome! I would highly recommend this apartment!

This is a great place. It was very well-equipped. Good attention to detail and user experience were evident in a number of thoughtful touches, including well-placed instructions for nonobvious features and useful safety features and signage. The covered deck had a great view and was even clean enough to go out on without shoes. The host Daniel was very friendly.
Daniel was fantastic! His place was so cozy and the view was amazing. I had to leave early due to a family emergency but I will definitely be coming back and staying at Daniel’s place!

Daniel was a great host. We asked him for suggestions on things to do and places to eat. His recomondations were for places we never would have known about unless we were local. The place we stayed was not only beutiful but safe. The apt is on the second floor which makes the views breath taking. Sourdooug Dans place is a place I would definatly stay at again if I have the chance to visit Fairbanks in the future. Close to everything. Best location we could have picked. Thank you!
Was an absolute great stay! Quiet, peaceful and away from the city, you can really get a good Alaskan feel!

Daniel & Nisha were super hosts. From the awesome country setting with a view to the breakfast items in the kitchen so we didn't have to buy breakfast. His sourdough bread was awesome. Easy check in, called me the day before and he gave excellent restaurant choices. This was my first Airbnb rental & he set the bar really high for others to follow.

We highly recommend Sourdough Dan's apartment! It was comfortable and fully stocked with everything needed for our stay. He even has breakfast food and graciously offered us a loaf of his homemade sourdough bread. It was delicious! Daniel was great at communicating with us and offering suggestions on where to go in Fairbanks. We would definitely return on a future trip to Fairbanks.

Best Airbnb I stayed in on my 3-week Alaskan trip. Clean, well-stocked kitchen, washer/dryer. Dan was very courteous and responsive. Location is 10 mins from downtown Fairbanks. We saw the northern lights from the porch. Highly recommended.

Daniel’s place met our expectations in all fields. Comfort, amenities, furnishings, wifi, location, great communication and all for the great price! Fridge was stocked with eggs, fresh bread and great choices of coffee.., on top of varieties of hot teas and oatmeal! Such a cool touch. Highly recommend to anybody planning their trip to Fairbanks. Truly, nothing to complain about!

This is a great location as a base of operations or just a place to relax and take in the views. The host was ready and willing to take care of any needs that came up. Also, the host was proactive in reaching out to make sure we were set. I have been to many AirBnBs and have not met a more engaged host. I will be back.
Great place to relax after long days exploring Alaska during the summer. The place has everything anyone could need and the view is great. Lots of cranes flying over the whole week
10/10 would stay here again in a heartbeat. Absolutely beautiful space with a great host! Clean, safe, comfortable, and a great view… everything you could ask for. Thanks for the tea Dan!
Dan is a gracious and most generous host. Enjoy his hospitality and your expectations will be exceeded!

Daniel not only has a beautiful Airbnb overlooking the Chena River area, but, he also provides the best fresh-baked sourdough bread. Dan is very courteous and friendly and you immediately feel welcome. You could not ask for a better place to stay; the Airbnb is in a wonderful location in the mountains and is also close to Fairbanks. Surprisingly, you do not have to travel far to find food, fuel, and other necessities.

Dan is a fabulous host. His place is everything he says it is. If he offers you sourdough bread take it its fantastic. He has a lot of info in the place for you and is willing to give you recommendations for attractions and dining. If you need a place to stay in Fairbanks i highly recommend Sourdough Dans Air B&B. Will look to stay there again when traveling back to Fairbanks,.

I highly recommend this place for your stay in Fairbanks. Dan communicated with me several times before the check in date and gave clear instructions on how to get access to the place. My friend and I stayed 3 nights, would’ve preferred longer but this place gets booked out pretty quickly. Good sized modern kitchen and well equipped with sauces, spices, eggs, waffles, tea, coffee, etc. Large laundry appliances, handy if you need to do a load. As I’m a tea drinker, I was thrilled to see a kettle (most places don’t offer this). Stunning view, I can imagine what it would be like during winter, especially with the northern lights. Loved the garlic sourdough bread, personally made by Dan (thickness of bread was perfect too!) Super nice guy, very approachable. We were sad to leave this lovely place.
Entire apartment outfitted with everything you would need for a short or long stay. Quiet area but not too far from fairbanks for day trips.
Very enjoyable place, nice view of the valley. Very clean, put-together, and comfortable. Would definitely recommend!
We liked the place a lot. No problems at all, and Dan is a great informative host. Enjoy this listing and Dan's sourdough bread!
Comfortable and clean place to hang out in or rest between adventures. Pretty and roomy. His garlic sourdough was delicious. Great communication and easy check in.

Loved everything about Dan's place! It was perfect for our stay (the kids want to move in now lol)
Dan is an amazing host, very easy to communicate with, and went above and beyond to make sure our stay was perfect.

We really enjoyed our 2 night stay here. It was such a well stocked place- above and beyond our expectations. The beds were very comfortable. You couldn’t beat the location or the view for our Fairbanks stay. Daniel was an amazing communicator. We would definitely stay here again.

Dan was such a great host! He was super communicative and went out of his way to share locations and restaurants. We had almost an hour long conversation to give us ideas on what to do based on our interests. The fridge was stocked with the basics which was amazing and he shared some of his baked sourdough bread which is super delicious— hoping it doesn’t get squished on the way back to Chicago. Not enough words to describe the great experience. Beautiful location and beautiful views. Definitely booking with Dan again if we’re in the area again. 🙂

Great location to see Aurora, close enough to airport and grocery stores, and remote enough to not get city light influence. Dan also provided supplies like egg, waffle, cereal etc. it is a great value for place like this!

Dan’s place was perfect. It was cozy yet had all the necessities of everyday life. There was small touches that other airbnbs we have been to didn’t. He was a great host with recommendations of where to go and what to see. The porch is perfect for aurora sightings and the windows work to if you don’t want to be in the cold. We truly enjoyed our stay here. We seen the northern lights twice in our 3 night stay. Dan also made us hot and fresh garlic sourdough bread which we had made into grilled cheese and a side for spaghetti. So good! Thanks for everything Dan!

Dan's place was incredible! It was super clean and comfortable, and he included nice finishing touches like eggs in the fridge & kitchen essentials for cooking. Communication was easy/clear and he provided excellent recommendations for food & things to do around Fairbanks. Will definitely stay here again!

Dan was the best Airbnb host. He checked in throughout our stay in Fairbanks to make sure we had everything we needed and to provide recommendations. He also provided food for breakfast and some of his amazing sourdough. We came to Fairbanks primarily to see the lights, and being able to see them right from Dan's deck without having to drive somewhere in the early morning was ideal. We will definitely stay with Dan again next time we're in Fairbanks.

Dan's place was super nice. We were there for 2 nights and enjoyed every moment of it. He left a sourdough bread, lots of eggs and other food for us. He even left a snow sled for my kids to slide in the snow. We really thank him for all that. Specially my kids wanted to stay longer. Initially I thought that place was really remote. But in reality, it's no where near what I was imagining before getting to his place. We felt like home in his house. As a person as well, Dan is super great. If I ever in the Fairbanks are, I will try to stay at his place again if it's available.
Great place!
Daniel goes out of way to treat us to his best and he made special garlic sourdough bread that was amazing

If you plan on visiting Fairbanks and surrounding areas, this Airbnb is the one to get! Dan is amazing and truly wants his guests to have the best experience possible. If I could give Dan and his apartment 10 stars I would! My husband and I really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is spacious for 2 people, lots of room for luggage. Dan really made sure that we had everything we needed and recommended the greatest places to eat the week we were in Fairbanks. He keeps his apartment very clean and we were extremely comfortable. Honestly, it was hard to leave. The view from his private deck was beautiful. It snowed quite a bit during our stay but Dan kept the driveway plowed for us and even provided a sled so we could have some fun! Thank you again for the delicious homemade bread. Will 100% be booking with Dan again when we come back to Alaska.

Wow, wow, wow. I don't know what else to say other than that. Dan and his place were both amazing during our five day stay here over Valentine's Day. We lucked out and got to see the Northern Lights from the balcony our first night there. Everything about the place was excellent: the location, remoteness, cleanliness, and ease of access. Dan was super communicative and easy to talk to as well. The one time we mentioned some trouble getting out of the driveway, he took some time off his day off to come and plow for us. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again and can't recommend the place highly enough.

Amazing host, great communication. Made for a memorable stay. And the bread was amazing too!
The unit was well equipped with everything you could need while staying. Daniel was very responsive, had great suggestions to help us with the stay.
Thanks for everything again Dan,
My dad and I really appreciated it!

Five stars are not enough for the experience you will get staying with Dan. This is by far the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in. From the location to the accommodations to all of the small touches that he adds. Hands-down the best sourdough bread I have ever had. He is so thoughtful and what he provides. I could go on forever. You can see the lights from his living room. All of the recommendations that he gives for places to go and eat are top notch!!! If you have a car and want a spectacular place to see the lights go to Chena Lake recreation area, you won’t be disappointed!

Dan’s place was absolutely perfect. It was well stocked, very clean, comfortable, and has everything you need to feel like a mini “home away from home”. It had a beautiful view and dan himself was extremely kind, thoughtful, and made our stay feel warm and comfortable. Highly suggest staying here!!
This Airbnb is INCREDIBLE. Everything you can think of and more to stay during an Alaskan winter. Can’t recommend this place enough!
Daniels place was just what we were looking for. Clean, quiet, private, and the perfect spot for aurora watching! He also offered us some yummy homemade bread. We would stay here again.

Daniel was a truly dedicated host!
We came in on the heels of what was described as ice "icemageddon" by local media as over an inch of freezing rain covered the region followed by feet of snow, creating the snowiest December on record for Fairbanks. Daniel plowed the road to the house and parking spaces himself, presumably taking many hours of his own time to ensure we could make it in our first night. To provide a comparison for Daniel's efforts, we were not able to pick up our rental car for two days after our initial arrival because they needed the time to retrieve the buried vehicles (it was a lot of snow).
In sum, the accommodations were cozy, comfortable, and had a great view of the valley (and northern lights). When snow shut down much of the city of Fairbanks, Daniel made sure we still could make the trip and achieve our dream of seeing the aurora, and for that we are very grateful :).

Dan is hands down the best Airbnb host I and my wife have ever encountered.
This Airbnb has a lot of amenities and is very cozy and clean. The location has very little light pollution - making it a good spot to view the Aurora Borealis.
We recommend booking with him to anyone considering a trip to Fairbanks!

Daniel’s place is quiet, clean, cozy, and conveniently located. He has everything we need and went above and beyond to make sure we have everything we need. We would recommend stay at his place for everything visiting Fairbanks.
Great host, gave local recommendations, apartment was stocked. Great all around.

If I could give more stars I would!! Not only is the location PERFECT, but Dan was so hospitable and nice. It’s a perfect setting for an amazing Alaskan experience. Far enough from the city to see the lights and some amazing scenery but close to everything as well. Dans recommended places to eat were perfect! The Crepery and Pump House are musts. Dan left us some fresh groceries which was beyond expectations and his homemade bread is the BEST! The view is impeccable and seems almost like a fantasy. Thanks again for the amazing experience!

Dan deserves all of the stellar reviews, you can’t get much better than his place.
It’s clean, comfortable, cosy and well appointed with amenities that go beyond the typical Airbnb.
Seeing the northern lights from the comfort of his living room was also a bonus!

Daniel is an amazing host! The place was very clean and was exactly as described. Daniel also provided some breakfast items, which was an added bonus. He suggested some great food places nearby. He checked in with us if we needed anything. We also got a freshly backed bread made by Dan! A great place to stay if you’re in Fairbanks!

Do yourself a favor and stay here!! Best spot in Alaska. The upstairs apt was spacious and provided us everything we needed (and then some). Dan is an amazing host and helped us out when we were stuck in the snow. Also, the bread he gave us was delicious!! He helped made our trip so special and memorable. We will definitely be back!

Upon arriving to Dan’s home, it is immediately noticeable that he truly enjoys hosting. Dan provides an above average amount of amenities, food, and supplies which greatly enhance the comfort of your stay. Dan’s home has everything one needs and more! The location is great and easy to find. Lucky guests will arrive to find some of his delicious home baked Sourdough bread and/or other baked goods. If you had any hesitation whether to stay here or not, let those worries go and book immediately! Thanks again for everything Dan. -Alex

I can't say enough GREAT things about our experience here! Daniel made sure everything was as easy and straight forward as possible. The place is well-insulated, so warmth was never an issue. The deck was incredibly helpful to constantly check for aurora visibility, and there were way more amenities than I expected! Daniel was awesome and I HIGHLY recommend picking up some of his sourdough bread at the Roaming Root down the road. He gave us a lot of very helpful information and was flexible with the somewhat disheveled nature of people who have never been to Alaska before! The two rooms are arranged attached in a shotgun style. The apartment was very clean and I have no complaints! I appreciate everything, Daniel!

This is a great place with a great view across the valley. Daniel keeps it clean and stocked with a small amount of food, tea, and coffee. This made it great for our first night/morning before we grabbed groceries to cook with. There are plenty of pans and cooking utensils available to cook in or you can ask Daniel for some local places to eat out. In addition to sharing some restaurant suggestions, he gave some suggestions for sights to see and places to visit. If he offers to give you a loaf of his sourdough bread or some of his pizza crusts, be sure to take him up on it; they are amazing!

It’s really a lovely place to stay. The kitchen has everything if you need to cook. I love the big windows in living room and bedroom. It’s amazing to see the sunrise if you wake up in the early morning.
Beautiful views and amazing host, very friendly and communicative. All the amenities from home and perfect for seeing the northern lights! Close to the airport. Can't wait to return!
Very nice place to stay. All of the amenities you need to feel at home.
just for enough out of town for a great view and a peaceful stay. clean and comfortable! very homey. Dan is a great host and very informative

My wife and I had a wonderful time at Sourdough Dan's place! The space was perfect for us, check-in was easy, the location and views are spectacular, the host is very accommodating and helpful, and his sourdough bread is excellent! I would definitely stay here again in the future - thanks Dan!

Dan’s place was amazing! If you’re looking for a great view of the northern lights look no further. The apartment was really cozy and had everything you needed for a great stay! Dan was also a pleasure, makes some of the best sourdough bread I’ve ever had. I cannot recommend this place enough! Thank you!

This is a perfect place to stay in Fairbanks! The first priority for me is that it is clean and well maintained. Dan’s place is super nice. It is very clean and very comfortable. The bed was comfy, best night sleep during our Alaska stay! Nice pillows, bedding, towels, a full kitchen, bath, comfy living room, smart TV…. Very nice everything! Many helpful amenities as well. If you are looking for a great place — Sourdough Dan’s is the place. It really is the perfect place for 2-3 people. Thank you for sharing your place. We loved it!

We really enjoyed our stay at Sourdough Dans. The apt was nice and clean and supplied with extras such as eggs, oatmeal, waffles, coffee, and tea which made it easy to have breakfast every morning. There is nice balcony with view of anchorage and great place to see northern lights if they are out. Daniel was great host and super helpful with tips of things to do and places to eat. He even left us fresh batch of bread. Definitely one of the best host we stayed with - we highly recommend. For things to do in Fairbanks - we would recommend Riverboat Cruise, Gold Dredge 9 tour, and visiting various breweries. We were also lucky and got to see amazing display of northern lights at Murphy’s dome one night (check explore Fairbanks for conditions).

Sourdough Dan’s apartment was fabulous. The space was well laid out and the bed was super comfy. The kitchen was well appointed and useful for all our cooking needs. Dan was easy to communicate with and always quick to respond. Plus his bread was so delicious. Everything we wanted to see in Fairbanks was easy to get to from this location. Dan made everything easy for us.
What an amazing place. Had everything we needed and then some. Loved his homemade bread. Would definitely recommend!

Sourdough Dan's is perfect! The big windows overlook such a beautiful view, we often found ourselves staring out looking for wildlife. The accomodations are clean and so comfortable. The washer and dryer are such a nice touch. Dan's suggestions for activities and food were all spot on.
In short, just book it. You won't regret it!
Nice place with everything you need.

I can’t say enough good things about this stay! Immaculately clean, organized and well stocked. Take all Dan’s suggestion on activities and where to it! and when offered bread don’t hesitate to say yes. It’s delicious!
We loved Chena Hot Springs!
If we’re ever back in Fairbanks it will be at Dan’s! ♥️

Your place was wonderful and so were you. Thank you for meeting us at the Crepery to give us ideas about what to see on our trip. You thought of everything at the house. Your attention to details was amazing and the place was super clean. The location was also very handy for getting into Fairbanks quickly. We enjoyed toasting the bread you provided and appreciated the eggs, too. I hope I can come back to Fairbanks and stay in your place again.

Daniel’s place is FANTASTIC. Look no further than this listing. Incredible value. Clean, very well maintained appliances and furniture (appliances appear brand new). Abundant bedding/pillows. Well appointed with lots of extras (food items, laundry needs, shower supplies). Daniel is welcoming and takes a genuine interest in his guests. Communication is quick and thorough. If you are lucky, you’ll catch him in his bakery (on the property) and maybe you’ll get to enjoy his homemade sourdough bread - thank you, Dan!
** We saw a moose at the corner of the street!!

You can expect the following:
a courteous host who is willing to help you and answer questions
a clean and excellent layout of the living space for a quiet stay
a well-stocked pantry and laundry area
a bathroom with a tub/shower
a very clean environment

Great stay at Sourdough Dan’s
He was very helpful with tips for our stay in Fairbanks
Great stay! Host is a 10/10. Would recommend anyone to stay here. Dan was friendly and extremely attentive to our needs. Loved it!

Although we didn't get to meet Dan in person, he was easy to get ahold of and very accommodating. He obviously loves hosting, so he has everything you can think of including tourist brochures.
The apartment was clean, spacious, and well taken care of. We really appreciated having some foods available to us the first morning we arrived as it was late and we didn't have time to grocery shop. The simplicity of having eggs and oatmeal was perfect. We appreciated the blackout curtains during the summer months.
Next time we'll come back in the winter, as I'm sure the Aurora vies are spectacular.
Dan is a gracious host, very comfortable lodging, couldn't be more pleased we chose to stay here.

Daniel's place is very comfortable and super clean! We couldn't see the northern lights because we came in May, but I'm sure that this is the best location ever to see them during winter! The plus was definetely his bread..i think that we never had a bread as good as his before, and we never finished one so fast as we did it there. Thank you Dan!!!

Stayed here 2 nights on a 18 day car tour of AK. Dan is a super friendly host, with great communication and making sure all is fine throughout our time there. Nice hillside views east from the apartment. Wish all my AirBNB experiences were this nice. Dan runs a small bakery and his fresh sourdough bread is yummy.

Great space, slightly out of town, this cozy upper floor private room, has a nice view from the porch, a cozy atmosphere inside, and plenty of amenities provided by super host DAN! Loved it, and would definitley stay again!
Very clean accommodation and Daniel is a fantastic person and super host.

Me and my family had SUCH a great trip. Dan was a PERFECT host, with plenty of extremely thoughtful touches throughout our whole trip that were so appreciated, and the location of the space was perfect for our trip. Thank you again for hosting us

What a GEM!!! First off, I will just like to say that Daniel, who is the host is such an absolutely amazing person. He is very attentive, full of advice and always available to help. His apartment has that special touch of home with all the extra amenities and love to make you feel warm and welcomed. SPOILIER ALERT!! Daniel bakes the most amazing sourdough bread! 😍.... One of the many extras that come with the stay. Daniel offers a very clean place to stay with extra towels and toiletries. Both of the sleeping areas are very comfortable and has extra blankets and sheets if needed. Daniel has an amazing balcony with absolutely amazing views. If you're lucky you'll be able to see the lights just from his balcony. Daniels place made my Alaskan trip truly an absolute experience. Thank you so much.🙂
Great value, nice neighborhood, so many thoughtful extras, very clean. 5 stars!!

Dan's place has a great view in a quiet neigborhood. He is a great communicator and his place was very well stocked. Great wifi as well! Dan gave us some tips on places to go and eat. He also left us a loaf of bread which was incredible! Made us feel safe and welcomed.

This Airbnb had everything I needed and more. Wonderful amenities, clean and a great location. I was able to watch the northern lights pass over the apartment on the last night. Daniel was so warm and friendly and I felt very safe here. I would absolutely stay here again in the future.
Very attractive, comfortable abode! -- large windows with scenic views, quiet, clean, very complete kitchen with some breakfast foods, comfortable bed. I enjoyed my stay very much!

Daniels place is amazing. The cleanliness and location are superb. His hospitality made our trip so much more wonderful. The bread he bakes is amazing. We were able to see the Aurora perfect from his back deck. He gave us wonderful tips on what to do and see. I HIGHLY recommend booking his place. I will never stay anywhere else as long as I’m in Fairbanks.

What an absolute gem of a place! Close enough to drive into city, but tucked away enough making it absolutely perfect for viewing Aurora! Breathtaking scenery, & Dan was an amazing host! Had everything you needed to have the comfort of being at home while on vacation, plus many great extras (oatmeal, coffee, eggs, kitchen/bathroom supplies, ect).
Dan gave the best recommendations from local activities to check out, best places to eat (the crepes place is a must), wonderful hikes, everything! Was very quick & helpful answering all my questions; plus went above & beyond in being an extremely hospitable host!
If get a chance to stay at Dan's, would HIGHLY recommend it!

We stayed with Dan for 3 nights and love his place. Not only the special view of the city, but also Dan’s hospitality made us feel we were at home. The room was very clean and everything was fully prepared before we arrived. Had a great chat with Dan on the first day of arrival and the local travel tips he shared with us made our trip much easier! Also, every question was answered quickly even it’s late night and we are so grateful to try his home-made garlic sourdough bread, which tastes so good.
We were lucky to stay with Dan in Fairbanks and will definitely come back in the future!
Dan and his place are amazing. We have stayed in several AirBnB’s and by far this was the best experience. We will recommend to anyone coming to Fairbanks. Thank you Dan for thinking of everything.

ABSOLUTELY the best Air Bnb out there! We definitely felt at home and will be recommending this location to everyone! All of Dan’s attention to detail and wonderful suggestions made our trip the perfect. The accommodations are hands down above and beyond what we expected. The views from the balcony were so spectacular my boyfriend chose it to propose there, we will never forget our AMAZING stay Dan’s! Don’t look any further and book it! Make sure to wake up and watch the sunrise from the balcony, it is truly magical!
Dan was such a great host. We took all his local tips and enjoyed every single one!

Best experience! Everything about staying at Dan’s Airbnb was amazing. To start, Dan was incredibly hospitable and kind. We mainly wanted to see the northern lights, and if that is what you also want, this is an amazing place to stay! The location was perfect to view them right out the window. The place is also close to restaurants and stores, while still being quiet.
I can’t say enough good things about this Airbnb and would definitely go back!

If you want to stay in a beautiful, well-stocked Airbnb, you could find none better. The lodging is always well-stocked and very clean.
