Excellent location, so amazing that you can see the northern lights from the deck. Quick responses and great local tips, would definitely stay here again!
Great viewing of the Aurora, private cabin feel, well stocked, safe and comfortable. Dan is a great host.

Daniels house is one of the best place ever. Perfect location, excellent accommodations and facilites, its very near the airport, excellent view and the most important thing YOU CAN SEE THE AURORA FROM THE BALCONY!

5 stars isn’t enough for this AirBNB!! It was everything I expected and much much more. First, the location is spectacular. I loved my views from the porch. I even got to see the Aurora some! He was so kind on giving me tips for local places and I appreciated that so much. Dan made my experience in Fairbanks better than I could have imagined.

Dan was an incredible host. From his quick responses to his homemade loaf of bread that he left for us on the day we arrived, we couldn’t have asked for better. His helpful tips saved us and he was so kind. 100% recommend and cannot wait to go back

We really enjoyed our time staying at Daniel’s place. The place had anything we could have wanted breakfast, coffee, and teas. Daniel was gracious enough to share some of his rosemary sourdough, pizza crusts, and hummus with us. His family is just all around awesome. We really enjoyed spending a little time with them on New Years Eve for fireworks. We definitely hope to stay with him again.

Had a high expectations after reading all the reviews and boy it lived up to it! Dan was very responsive to any questions we had and offered great suggestions. The space is clean and have everything we need and more. Will definitely stay here again if I ever travel back to Fairbanks. Btw, spotted Christmas moose wandering at the back of the house was a plus!
Want a place to stay that is away from town but not to far? This is the place. Nice and peaceful. Just what we wanted. Thanks

Daniel was an amazing host and exceeded all of my expectations. He was very friendly, approachable, and offered quality hospitality. I can't wait to come back to Fairbanks to stay at Daniel's place again!

Daniel’s place was “perfect”. I came for the snow and northern lights. Dan had great amenities in the kitchen with some stocked food options. There is a Smart TV to watch movies at night. The apartment kept warm in spite of the below zero tempts. Dan offered us his jalapeño sourdough bread and it was amazing! He also had lots of tips of places to visit and eat. The lifesaver was the hand warmers on hand since I somehow didn’t pack mine! I would definitely stay here again if I came back to Fairbanks!
Very hospitable and would definitely use again.

Great location’ great coffee, great tea plus Dan bakes the most amazing bread 🥖!!!
The place is definitely Super private and sooo quiet.

When we visit Fairbanks again, we can only think of staying at Dan's. I have never met a host as wonderful, kind and hospitable as Dan. There is everything in the apartment you could need during your stay. Dan will help you with anything you might need whether it is suggestions on places to go or restaurants to visit. The location is perfect and the apartment is very cozy. The view from the living area, patio and rooms is amazing. You have a full view of the valley. Dan was so kind to offer us his delicious sourdough and humus. If you are visiting Fairbanks, I highly suggest you to stay at Dan's, because you will feel right at home. Myself and my family can't wait to come back. Also, Fairbanks is so so beautiful!

Sourdough Dans is the place to be! The location is great. Not right in the middle of everything so it's peaceful with a beautiful view, and its not far from the action. The place is super clean with that home feel to it. Dan is a wonderful host and makes sure that you have everything you need. He goes above and beyond for his guest. He's also very informative of local things you can do and should try. If you get a chance you have to try the smoked paprika hummus he makes....its to die for!
Dan is an amazing host. He goes above and beyond to assist with everything. You will not be disappointed!
This was a great stay at Dan’s. View was awesome and super clean! Thanks for all the sight seeing tips!

Dan's place is by far my favorite place I have stayed. The house was the perfect size for us, cozy without ever feeling cramped. Every morning, the smell of fresh sourdough fills the house from the bakery downstairs. The view is unbeatable and we were even able to catch the Northern Lights on one of the clear nights. In all, a perfect Alaskan getaway. :)

This place was great. If I could give Dan six stars I would. The views are amazing. The location is close to everything - 10 to 15 minutes away. Peaceful & quiet. The house was supplied with all kinds of goodies. Loved it here and will be definitely coming back again!!! We could not have asked for a better host!!! Dan is great!!!
Wonderful hospitality, comfy beds, a beautiful deck and a really well stocked kitchen! We were really thankful for all of the kitchen stuff, spices, olive oil etc since planned to cook our own food.

Dan’s place is absolutely wonderful. And when he says spectacular views, he means it. The full kitchen was stocked with everything we needed, so we ended up making most meals in the apartment and just enjoying the Alaskan beauty. I highly recommend!

If you’re trying to decide where to stay in Fairbanks, don’t look any further. Dan is amazing. Thoughtful, accommodating, and makes delicious bread! The place was sparkling clean and had more amenities than most air bnbs. Can’t wait to come back!

Dan’s place is a true amazing find!!! The home is cozy, very clean, and has everything you need to feel like you are at home. The views from the porch are incredible. We were even able to see the northern lights. He leaves nothing undone. And his bread, is the best we have ever had!!
Incredible hospitality and great for our stay in Fairbanks. You can see the Northern Lights from the house and Dan even let us know when it was out!

This was by far my favorite place to stay at since visiting alaska.
Daniel was super helpful with directions and recommended some great places to see. 10/10 would recommend staying here!!

Dan’s place was nothing short of amazing! It was very clean and in a nice quiet area, where we were able to catch the northern lights on our first night from the deck. He had everything you could need for a comfortable stay (coffees, teas, waffles, oatmeals, card games, poker set, extra towels, sheets, etc.) and was very helpful and easily accessible for advice and tips. Only thing I can say is I wish we stayed a bit longer.

Breath taking Home!
One of the best views I ever seen, extremely clean and cozy home so many amenities, everything you need to cook a lovely meal in a vacation.
Definitely recommend and coming back.
Great stay in a beautiful, cozy home!
An unbelievable view. You must stay here if you are in Fairbanks.
Great house with great views. House had all the essentials, was very clean and well kept. Easy check-in and check out instructions.

This place was amazing! Would highly recommend!! Plenty of room and activities within the home, and kitchen had more than you could ever need. We had the beautiful scenery of snow and the sauna and heaters in the room were perfect to keep everyone warm. Recommend restaurants from the host were a hit with my family :)
The house is great. The view was outstanding. The heated floors felt great on cold mornings. Perfect out of the way spot for an Alaska adventure.
Amazing place in a beautiful location. My family and I loved it.
It was so beautiful and peaceful! Loved the large windows! We enjoyed the sauna and the view from there also! Very family friendly.

The Aurora house was amazing! The view is stunning and it held true to its name. We finally caught a clear night and got to see the northern lights! We loved everything about our stay and didn’t want to leave. Misti had clear instructions every step of the way and has clearly thought of everything.

Misti was extremely responsive and attentive with any questions we had. The location is private and peaceful. On the right night you can see the aurora's from the back porch. The kitchen was fully stocked that enabled us to have meals every day for all 7 adults in the house. The sauna was a wonderful addition and added to the relaxation.
As an avid hiker and outdoors person I found many local trails to hike and even went to Moose Mountain to ski (only 35 minutes away). Also took day trips to Chena Hotsprings and downtown Fairbanks.

Thank you for a comfortable, clean stay with gorgeous views. The kitchen and living room were homey and cozy. We actually did see a wee bit of Aurora through the huge wall of windows, despite heavy clouds. The place was spacious, and the upstairs master bath and suite was great. The sauna was clean and luxurious. We had a wonderful time.

All 3 nights we saw and photographed the aurora. The 3rd night was the best and they were exploding all over the sky, with red and green colors. The view from this home is awesome! We are experienced aurora chasers from Anchorage, and our images were freaking fabulous from the front deck of this beautiful home.
There were 5 in our group, and we rented a large 4wd SUV, which is a good idea in the winter. We kept 4H engaged the whole time, and it was just fine. But I do not recommend a small car with no 4WD.
The hosts of this home are incredibly kind, responsive, and have paid attention to detail in the home. We cooked breakfast and noticed how well appointed the kitchen is, there are even spices and loads of coffee K cup options. There was even tea and tiny little creamers.
There is also an electrical outlet near the door so we were able to plug in our vehicle as the temps were -22F and we could keep our engine block heated.
We HIGHLY recommend this home.
Thank you Curt !!!!
Beautiful cabin with amazing views! Extremely Clean, Comfortable and cozy. Would have loved to stay longer!
Beautiful home. Didn’t get to see the aurora but will definitely stay again.

Our stay at the house was very pleasant. We needed to leave our luggage at the house before the official check-in time because we had an excursion, and they and they were very understanding. The house has everything you might need; it's a perfect place to rest and have a good time with friends, as was our case. Our excursions lasted until late at night, so we didn't see the aurora from the house because it was cloudy the only day we stayed there to relax and watch the sunset.
Communication with Misti was excellent; she even helped us search for a car rental company since the ones we knew didn't have cars available for 7 people anymore. We would definitely choose this house again, without a doubt. It's a shame we couldn't stay longer.

We were looking for a place to end our driving trip around Alaska to allow us to relax and rest at the end of our trip and the house couldn’t have been any better for what we needed. You walked in and felt like you were at home with beautiful surroundings for a peaceful stay.

The Aurora House was beautiful, just like the pictures. It is in a very private, peaceful setting with gorgeous views. Our AWD van did just fine getting in and out, even with fresh snow on. The home is far enough away from the lights of town that we had a great view of the aurora lights right from the deck. The home was well stocked with plenty of towels, etc. ( that is sometimes hard to find in a rental.) The hosts were very responsive to any questions that we had about the home and the town in general. There is a wide variety of activities offered in the area within a reasonable driving distance. Our family had a wonderful time!

Absolutely breathtaking! The House is so comfortable and cozy. Had everything we needed. You won’t want to leave once you’re there. The Directions were great and very happy we had a AWD vehicle.
We will be back!
Thank you, Misti!
Absolutely beautiful but remote cabin. Added the perfect level of escape to our Alaskan trip.

A great place to stay. Saw the northern lights from the house. The home is incredibly welcoming and warming. The heated floors were a total bonus! We loved our entire stay. Misty and hosts were at our fingertips whenever we had a question or needed information. They even let us know when the northern lights were out. 😎

We love the cabin. It was gorgeous inside and out. A bit scary the first time driving off the freeway because it was dark and snowing. But once we got into the place. We all were stunned by the cabin.
I will definitely come back to Fairbanks and stayed here again.

If you are waffling on where to stay in Fairbanks, look no further and book the Aurora House. You won't regret it! From amazing views to heated floors, this home provides sets the stage for magical trip. We appreciated the have basic kitchen amenities, which came in handy the evenings we decided to eat in and cook.
This place is about the views, and oh boy they don't disappoint! We were able to view the Aurora without having to leave the comfort of the cabin, we downloaded the Aurora app and turned on notifications to help us time anticipate the timing of the light shows. Our only regret was that we didn't stay longer - so we will be back!
Thank you to our hosts, you were all so kind and responsive :)
Thank you for the great stay!

Awesome house with a breathtaking view from balcony.
We had a wonderful time there and would love to return.
Highly recommended!
The place looked exactly like pictured, great view and great privacy, easy check-in. Hosts were super friendly and responsive, gave us a lot of help and saved our Alaska trip!

Misti and her team were very helpful prior and during our stay. They were very responsive and resourceful. The house is BEAUTIFUL with stunning view. If like to be closer to nature and don’t mind the drive to the city, it’s the perfect spot to getaway.
This house is amazing. Very well appointed, clean, and a perfect place to see the northern light from. Everything was as described and host was very responsive.
Amazing cabin. Great views and location!
Truly a blissful house! Love how well it was stocked, the vibe, the fire, the sauna, the outlook onto the forest abyss. The ability to see the Auroa (if you're lucky, we were!)
Absolutely breath taking views and so peaceful. The sauna is also a nice touch to the place.

This is a nice place outside of town. Beautiful snow capped trees. It is a very peaceful surroundings.
Keep in mind it is outside of town and you will need 4 wheel drive when it starts snowing. This will add to your commute time to Fairbanks or other areas. It was worth it to us to be outside of town in the beauty of Alaska.
The rooms and beds are comfy with just enough space to relax. The amenities available were perfect!
We had the most amazing time. We felt like we were living inside a postcard. The house was gorgeous and comfortable and the Co-hosts were very responsive and accommodating. Will definitely come back!
Beautiful cabin with modern luxuries right in nature’s backyard

do not sta anywhere else! the Aurora House was PHENOMENAL! it was bright, open, comfortable and exactly like the pictures! AND....the Northern lights are right there for you to see from the deck!!! Misting Yvonne were great! Best place to create forever memories!

This has to be the best place in Fairbanks. The views are incredible, the house is amazing, and the kitchen has everything you would need. This trip was just my wife and I but this place would be great for up to 3 couples/families. We canceled most of our plans to stay in and take in the views. This house is one of the best places to see the northern lights, you have 180 degree view of the sky.

It is a beautiful house with a great view from the living room. We have enjoyed our stay, couldn’t expect better. We were lucky to see the Aurora. Misti is a great host, easy to communicate and very cooperative. If we ever visit Fairbanks again will definitely look for this house to stay.
Beautiful place, very relaxing.

Really good place to stay and a friendly host. we didn't get to see the Northern lights, but the place was really good and cozy. lots of space, and the best part was the little sauna. we had the best time in this airbnb . I would definitely recommend this place and would love to come in the future. 💯

We absolutely loved staying at the Aurora House! Everything was sparkling clean and the responsiveness of the host is top notch. They offered many suggestions on things to do and local restaurants which were great recommendations.
There isn’t a long list of to-dos to check out either, which we appreciated!
Overall this was absolutely one of our favorite stays and we travel a lot. I would recommend staying here to anyone!
We had a great time here! The kids loved the house, we loved the sauna and the surroundings. We enjoyed ourselves immensely and can’t say enough good things about Mistis house.

Wonderful Stay!
Our family wanted to stay at a property that was scenic and felt like the Alaska experience, and this home definitely met that expectation. The deck was one of our favorite places to gather, and we enjoyed family game nights in the terrific living room. The kitchen was well-stocked. The bedrooms were nicely appointed and comfortable. Best of all were the gorgeous views which could be enjoyed from both upstairs and downstairs. The booking process was seamless and we appreciated the quick responsiveness of the owner regarding our questions. We are so grateful for the excellent experience we had at this property. We created family memories that will last a lifetime. Thanks!!
Beautiful property with gorgeous views and great amenities. The location is bit remote, but very serene place and surroundings

I very much liked the Birch Perch. This was a spring time visit, great weather, snow gone and almost 24hr day lite. Beautiful, almost summer like conditions, for summer like adventure. The house and grounds were well maintained, modern furnishings, well stocked of basics (spices and the like), organized, clean and it was evident that the hosts had done a lot to curate the space. Art, live plants, record player, book shelves, and a Nintendo from the 80's that was a blast from the past!
Well functioning BBQ, and the kitchen had all the pots and pans needed. Great deck spaces on the second level.
Out the back door is the O' Connor ridge trail system. Consisting of a bunch of non motorized hiking trails. We did the Cranberry trail loop with some extra out and backs, and would recommend that as a start. Murphy dome is close, Angel Rocks about an hour.
About 10 minutes from the University, the airport, the antique auto museum, farmers market, and town.
10 out of 10 would recommended.

The home and the hosts were exceptional!
It was beautiful, comfortable and stocked with everything you could need while on vacation. Including fresh coffee beans for the morning after a long day of travel!
The short drive out of town was just what we were looking for, to get that Alaskan wilderness vibe.
After a 12 day stay, we still couldn't find anything that the property lacked.
Amber and Dan get a 10/10 from us for an awesome experience. They could charge more and it would still be a good deal. It was perfect!

Great house in a birch forest. Just outside of town but not to far. Great walking trails nearby. Very responsive and helpful host. Host provided lots of recommendations (great locations to view the aurora, places to go, and good restaurants). House had plenty of amenities which made it feel like home. Highly recommend

Such an amazing place to stay. As soon as we got there it felt like home. Far enough from the city to feel like your own private getaway but close enough to experience everything that Fairbanks has to offer. The house was clean, modern and very well maintained. It had all the amenities you could hope for and a lot of small touches that were very much appreciated. Amber was a great host and was very communicative prior to and during our stay. Instructions for check in were clear and easy. Amber also provided great suggestions for activities and places to visit, eat, etc. The nightly aurora update was appreciated. Overall a 10/10 and somewhere I will definitely look to stay again on my next visit to Fairbanks. I would recommend to anyone planning their trip to Fairbanks!

The Birch Perch was absolutely amazing. You feel right at home, and it was perfectly warm and cozy. It is in a private, safe location which is optimal for a great weekend getaway. It has everything you need from a warm inviting fire place to a fridge and cabinets filled with snacks and drinks. I rate the physical place 10/10, however the real reason you should stay here is because of the incomparable hosts. From time I booked the place Amber and Dan have made 100% certain we had everything we needed to have a fantastic getaway. Amber is so warm, detailed, and responsive. Incredibly amicable from the onset, she provided me with multiple guiding tips on where to eat and how to see the northern lights. Without even being asked, she even made sure we had fresh desserts and a wonderful bottle of champagne to help us celebrate our special occasion. If the place is a 10/10, the hosts are an 11/10. If you're coming to Fairbanks, you want to stay here.

We stayed at the Birch Perch house for a week, everything was wonderful and unforgetable , the house is pretty beautiful, comfortable, has everything you need, it's very warm in the winter.
Amber and Dan gave us all the information about the house and the locals restaurant and recent activities, and they sent us the weather and aurora reports daily, that's very very helpful, we finally saw the beautiful aurora.
We will definitely recommend this place to our friends and we will stay here again when we come to Fairbanks next time.

Do yourself a favor and book this stay. Everything about the home is great. Kitchen is stocked. Location is beautiful. They provided local recommendations and was very responsive. Would love to stay here again!

This is by far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in! The view from the house is breathtaking and the house itself is absolutely beautiful! The hosts ,Amber and Dan,thought of everything that we needed to make our stay comfortable! They built a fire for us to come in to, left all kinds of goodies in the fridge for us and snacks in the pantry. It was beyond what we could have ever imagined! The beds were so comfortable, the shower had everything we needed for our stay, (shampoo ,conditioner, soap) I cannot say enough about this place! If you are visiting Alaska this is the place to stay!

Amber exceeded expectations, providing excellent care with valuable trip tips. Communication was seamless, and their kindness added to the overall positive experience. Responding super fast! Highly recommended!

One of the best BnBs we stayed in, Amber and Dan are easily the best hosts! The house was shiny-clean, stylishly decorated and had everything one would need (even a luggage scale). The location is tranquil neighborhood situated in a beautiful birch forest just 20 minutes outside of Fairbanks. If you’re traveling to Alaska to reconnect with nature without loosing amenities of modern life we would definitely recommend this place.
Amber and Dan were outstanding hosts! Check-in was flawless, hosts made sure we have everything we need and promptly answered our questions. It was surprise to find that hosts even prepared a list of local activities available during our stay and also provided daily updates on aurora viewing conditions which was super helpful.
We will definitely be back!

Amber and Dan were always helpful, friendly and professional. The Birch Perch is an amazing place!! So much to appreciate, and made easier to enjoy thanks to the thoughtful touches such as leaving a few treats and groceries for us, advising us on local snowshoe trails, aurora watching. And seriously: keeping a place like that thriving through the Alaska winter takes dedication, hard work and ingenuity -- well done, Amber and Dan! I hope we will be back.
They are the best Airbnb hosts I've encountered (and that is many).

Cannot begin to say how amazing both the space was and how friendly and helpful Dan and Amber were!
The cabin and locations were truly a dream/ every day they provided great aurora forecast updates/ and proactively suggested places to go, things to see, and things to eat! Kitchen was stocked with helpful items/ record player was a wonderful evening addition to the ambiance/ and the toasty wooden fire topped it all off!
Being 4 folks from New Orleans, an Alaskan winter trip felt like a huge leap, but the space and pro-tips from the hosts made it easy and wonderful!
10/10 would recommend!!!
Great cozy place to stay for vacation! It’s nice and warm, with great snow views in the winter. The house is cute and close to the nature. Wonderful experience and I’m glad that we stayed here!

Dan and Amber’s place is by far the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in! I stayed here with my family for Christmas and it had everything we needed and more! The kitchen was perfect for cooking family dinners and was the most well stocked kitchen I’ve ever seen in an Airbnb. There’s a fantastic stereo system (bluetooth, CDs, AND a record player!), and a smart tv downstairs for a nice movie night. They clearly put so much care into making this home feel cozy, with little reading nooks and fluffy blankets. They are incredible hosts and I will definitely want to stay here again next time the family is in town!

We had a fantastic stay! Amber and Dan were very welcoming, and their place was wonderful. They provided us with valuable local tips, including some great advice for aurora chasing. Their attention to detail really stood out, with thoughtful touches such as:
- Pre-booking communication about road conditions and car requirements.
- Every switch is labeled!
- Luminous stickers on the stairs for added safety in the dark.
- Stocked pantry with food, water, and cleaning supplies, in case you forget anything.
This was one of the best accommodation experiences I've ever had. We even canceled our reindeer tour just to spend more time in this lovely house. Thank you both so much!

Birch Perch was everything we were looking for and more! The location is gorgeous, quiet and peaceful! The house is lovely with many added touches and surprises! Check-in was smooth and the treats in the fridge were an added bonus! Birch Perch isn't too far from town, has lots of trails nearby and is close to many Aurora viewing locations! While we did not see the lights - it snowed - our trip was still amazing and we highly recommend Birch Perch! We would stay there again!

Our stay in Fairbanks, AK at Amber's place was an absolute delight! From start to finish, they truly went above and beyond to ensure our visit was extraordinary.
They welcomed us with warmth andgenuine care, making us feel right at home from the moment we arrived. Not only did they provide uswith a beautifully decorated and cozy house, but their attention to detail was outstanding.
Amber made our stay incredibly convenient by furnishing the Airbnbwith everything we could possibly need. From an array of snacks and beverages to an assortment of personal care items, they left no stone unturned in ensuring our comfort.
What made our experience even more remarkable was the thoughtful gesture of providing daily travel and driving tips, along with updates on the aurora forecast.This personalized touch added an exciting element to our trip, allowingus to explore the beautiful surroundings of Fairbanks with easeand excitement.

Not sure where to start but this place is incredible and Dan and Amber are the most amazing host I have ever met. We have stayed at many Airbnb but nothing has come close to Dan and Amber hospitality. They have thought of every detail to ensure guest feel at home. The cabin is clean, warm, and has everything you need. The beautiful surroundings of the cabin and peacefulness is the ultimate location to enjoy Alaska. Thank You Dan And Amber for the wonderful experience cant wait to come back . ❤️

Amber and Dan are such great hosts that we are so thrilled to be the guests. Before the trip, Amber already sent tons of docs and notes, that is great for planning! During the stay, Amber welcomed us with smoked salmon(umm so good!) and fire wood in the basement, I burned two pitches during the stay, it is warm! Also for the northern light, Amber provided detailed info in real time! That was also impressed. Amber is also aware of the wild animals around, during the stay I took photos of many adorable creatures, and I think that is something make this Airbnb such a special one. Place two food feeder for birds around the house? that was genius, you placed a B&W speakers and a bare eye binocular for birds at the same time! The house itself is truely a home in the north, I will definitely return. Had so much fun!

Well, what can I say..other than AMAZING!! The cabin was everything we hoped for and more! It was the perfect retreat after sight seeing and taking long walks viewing the breath taking sights of Alaska. The hosts communicated well and were very proactive with helpful tips and recommendations throughout our stay and there is an excellent information file in the lodge. The check in was flexible and the log fire had been lit prior to our arrival. Fresh treats and drinks had been left for us and the cupboards were full of various groceries for us too. The kitchen was equipped with every useful tool you can think of. Every room was immaculate, querky with a beautiful decor and there was a mulititude of books and games available. I will definitely be returning here and would highly recommend! The only regret is that you will not want to leave ❤

A pure GEM in the middle of a birch wood forest! This sweet place was secluded, private and felt like home the moment we drove up… and it was filled with so many extras! It exceeded our expectations and was easily driving distance to everything we wanted to visit in the town of Fairbanks. One of the highlights was sitting by the wood burning stove and watching ‘Into the Wild’, with movie snacks… the icing on the cake was seeing the Aurora (Northern Lights) on our last night there - WOW!
We would highly recommend it to anyone wanting a quiet getaway, close to all and will definitely stay here the next time we plan a trip this way!!
Thank you for the hospitality and perfect stay!

This place was over the top. Not only the location, but the layout of this house was just adorable. Every detail was enough to make you smile. The live plant vines strewed amongst the 2 spiral staircases, the unique hand soaps, hair products and decorations as well as the ambiance. It was peaceful and welcoming. A pristine record player with a flawless collection of albums were available along with a guitar, several games and a vintage Nintendo system with a huge game collection as well. Books galore sit on the bookcase and a large smart TV in the basement.
Personal touches were everywhere. Fresh baked goods were provided and local Alaskan Beer collection in the fridge with a personal note to our family welcoming us to reassure if anything could possibly be needed other than what was already provided. Other food items were provided as well. Our host was so generous and sweet. Just look at all the pictures! This space is even better than that. THIS STAY WAS 10/10. :)
Amazing place, great hosts. We had a great stay. Amber and Dan are very responsive. Felt like home and they left us goodies in the fridge too. Best Air bnb so far!

This Airbnb was the best one I have stayed with so far!! The place is so comfy and neat. The host (Amber) is super nice and responsive! She answered my messages/questions asap! Also super thoughtful…the Airbnb has EVERYTHING you need and also have a lot of books/boardgames/LPs if wanted to spend time in the house. I would 100% recommend this place to anyone who is plan on visiting Fairbanks!
Amber's place was perfect for our family who came in last minute. She was very responsive and accommodating, 5 star experience!

The Birch Perch is a literal work of art. Every detail of the house and the decorations are amazing. Amber the host, even left us welcoming treats in the fridge. We have never had such a generous and kind welcome before. The house is located at the end of a private road, right next to a network of hiking trails. It's location was perfect for our adventure on the Dalton highway as well as experiencing all that Fairbanks had to offer. Amber's recommendations were fantastic. She even sent us a local list of activities for the nights that we were staying. First rate accommodations, location and host. Thanks for everything Amber!

I don’t have enough good things to stay about our stay at the Birch Perch. So many thoughtful touches. The house was equipped with anything and everything you could need. Amber had the best guide book for us with events listed for our time there. The house was beautiful and was everything we were hoping for. Best Airbnb experience ever! Thank you to Amber & Dan for making the experience one that we will always remember.

My wife and 7 year old son throughly enjoyed our stay. Birch Perch is a lovely home. It’s very unique, comfortable, private. My son particularly enjoyed the “bunk” bed as his special retreat! We also enjoyed the wood stove in the cooler morning hours. When we are next in Fairbanks this will be our first choice of where to stay.
Easily one of the best Airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in

The house is surrounded by a beautiful forest that you could do a couple of trails on. The house from the outside is really outstanding and pretty as the inside. It has everything you need and more. Amber gave us lots of sweets and food. We played music on the vinyl player, watched a couples of movies, played some mario on the nintendo, enjoyed a barbecue on the grill and very fun table games. Overall 💯 experience, would totally recommend 🎉
Loved the spot. Absolutely beautiful on the inside and out. Amber is awesome and went above and beyond my expectations. I give the whole experience a 10 out of 10, 5 stars, and 2 thumbs up.

This place was so perfect!! It’s an absolutely gorgeous place set off in the woods, and it was so serene and lovely. Great amenities, great decor, lots of fun little touches (we particularly enjoyed the original Nintendo; brought back lots of great memories from childhood :-) ). The host was wonderful; so kind and responsive! And she has so many different kinds of food for us! Cake and popcorn and all sorts of things! Such a lovely surprise, and well above and beyond! Everything we wanted for our 15th wedding anniversary!

One of the most thoughtful spaces we’ve have ever stayed. Everything is labeled and very intuitive. Amber and Dan are so generous with all amenities. It was so tidy and clean. Will and already have recommended this spot!

Our expectations were exceeded with this beautiful home. Such true heart went into making every detail from top to bottom excellent. Dan and Amber have an amazing place and Amber was so kind and warm in our conversation. We felt welcomed and even loved as we went through our weekend at the “Birch Perch” together. If I could give more stars, I would. There were sweet surprises around every corner! This place is so fun and unique in all the right ways! It was very clean too! We look forward to our next visit. It was truly a pleasure. I wholeheartedly recommend this experience with great delight.

Amber is the best host you'll ever meet! Our stay was so much more than a "rental." We wanted to find a beautiful place to hold a wedding ceremony for 15 people and Amber happily accommodated us, offering referrals for florists,photographers and bakeries! We were in constant contact since booking. We've NEVER felt so welcome at another booking. The home is exquisite! We were fortunate enough to meet our hosts and that was our privilege. Finding their perfect home for our daughter's wedding, their kindness and willingness to accommodate our unique requests made the wedding and our stay magical! If you visit Fairbanks, this is the place to stay! I honestly feel like we underpaid. No one has ever treated us better! This immaculate and stunning home was a dream stay for our family! We were blessed to meet two wonderful people and I will never forget their kindness, honesty and compassion. Amazing stay! A 1000 word review isn't enough to convey our appreciation!

The Best AirBnB I've Stayed In, Full Stop
This is I think what happens when you have a host who is perhaps a little OCD about ensuring you have a good experience (in a good way!). The place is perfectly appointed, stocked and... everything is labelled :). It's clear that a lot of iteration and work has gone into the experience design. Every detail of the space is smoothly and thoughtfully curated. Additionally, unlike most other AirBnb's I've stayed at, you don't feel 'nickel and dimed' over the amenities.
The interior design is better than I've seen in other AirBnb's, including the lighting design... there are a lot of lights... Good thing all the switches are labelled :) The grounds are extensive, and the privacy is palpable.
Amber & Dan were very friendly and went out of their way to help me arrange a package delivery and gave me some tips on braving the Dalton Hwy.
Staying here had me a little nostalgic for the early 'good ole days' of AirBnb.
Maximum Stars.

I stayed at the Birch Perch for my 30th birthday along with my bff and my fiancé. Before we had even booked our stay, Dan and Amber sent us several long, thoughtful messages answering our questions about visiting Alaska and how we should prepare. They were genuinely invested in making sure we had everything we needed.
They were very clear about the weather and the roads, and unfortunately we ran into a bit of an issue getting up the road to the house. They immediately jumped in their car and came to ferry us to the Birch Perch where they had already started a fire in the stove!
The place is AMAZING. The pictures don’t do it justice. Not only was it cozy and beautiful, they’d stocked everything we could possibly have needed, including binoculars, headlamps, yoga mats, postcards, and a fully stocked kitchen.
I can’t stress how unbelievably kind and generous they are. They constantly offered up their time and resources to improve our time in AK. We’re already planning to return!!!!

Not only is the Host amazing! The place was everything, if not more from what we expected.
It was nice to wake up in the woods away from everyone and explore the hiking trails around the property. If you’re looking for a getaway with your significant other. This place is perfect!
Seeing the Aurora from Ambers place is awesome! Got to see it for the first time right from the driveway and was blown away!
While staying there, I was able to order groceries with ease and get rides into town using the Uber app since i didn’t take my own vehicle. Even then, I had an amazing time staying here.
This place is definitely worth the time and money! There’s no doubt you’ll feel right at home c:

To say this home and its hosts were wonderful is a complete understatement! From the first interaction at making the reservation through the whole visit we were treated like family! From the moment we arrived we felt welcome and at home! We even had treats and beverages waiting for us in the fridge! This house has something for everyone. The decorating was amazing along with the abundance of fun games, books, magazines, and music available. Our son accidentally left a small stuffed animal and Amber found him and is going to return our lost family member to us in style! Our stay was awesome and having daily updates from Amber about the happenings in town, along with northern lights updates was so great! It’s a peaceful property with tons of wildlife and access for outdoor adventures as well! We feel like we’ve made new friends in them and look forward to coming back again, soon!

Our stay was perfect. Made better by the local special touches that greeted us upon arrival like a birthday cupcake, delicious cinnamon roll from a local bakery and others. The house is simply stunning and the perfect getaway for a trip to Fairbanks. Impeccable communication and thoughtfulness. We sure do hope to come back soon! Thank you!

The house was exquisite - just as described, private, peaceful location, amenities to spare. Everything was perfect upon arrival and Amber and Dan were very helpful throughout our stay. Detailed, informative and clear communications were provided to make us feel at home. Sincerely enjoyed our stay and highly recommend."

I have to say what an absolute joy in every sense it was to arrive at Amber and Dan’s place. It’s the best house!!! We loved it so much, everything is clean and cute! We will definitely go back! Thank you for sharing all of the information about Aurora light and activities in Fairbanks, we had a really good time there! Thanks for everything!

This is the BEST Airbnb experience I ever have! The moment that we stepped into the house, it makes us feel like home. It’s very warm and clean, everything is clean. Feels like a second home for me.
The community with Amber and Dan is incredible. They always keep us posted about when you can see the aurora, where you can go, what time etc. And they always make sure you have everything that you need and respond quickly.
This location of the house is super convenient, also very quiet, you can have your own privacy. I definitely recommend if anyone go to Fairbanks and looking a place to stay, here’s the best!!! And definitely wanna go visit again!

Simply amazing! we were very well received, and also during our stay, they cared about us so that we could make the most of the place, always with quick responses! I was really happy and will be back again! highly recommend. You will feel right at home, that's how they make you feel. Thanks

My wife and I have stayed in many vacation rentals, and our stay at Amber & Dan's house was quite honestly the best experience we have ever had. Throughout our week long stay, Amber & Dan were quick to respond to messages and questions and provided many great recommendations to us. We felt like we were staying in a hotel with concierge service. 10/10 - we will definitely be staying here again during our next trip to Fairbanks.

This location is phenomenal! It’s a castle of nostalgia, with old toys, books I haven’t seen since I was much younger, classic records etc. We legit forfeited our entire second day of prepaid activities, to just relax and enjoy the amenities. The first night we played Nintendo until we fell asleep, then spent the entire next day playing records, cooking and reading. Amber and Dan were so accommodating, she even kept an eye out for the northern lights for me and messaged me when she saw them so that I wouldn’t miss them while I was out there. I will plan all future trips to Fairbanks around the availability of this listing alone.
Great trip!! Hosts were amazing! Thank you Amber!

The Birch Perch is the perfect launch point for Fairbanks! I didn’t want to leave. Amber and Dan thought of everything we could possibly need for our stay, and more. The guidebook was very inclusive and had great suggestions for local restaurants. The kitchen is also fully stocked to make meals. Amber was very quick to respond and kept up with communication during our stay. Overall incredible experience at the Birch Perch!
I guarantee you will NOT find a cooler, more stylish place in all of Alaska. Amenities are truly above and beyond. You can not miss out on this experience.
Lovely wooded escape not far from town! Thoughtful touches and plenty to occupy you on a rainy cold day! Beautiful gardens, comfortable furnishings, generous host and a must stay when in Fairbanks!!

The Birch Perch was an absolutely an amazing AirBNB experience!! This was easily one of the best places we have ever stayed in!! Amber & Dan are incredible hosts! Amber was extremely responsive, left us yummy treats in the fridge and wrote us a nice greeting upon arrival.
The home is lovely and is a true place of peace! It's in a beautiful spot outside of the city tucked into a hillside surrounded by a gorgeous forrest. There is even a fairy house tucked along the driveway! There are miles of trails literally outside the back door that we enjoyed exploring in the light of the early evening. The care and detail they have put into the home shows! Everything is labeled, and the home manual has everything thought through with every detail. The home was thoughtfully designed, decorated, safe, private and comfortable!
We loved the peace and quiet in the evenings, and looked forward to returning to this beautiful home after our days out! There is a plethora of books, and board games to enjoy! The game center was great, and we enjoyed playing the old Atari and Nintendo systems with our kids that took us back to our childhood! We would will definitely return to the Birch Perch! Don’t stay anywhere else in Fairbanks - This is the place to stay!!

From start to finish, this was an amazing experience. Amber was very courteous and thoughtful from the moment I made reservations. She was very accommodating by letting us check in early and even left a few nice surprises in the fridge.
The place was very clean, comfortable and private. Amber has it designed and decorated very beautifully. It was like something out of a magazine.
If you want cozy comfort with all the amenities, this is the place to stay. Highly recommended 👌
This was a wonderful place to stay during our conference. The place was adorable.

Wow. This place is fantastic. I travel to Fairbanks several times a year for work. The location of the Birch Perch was perfect for me. I loved the solitude this home provided. It's in a beautiful spot about twenty minutes out of the city tucked into a hillside surrounded by a gorgeous. forrest. There are miles of trails literally outside the back door that I enjoyed before heading off for the day. I loved the peace and quiet in the evenings. The home was thoughtfully designed, decorated, safe, private and comfortable. The owners honestly could not be more thoughtful and attentive. There were garden fresh vegetables left in the fridge for me on arrival with a sampling of local beverages and amazing smoked salmon. I cannot rate this highly enough and will definitely return on future trips to Fairbanks.

The house was amazing! It’s exactly how it was pictured in the ad but was just more cozy in person, the location is a little away from downtown Fairbanks but only by a few minutes which wasn’t a problem as the change of scenery constantly was appreciated, Amber kept in contact with us constantly so we never felt confused about the check in-check out and she even left little notes around the house to aid us in properly utilizing everything, the treats she left was awesome and much appreciated. The whole house was extremely clean and attention to detail on basic necessities one might need during their stay was above and beyond. All in all I’d absolutely come back, the price was well worth it and there were no issues that presented itself during our stay. Made my girlfriends experience in Alaska that much more memorable.

This place was absolutely awesome, even better than it was advertised, the host is beyond awesome and helpful and super friendly, I’ve not seen a place that was more organized and equipped than this place in all 29 countries that I’ve been too. The kitchen is full of stuff that you can eat not just the basics. Amber went above and beyond to make sure we won’t need a single thing during our stay and the area is sooo beautiful and quite. I would definitely recommend everyone who’s coming to Fairbanks to book this place without hesitation. And I’ll definitely be back soon.
Hassan

Ambers cabin is the perfect place to enjoy Fairbanks nature. The cabin is beautiful inside as is outside. It’s well organized with everything you need to cook your own meals. Amber is a great host who cares that you enjoy your stay and makes sure you have anything you need to have a good time.

Amber was amazing and very helpful .The house was lovely everything was nice and clean ,she left goodies in the fridge for us and checked in to see if we needed anything.It would be a great place for families,we had a great time and would definitely visit again .

Excellent destination with hiking trails close…. The accommodations were perfect while special features throughout..
The amenities were numerous and made our stay in Fairbanks epic. I highly recommend.

Best AirBnB experience ever! Amber was so helpful, accommodating and communicative before/during/after the reservation. The place was perfect. Just the right distance from town to be & feel remote enough, but accessible and an easy 7 min drive to civilization. Everything you could ever need is provided. Artsy, whimsical and modern. We found new little fun surprises around the place everyday. Would definitely stay there again. Super clean and very well curated.

The Birch Perch was beyond our expectations. The pictures are great but you really have to stay there to appreciate all the detail. Very clean and extremely well stocked. The location is perfect, close to town but still feels very secluded. The hosts were very helpful and even let us borrow some bear spray. Highly recommend this place and we hope it is available for our next visit.

Wonderful large house, with attention to even the smallest details. One of the best Airbnb’s my family has been to, and the privacy, cleanliness, and environment was top notch. The owners were very quick to respond and very thoughtful and accommodating. The house as a whole is better looking then the photos and would definitely recommend to anyone coming to Fairbanks!

Absolutely the best AirBnB experience I’ve had - by far. You cannot have a true Alaskan trip without spending a few days at this amazing home. Amber went above and beyond in hosting us. Every detail was thought out. She was responsive, had prepared local cheese dip for us, and warmly greeted us upon arrival. The home is lovely and is a true place of peace. Don’t stay anywhere else in Fairbanks - you’ve found the right place here. I highly, highly, highly recommend. It was the highlight of the trip!
Extremely nice and helpful with everything

The "Birch Perch" was aptly named, birch trees out of every window! My husband and I enjoyed an impromptu weekend getaway here, it did not disappoint.
The house is immaculate. It is as pictured. I will add that the two spiral staircases are a great use of space though something to consider if you have any mobility issues. Every cooking tool or spice is available along with many canned items to get you started to make a soup, pasta sauce or more. Amber and Dan have thought of every item you could possibly need and many more you didn't know you needed but was a treat to have. I have never stayed in an Airbnb that was so well equipped. The bed was a dream with heavenly linens. The home is cozy, beautifully decorated and toasty warm!
We arrived to flowers and a few welcome gifts, not expected though highly appreciated. There is a vast assortment of books, magazines and games as well as stationary cards to choose from to write that note to someone you have been thinking of. Dan and Amber also took the time to sand the steep hill up to their home as well as the driveway prior to our arrival.
This has been a favorite Airbnb stay for us. Close enough to town but far enough out that we were (fortunate enough) to view the Northern Lights directly off the deck!! I am already looking forward to a making a return trip this summer, the stay was that spectacular. Amber is a highly communicative host. The House book was full of suggestions for local eateries and tips for viewing the Northern Lights.
I cannot say enough about this gem of a house nestled among the birch trees. Amber and Dan have gone above and beyond in designing a truly exquisite space to feel comfortable and relaxed in.
You will not be disappointed!

Don't look elsewhere -- book Dan & Amber's place. We were lucky to find this gem. One of the best stays in my travel experience.
We came to Fairbanks for just two days in late March - a last-minute getaway to snow, huskies, and Aurora Borealis. It was a perfect house for two to completely switch the context, disconnect, and enjoy the time. We watched the night sky from the deck, hiked local trails (just next to the house), tried dog mushing, and cooked delicious food..
The hosts thought through every step of the guest experience -- that's how I usually feel being in a good resort. The house is exactly as you see in the photos. Care towards the guests is all in the little details: e.g. there's a big collection of spices in the fully-stocked kitchen, and every appliance you may need for cooking. There's a pair of snowshoes outside; a collection of hand-made cards and stamps for you to sign and send home; video games from the 90s and all kinds of board games; a small library and a stereo with a vinyl player with disks; yoga mats, the wood for the woodstove is dry so it's easy to fire.
Also, I cannot be more thankful to our hosts for excellent communication throughout the whole journey and a lot of genuine care towards us. Dan and Amber are so welcoming and warm-hearted that we instantly got connected.

We had a fantastic night at Tanglewood Inn, we wish we could have stayed longer! The space is spotless, had everything we could need and more! Location was easy to find using directions. Washer and dryer were a nice touch. We also enjoyed the chickens walking by!

Tanglewood is a lovely cabin and Jess is a great host. We drive to Denali a few times, soaked at Chena hot springs, and explored local parks around Fairbanks. Tanglewood was an ideal base camp for our adventure and we would definitely return. Watch for moose on the road in though.

We had a great time at the cabin! We really enjoyed the fire pit and appreciated the firewood restock! Jessica was very responsive and flexible leading up to and throughout our stay. Highly recommend staying here if you are looking for a comfortable cabin in the woods.

Great airbnb! There were thoughtful little things throughout the cabin which made it a joy to stay in, like an extra phone charger. Bed was comfy and nice to see the chickens wandering around. Thank you!

Jessica’s place is hands down one of the best stays I’ve experienced in an Airbnb. The cabin is beautiful and has everything you need. Feels like a home away from home. Perfect location for activities in the area. Short drives to several aurora viewing locations. I was even lucky enough to see a moose with her calf right next to the cabin. Definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a place outside of the city.

one of the best Air Bnb's we have stayed at. So many extra touches, from the welcome basket, to the toiletries. just everything a person might need when away from home. We even rented their car, which was great. Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quiet getaway in Fairbanks. Thanks Jessica :)

Jessica’s place was wonderful! We had an excellent stay. Check in and check out was a breeze, the amenities at the cabin went above and beyond, the location was great, and the cabin felt cozy and like a home away from home. I highly recommend Jessica’s place to anyone looking to stay in the Fairbanks area. I can see why this place is a rare find on Air Bnb, there’s not enough good things to say about it!

Jessica is a very responsive host. Her cabin is delightful. She had a well-stocked cupboard complete with a basket of welcoming snacks on the countertop for our arrival. On our warmish late March visit, we enjoyed sitting on the front porch basking in the sunlight. There are plenty of boardgames and books to choose from to pass the time whilst awaiting the Aurora. We do wish the property listing would have disclosed that the cabin has neighbors to either side with sled dog kennels. This was unexpected and the dogs could be a bit noisy at times. When we inquired, Jessica responded that a moose and baby were in the area which made the dogs a little more restless and provided ear plugs. At the end of the day, the property is wonderful. And, as we have increasingly learned, it may not be that unusual for folks to have sled dogs. That said, for the urban folks out there, it will be helpful to note.

Jessica's place exceeded our expectations! We stayed there for 3 nights and saw the Northern lights every night. The cabin is located in the woods, which makes the lights easily visible from all directions. Despite being in a secluded area, we felt very safe because Jessica lives closeby and they have dogs outside protecting the property. The inside of the cabin is exactly as described and seen in the photos. The kitchen and the house overall were very well equipped, we cooked meals for three days. My husband worked from there, and the internet speed was amazing; we had no problem. The interior of the cabin is decorated so cozy, and we didn't even leave the house some days. We loved the super comfy reclining chairs, wooden stairs, and other details, especially the window nook that we spent most of our evenings chasing aurora and reading books. Jessica is a great host, so responsive, friendly, and helpful. Overall, we enjoyed our stay very much and hope to stay here again!

Really enjoyed our stay at Jessica’s place. The place was really clean, private and lots of space to separate out. Also was great that they provide a Jeep you can rent, was great in the snow. Thanks Jessica!

My husband and I were celebrating our anniversary and were hoping to see the Northern Lights.
Jessica was great and gave us tips on where to find them. We were successful twice. It was a trip we’ll never forget.
The cabin was perfect for the two of us. It was tucked away, but not too far from town. The snacks that Jessica left were an amazing touch.
Wonderful place to stay! Beautiful area and very responsive host!

Jessica’s Airbnb was fantastic! The cabin was peaceful yet not to far away from the town. We loved seeing the moose in the morning and the amenities provided were above and beyond. We would definitely come back to stay at Jessica’s cabin again!

We were only in Fairbanks for two nights, but staying at Jessica's place really helped us make the most of it. The cabin was warm, cozy, and easy to locate. The cabin is set away from downtown, which made it ideal for viewing the northern lights (which we were able to see from the window next to the bed!) as well as some moose lounging outside the kitchen window. The cabin was clean and very well stocked with anything we may need. Jessica even had snacks and a bottle of wine waiting for us when we arrived! Thank you for a great stay!
Best Airbnb ever. Jessica and Aron were amazing hosts. she exceeded our expectations.

Jessica was extremely helpful, providing us with a lot of Northern Lights guidance. The cabin is incredibly cozy, and Jessica has thoughtfully adorned every detail, even preparing numerous snacks for us. The location of the cabin is also very convenient. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Fairbanks – we will definitely be back!

We were finally able to make a trip to AK in the winter for a possible siting of the Aurora. This place was perfectly located for going into Fairbanks when we wanted to and for getting to great spots to catch the Aurora. We were lucky enough to see it two of the four nights we were there. The place was adorable and actually matched the pictures. Aaron and Jessica were super helpful and we really enjoyed our stay.

This cabin is perfectly out of the way from Downtown Fairbanks but not too far. The cabin had lots of little touches that put it over the top. Two bathrooms each with nice toiletries. A very well equipped kitchen, lots of extra blankets and pillows, even though the heating in the cabin worked beautifully. The location was very convenient to popular Aurora viewing areas and less than an hour to Chen Hot Springs.

My wife and I stayed here for our 1 year anniversary. The place was exactly as described in the listing with extremely beautiful surroundings. The inside was very cozy with lots of attention to detail. Jessica was amazing in her response time and giving us multiple recommendations and insight when we reached out to her for some advice. We would absolutely stay here again if we ever have the pleasure of coming back to Fairbanks.
The only thing I would say to other guests to be aware of, is that there are dogs in a kennel near the cabin. They would bark every so often, including at night time. There is a sound machine provided right by the bed (for this purpose I would guess?) which we used, and had no problem with the dogs barking. But I think it's something to be aware of before making the booking.

Jessica's cabin is beautiful. House was clean and organized. Jessica is a Wonderful host, she was always responsive. The house was provided with all amenities required for the stay. We were there in the first week of February and the stay was magical with the cabin completely surrounded by Snow. It is just 15mins away from Costco and Walmart.

These hosts are the real deal! From answering our questions to recommending local places to visit, our inquiries were always met with cheerful responses. We enjoyed being able to rent a vehicle directly from them and the airport pick up and drop off were just the icing on the cake. They made it so convenient for us! We loved being outside of the city where it was easy to relax and enjoy the natural surroundings and yet be close enough to the hosts that if we needed help with anything, they were quite near by. It's about an hour away from Chena Hot Springs. Definitely take the time to check out that place. Lovely, relaxing cabin with all the comforts of home. Would absolutely book again if in the area. Thank you, Jessica!
great place!

We had such a wonderful full at the cabin. Definitely one of the best well thought of airbnb we've stayed at. The cabin was very cozy you didn't even notice the it was below 0 outside.
We spent most of our trip exploring Fairbanks. We rented her Jeep and felt completely safe driving on the icy roads. We drove down to Castner Ice Cave definitely worth a drive. And went mushing at Bill Cotter's Sled Dog Rides. It was such a wonderful experience mushing and if you have time definitely try them out. They love there dogs so much.
The last night Jessica suggested heading up to Murphy Dome to check out the Aurora. And we caught it! It was amazing!!
Overall our trip was unforgettable and we're already planning a summer visit back to Alaska. Winter time is magical now we can't wait to see the other Seasons. Give a winter Alaska visit a try you want regret it.

A very nice place, recommend. Clean and cozy.
The breakfast kit is helpful as sometimes we would like to head out right away instead of stopping at the town to grab some food.
There’s a pack of dogs living near by, when we pulled our car at the door at night, there’s always one coming towards to check what’s happening, and others barking in the background. Don’t be scared they won’t attack.
Great place to stay in Fairbanks.

12/26-12/29/23. We went to Fairbanks hoping to see aurora. But we didn’t want to spend all night outside at aurora viewing locations. We were able to see aurora just outside of Jessica’s cabin. At one point we could even see it through the window from inside of the cabin. Inside of the cabin is very cozy and comfortable. Kitchen had everything we needed and more.

Merry Christmas!
We had a really good experience in your home, it’s large, clean and has all kinds of tools we might use. The chairs are so comfortable, kitchen has full functions. And washer and dryer let us could fresh our clothes.
Thank you so much and hope we could live again when we come to Alaska.

We only got to stay for one day and night, but we were stunned by how amazing the cabin and host were! The cabin and surrounding property were absolutely beautiful and looked just like the pictures. We visited in December and the snow made the area all the more peaceful (and showed the fresh moose tracks in the morning). Jessica was amazing from the time we booked and has really thought of everything to make this a perfect place to stay for anyone. ANYTHING you could need is there for you. She provided information about the cabin and check-in right away, as well as plenty of information in the cabin about the surrounding area and activities. We would gladly stay again and hopefully for a longer visit next time!

We had such a great time staying at Jessica’s cabin. The description of the location and amenities offered were accurate and she was very quick and helpful in her responses. I would recommend this stay to anyone and definitely hope to make it back again!

We had a great stay at Jessica's! It was extremely cold outside (to us) but the cabin was warm and cozy and literally had anything and everything we needed. There were even snacks that were way above and beyond our expectations.
Our goal was to see the Northern Lights and power through our Christmas cards. Alas, it was overcast and snowy for much of our visit but on the last night, the skies cleared for a bit and we saw a very faint aurora. (We think we might try again on a shoulder season). But we did get through all our card writing so achieved that goal.
We liked the quiet country setting but were fairly timid about driving in the snow. Even so, town is not far so it was the best of both worlds. Jessica checked in quite often and was very responsive to the few questions we had.
I'd highly recommend this spot - it's a real find.
Jessica was very helpful and the place was beautiful. Far away from the city that the stars were very clearly seen. Would highly recommend this place for a quiet get away
Felt very cozy and at home! Great host for our family getaway and would recommend to anyone!

Even better than advertised. Extremely clean and very cozy. Cabin was easily accessible to town but made you feel like you were miles and miles away from any town. Cabin has everything we needed and more. Jessica and her husband went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and made great suggestions of things to do and where to go for a great experience. My husband and I are already looking at dates to come back and will definitely be booking the cabin again!!!!
Very nice place that on the way to Chena Hot Springs! Quiet place and friendly hosts that are always responsive. Very clean rooms that have everything we need. Will come back for sure!
We enjoyed our stay very much. It was the perfect place for our Alaskan honeymoon. Thank you!

Jessica’s Tanglewood Inn was the *perfect* retreat for our short trip to Alaska. From booking to check out Jessica was responsive and always had recommendations for Northern Lights viewing or whatever else we needed. 12/10 would recommend Tanglewood Inn, beautiful, clean, comfortable, and well equipped! Thank you for an amazing experience for our wonderful trip!!

The place was beautiful, extremely clean, and was just like the listing. Bed was comfortable and place was very cozy. My only complaint was the amount of dogs barking the entire night, completely out of the hosts hands, but was definitely a little annoying. Overall great place!
Jessica and her family were amazing. The cabin was more than we expected! Pretty and cozy!
Planning to stay here again, when we visit Alaska in the future! extremely helpful host and amazing location/cabin.

This Airbnb could be in the dictionary under quaint Alaskan cabin. From when we first contacted Jessica, she was so helpful with recommendations for things to do and places to eat. We even ended up renting their Cherokee for our stay. I will be recommending this place to all our friends looking for a Fairbanks getaway and if we go back, there is no other place I would stay. The cabin had all the touches of home in a great vacation location.

Beautiful, cozy, comfortable cabin stocked with amenities and everything you need for an Alaskan adventure. Lots of small touches and details to make guests feel at home.
Looking forward to coming back to catch the aurora. This would be a great spot for it.

A lovely little cabin that was very cozy and clean. Was exactly as the pictures show. Not quite as private as I thought it would be but Jessica was a wonderful host, very kind with excellent communication. We had a great anniversary staycation!
Great place to stay!

This was one of the most well equipped air bnb’s I have ever had the pleasure of staying in. Not only did the space have everything we needed and more, but Jessica was an amazing host. From answering any questions we had to local recommendations, and more, Jessica was incredible. The home was comfy, peaceful, and beautiful along with clean and inviting. If we are lucky enough to make it to Fairbanks again, I will definitely be staying at Tanglewood.

Best Airbnb we have ever stayed at! Jessica was amazing to work with! The cabin was comfortable and looks just like the pictures! The property is lovely, I loved drinking hot cocoa on the porch! We rented their Jeep and it was perfect! Jessica is an AMAZING host!

We came here not knowing what to expect and leave here with our hearts full.
Coming from a very tropical country and this being our first encounter with snow was a shock but your cabin in the woods gave us everything and more. You thought of everything! Great job Jessica!
Since the moment we stepped in my boyfriend felt like home, he instantly knew where all things were, kitchen speaking (he does the cooking) and it is so cozy you just wanna stay here and understand why you live here. We came here to celebrate my boyfriend’s 50th birthday and with your recommendations was incredible! Sorry again for my clueless mind 😅. You weren’t lying when you said that we can see the Aurora from the front door and boy oh boy it didn’t disappoint ! The aurora was a dream come true. Lucky you! Definitely we are recommending your cabin.
Mucha gracias desde el fondo de nuestro corazón!
best way to end our trip. the place was well stocked, clean, and cozy. Jessica was so nice and accommodating. loved it!
This was a great little cabin. It was very clean and well stocked with coffee and snacks. If the Aurora is active, you can see them from here.

This place was so great! Jessica was an amazing host and the cabin was beautiful and perfect. We got to see the aurora and Jessica sent us a message when there was a great viewing night! Her husband Aaron even built us a fire pit when we asked if there was a place we could have a camp fire. I can't think of a better place to stay in all of Fairbanks.

What a wonderful stay we had at Tanglewood Inn! The cabin is SO lovely and Jessica has filled it with every amenity you could need for a comfortable, cozy visit. We loved sitting out on the porch in the evenings. The location is perfect; we loved being away from town but close enough to drive in. Being on Chena Hot Springs Road made hiking (don’t miss Angel Rocks!) and outdoor activities easily accessible. Jessica was a great host with recommendations for activities, restaurants, etc and she was always available. We would definitely stay here again!
My boyfriend and I loved our stay at Jessica’s place. We felt right at home and everything was perfect. Jessica was also responsive and very helpful. We would definitely stay here again!

Excellent communication from Jessica from the beginning. The place was spotless and cozy. Its perfect for couples and would highly recommend. Cabin is close to super markets making stay more convenient. Will definitely visit again for a longer stay.

I booked this trip for my parents and we all agree it was five stars from the time of reservation to the check out date! Jessica went above and beyond to ensure my parents had a lovely stay at the quaint Tanglewood Cabin. Communication was always friendly and prompt. She offered many local attractions/resources for them to explore during their stay. My parents felts right at home in a cabin that offered multiple amenities, but the peaceful surrounding was what they loved the most. Forever grateful for what Jessica and I were able to team up and pull off for my parents. It was a true trip of a lifetime for them! #thegreatalaskanadventure

This place was awesome. It actually is cute and cozy, and we found the location to be perfect: close enough to town, but also it gives you a head start if you’re heading out to the hot springs. And it’s big enough for some space if one of you goes to bed earlier (the other person could hang out downstairs. Thanks for the fresh eggs too, Jessica!

I can’t recommend Jessica’s cabin highly enough. It is a perfect Alaskan cabin, so homely with many lovely touches and thought into what a guest may want. Everything has been provided and all you need to do is arrive and enjoy the comfort and peaceful surrounds. Jessica is a great host and we hope to come back and stay longer next time!
Cute little place and easy to find.
Jessica’s cabin was very cozy and made us feel at home. The cabin was off the main roadway and was relatively quiet. We even passed a herd of cows on the way in. Definitely would stay there again.

We’ve stayed at several Air BnB’s before and most are great. But, Tanglewood Inn was by far the cleanest I’ve ever been in, and the most stocked with kitchen items. If we were staying for a few days there were lot and options for food preparation. It was great in every way!
We had an absolutely amazing stay in Jessica's cabin. I highly recommend her cabin to anyone visiting Fairbanks!

This cabin was very cozy and well stocked with amenities. It is not far from downtown Fairbanks or Chena River State Recreation Area for great hikes. The cabin was even stocked with bear spray and insect repellent. Jessica is an excellent hostess and very responsive.

Great cabin & host! Jessica was very helpful and responsive. Cabin was clean, homey and perfect for our stay in Fairbanks. It was about 20 minutes from the airport/town, but worth the drive in my opinion.

We enjoyed our stay at Jessica’s cabin. She is a wonderful host- very responsive and friendly. The cabin is charming and comfortable, with lots of amenities and extras - from snacks, to coffee, tea, and a big selection of games. I especially appreciated the eye patches provided- which helped me go to sleep when it stays light out until super late in the summer. We definitely recommend the place. Thanks Jessica!
Once again, we had a very pleasant stay at Tanglewood while visiting family that lives in the Chena Hot Springs Road area. Highly recommended.

We had a great stay. Jessica checked in before we arrived and after to make sure that everything was as expected. The cabin was super clean and comfy, and the snacks left on the cabinet upon our late arrival were a very welcome treat. Private with no traffic noise. We would absolutely stay here again.

Jessica’s cabin was perfect for us. She has been so thoughtful preparing the space for guests. The bed is comfortable and the linens are good quality. Having a half bath in the loft was one of the main reasons for choosing her place.
Jessica made excellent suggestions for us including an outdoor concert in the day of our arrival. She even provided a cloth for us so we could have a picnic.
To top it off, she rents her keep Cherokee, which made our arrangements even easier.
Great location and wonderful host!

The cabin is in a perfect location for privacy and that "out of town" feel. The owner is very helpful with recommendations. Kitchen has local cook books. There is plenty of Alaska unique qualities of this home. Its a genuine log cabin so it really doesn't get better than that. The only thing that might dull the experience is the dog sled team nearby. Only because of the occasional howling. If you love dogs and don't mind them, this shouldnt be a problem. However if your a lite sleeper you might get woken up to howling. (Ear plugs are the solution here) I do appreciate the owner for training them to be quiet at night as they did not howl at night... but come morning (~7/8am) they are awake and will let the whole neighborhood know about it. Overall though it was a beauitful cabin and the perfect place for a weekend.

Jessica and her husband are super host. They are very responsive from beginning till we get there and finally leave. The cabin is amazing its cute and super comfy. All the things you ever needed is there from pots and pans down to even ziploc bags.
Her house have 2 restroom that is very nice touch, one in the bedroom and one dow stairs. They live just at the back of the cabin so if ever there is any need for anything it is easy to ask them.
The cabin is so clean and smells clean too. They take really good care of the property. The cabin have a lot of magazine to read. I recommend to read the Tanglewood Cabin book there you can find all the things to do and to go.
Over all it was a fun 5 days and 4 nights stay.
Aimee
This place is off the beaten path and quiet! The host has literally thought of everything. Communication was perfect. Would definitely come back!

Tanglewood Inn was a perfect retreat. 12 miles from Fairbanks; an easy drive on well-paved roads, provided seclusion with every amenity we could have desired (and no tv to distract you from the beauty of nature). We had accessibility to all the activities we wanted in the area as well as a peaceful, modern, quiet spot to regroup & refresh. Internet was reliable, if not lightning fast. Remember, this IS rural Alaska! Jessica is flexible, responsive, friendly, & sincere. She respects guests' privacy yet is accessible whenever necessary. Photos & descriptions accurately reflect the cabin & don't even begin to describe all the items provided as a matter of course that improved our stay--food items stocked, for example, that we didn't think of and would have required a trip back to town. Also: an abundance of towels, blankets, toiletries, games, books, flashlights, even bug spray & a white noise machine! Up-to-date appliances--including washer & dryer--made our stay even easier

The perfect get away.
It wasn't to far out of town but far enough that it was very easy to find and was surrounded by very beautiful scenery. It is located on the owners land but we were not disturbed at all, aside from the cutest dogs comming up to say hello (Jessica always informed us if they would be doing work around the cabin). The inside look exactly as pictured, even more cute then that. Everything was included like towels, toiletries, dishes, and more like sleep masks and bug spray.
