It is a small cabin, but just as described. Perfect for a couple. Well maintained. Easy to find and park. Hot water with good pressure. Nice little kitchen. Comfy bed and linens. Lots of little extras.
Heather was great about answering my questions. She even sent me a quick text when the moose first showed up to let me know to look out the window.!
I didn’t want to leave! I highly recommend it and have told all my friends and family to go!!

I had the Sourdough Cabin during my trip to Fairbanks. After a busy itinerary the days before, it was really nice to relax in this quaint chalet right on the Chena River. The place was cozy and perfect for a peaceful getaway. I also came just in time to see the World Ice Art Championships in town, which I would highly recommend. Thank you Heather & Gary, it was a lovely stay!

We had the most wonderful time at Heather and Gary’s listing. Worked out very well for the 2 of us… great aurora viewing right outside on the patio, life time experience…kitchen is well equipped considering that we are vegetarian.. internet was great as we were working during the early mornings… hot water ….heated space ( winter stay) highly recommended for 2 people… it’s a cute cabin that is very well designed..and optimized for space …am sure this would be great spot for the summer too…
We will definitely recommend and visit next time..
Thank you Heather…

Absolutely loved our stay here! The cabin itself is so warm and cozy in the winter and was the perfect size for my fiancee and I. The scenery around was gorgeous and great for seeing the northern lights. We look all over for the lights and the only time we saw them was actually on the drive up to our cabin!
I highly recommend coming here if you plan on going to Fairbanks. It's still very close to town so you can access a ton of stuff while still being able to experience the scenery and nature. I can only imagine how great the property looks in the summer. Definitely plan on staying here again the next time we're in Fairbanks!

The Sourdough Cabin is clean, peaceful and cozy. The main floor is quite small but was enough for us to enjoy over an extended weekend. There is not a dining table and chairs inside, but we made due with the sofa. On our first night we saw the Northern Lights from the property, and even from the balcony outside the second floor bedroom! Wifi was sufficient for two people to get work done, though a bit slow to handle two simultaneous Zoom calls with video. Heather provided clear directions for driving to the cabin and was very responsive to our questions. Snow was cleared from the parking area and there was a wide, cleared pathway for accessing the cabin. There were outlets for plugging in the block heater which comes with rental cars in Fairbanks. We enjoyed our stay!
Beautiful place
We really enjoyed our time in this adorable little cabin! It was cozy and quiet and everything we were looking for. We had a great view of the northern lights!
Definitely recommend this cozy cabin!!!!!

Great cozy cabin at a great location to see the northern lights! The cabin had everything we needed and more! the host is amazingly nice and very welcoming! we really enjoyed our stay at Heather's cabin. Will definitely go back!
Good

Heather & Garys cabin is a short 20 minute drive from Fairbanks airport nestled on the Chena river in a picturesque location. The queen bed in this cabin is so very comfy and the cabin itself is warm and accommodating.
Shampoo, body-wash and conditioner is in the shower and the house is stocked with all one would need to cook. The location is fantastic as we were able to get beautiful pictures of the Northern Lights from the cabin on the night we left.
It’s a magical and charming place.

We loved our stay in the cabin. It is very prepared and we enjoyed our adventure. We were able to see the aurora borealis from the property and we did dog sledding just 9 minutes away from the cabin. We recommend it 100%.

What a cute little cabin. We enjoyed our stay in Alaska and were able to view the northern lights in a pull out right down the road which our host had recommended. Heather and Gary are fabulous hosts making us feel welcomed. Definitely the place to stay when enjoying an Alaskan adventure
Cute, cozy, cabin with incredible views. The location was great for going in many different directions. The hosts were fantastic at communicating and sharing local tips.
Loved the cabin. Heather was responsive to any questions we had.

i have to say ,out of all the stays my wife Martha and I had ,this is one of the best's ,so far Heather is the best host we ever had ,she was always there to help and answer questions ,she gave us tip's on things to do ,even tough we were a little too early for winter season ,we had a bunch of fun options to do everyday ,This cozy ,romantic cabin is on the middle of the woods on front to the Chena river , we used the fire pit by the river and took amazing pictures , they all look like postcards ,we saw the northern light for a brief moment ,and was worrh the trip ,but we want more ,we are coming back next year ,hoping this amazing cabin is available again cause ww fell in love with it ,Thank you Heather and Gary for an amazing time
I loved this location, it was beautiful by the river, great location to see the aurora lights, it was cozy and they have a perfect balcony for sunrise and sunset views!

Such a cozy cabin. It is right by the river so fishing was super convenient. Heather has everything you need from fully stocked kitchen, bathroom supplies and lots of blankets. The cabin was warm and the location was perfect. Will stay here again!

Umm, excuse me?? This place is AMAZING!! Forget the adorable, cozy, clean, has everything you need cabin... the yard, fire pits, and river accessibility are enough to book this cabin. We took multiple walks along the river each day and night. Its so quiet and peaceful, yet close enough to everything. Heather and Gary are quick to respond, super helpful and very sweet. Highly recommend and we will absolutely be back!
Beautiful view perfect little cabin! Had amazing neighbors next door! It’s a little piece of heaven! Can’t wait to visit again!
Beautiful and very clean place to stay!The views are amazing, plus you are right on the river!I highly recommend place in Fairbanks!

We landed in Fairbanks at midnight and the check-in was very easy. Its about a 20 min drive from the airport and the perfect place to see the Northern lights. We saw the northern lights on the day we landed right from our patio. The cabin had everything we could ask for: kitchen to bathroom and amazing wifi. It's closer to Chena Hot springs as well. Heather and Gary are very communicating as well. Will surely stay here the next time I come to Alaska. Highly Recommend the cabin and Thank you for making our stay wonderful!
Nice peaceful and quiet location 15-20 minutes out of town. Very clean, cozy, and homey.

Cozy log cabin with small but nicely stocked full kitchen. Loved the plush soft linens and the deck overlooking the river. Floor is a bit creaky but otherwise a delightful stay within 20 minutes of downtown Fairbanks. If you have your own vehicle it is a perfect stay, and way better than anything else you could get closer to town. Dee
Such a warm welcome, with very considerate advance check ins and recommendations. Cabin was cute and cozy! We loved staying here and would definitely stay again! Thank you, Heather and Gary!
One of the most beautiful places I have stayed
We attended a wedding and this place was much nicer and had more character than a hotel room
Awesome place to stay right on the river! Adorable and well stocked cabin! If we return to Alaska, we will be back!
A magic place.

The cabin is well stocked, clean, well decorated, and just overall adorable! You can walk out to the river and cast a couple lines with the fishing poles heather and Gary provided! Also there are several fire pits to sit next to and enjoy. Inside the cabin is a binder full of information about different things to do during your visit alongside a nice little balcony to drink your coffee and breathe in the Alaskan air!
Awesome location and very cozy stay.

This was an amazing stay! We came here to celebrate my 30th birthday and always looked forward to coming back home to the peaceful cabin. It is right off the river and the upstairs balcony was a perfect place to relax after a long day of hiking. 10/10 recommend. We want to come back sometime in the winter.
Perfect cabin for our vacation!! Everything we needed, perfectly clean!!

The Sourdough Cabin was just the perfect spot for a quiet weekend getaway. Everything you need to cook or grill up a nice meal and a great relaxing setup inside. We’ll always check availability here each visit to Fairbanks!
The cabin and location were perfect and more than I could’ve asked. Got to see a moose across the river the last night I stayed there. Would stay here again for sure
Super cozy and clean. Such beautiful surroundings! Heather and Gary were very accommodating! Highly recommend.
Cabin was beautiful, clean and immaculate and such care taken with grounds! Would highly recommend! Lovely Alaskan experience even though I’m from Alaska!
Extraordinary hospitality from fantastic hosts at a beautiful place by the river.
This place met all of our needs. It was clean, comfortable, and convenient. I hope to stay here if I come this way again.
The cabin was the perfect size for us. Will definitely rebook when we return.
Had a lovely couple of days here. Lots of thoughtful touches. I’d definitely stay here again.
nice cabin on the river and very clean
Great place to stay!
Nice and convenient cabin
Lovely cabin right on the river. Easy check in and full amenities. Hosts are very responsive. Sitting out on the top balcony having dinner was a treat. I would definitely stay there again 😊

This stay was perfect!Heather and Gary were so welcoming. The cabin is so cozy and quaint, right on the Chena River. It was warmer than normal, and without asking, they brought over a fan. Such accommodating hosts!

What an absolutely awesome, relaxing time we had in our cabin on the Chena! The listing is absolutely accurate, and you will not be disappointed if you book this spot! Gary and Heather are amazing hosts, and we will definitely stay at their place again on our next trip to Fairbanks.
I would definitely recommend a trip to Chena Hot Springs, and if you have enough time, Fountainhead Antique Auto Museum is amazing!

If you have the opportunity to stay here...do it!!! The location is amazing! We had paid for Aurora viewing tour and had no luck, Heather was extremely helpful and sent us links to get notified- on our last night here we were able to view the Northern lights right from our bedroom balcony...absolutely magical. Location is the perfect combination of seclusion yet close enough to restaurants. Couple of hours to drive out to Denali. Couple of hours drive to Castner Glacier and short drive to Chena Hot Springs. You cannot stay anywhere better than here!!! Hosts are amazing. Fast to communicate, Cabin has absolutely everything you will need and then some.... we will definitely come back in the near future! If you're undecided where to stay...seriously look no more and stay here!! I promise you'll leave with memories of a lifetime!

I cannot recommend this place enough! The property is absolutely beautiful, the cabin is so cute, comfortable and homey. I was able to get some photos of the northern lights right from their backyard! The hosts were super responsive and kind. Highly recommended!!

Excellent location for Aurora viewing away from the lights of Fairbanks. A few miles down the road you have a clearing on both sides of the road that provides the perfect setting for taking in the Northern Lights at night. Hands down the best experience and Aurora photos I’ve ever taken! Check it out for yourself…
Beautiful property and wonderfully managed! Thanks for creating a restful space for us to visit.
Heather has been super friendly. Would recommend!
Very beautiful cabin

Wow. This cabin and the hosts are amazing. The communication, location, amenities, scenery, trip tips and all made this experience unforgettable. 10 stars and would recommend for Alaska first timers like us! Till next time!
We enjoyed our stay at the cabin and exploring the outdoors! We were able to see the aurora for a couple nights during our stay which felt very magical here.

My husband and I had an amazing stay! Cabin is very cute and the location is perfect - dark skies, right next to the river and remote (but close to Fairbanks and North Pole). It’s well stocked and very clean. We got to do and see everything we had hoped for! Fairbanks in winter and especially this location is magical.
Heather is very responsive and helpful! It was a wonderful stay and we would definitely recommend it! Hope to visit soon in summer.

Heather and Gary are wonderful hosts and the cabin and location are fantastic. There is plenty of things to do around the area. The cabin was great. The location even better. Heather and Gary are really easy to contact and quickly answer any and all questions. We would highly recommend this location and this cabin.
Cabin was awesome, moose running around the yard 😍😍. Heather was super friendly, gave us local things to do even brought over some salmon for my boyfriend. Would definitely stay here again.

Loved everything about this place! The location was amazing and Heather and Gary could not have been more kind! They went out of their way to text us about moose in the yard and woke up at midnight to let us in when we got locked out. I wish I could have stayed there longer, and I will recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy get away to Fairbanks! My goal was to see the northern lights, and all I had to do was walk onto the balcony!

This log cabin is an amazing stay! It has beautiful views and river access of the frozen Chena river (I visited in winter, but I guess in summer the river access must be a great feature too). If Aurora viewing is your priority then this cabin serves a great spot given it’s location which is slightly away from the city lights. The Sourdough cabin is a cozy place for two with all necessities. Heather was great with her communication and sent detailed emails about the area and things to do. She was also kind enough to send us texts late at night as an Aurora alert so we don’t miss out on the light show. I highly recommend this place and would love to visit again on my next trip to Fairbanks.

The last thing you want is to be locked outside of cabin when the temperature is -5F. Thank you so much to Heather, she saved us at 1:30am, I felt so sorry to call her when we were locked outside if the cabin because ice got stuck in the door lock(welcome to Alaska!). Also, the cabin was great, warm and cozy, and we saw aurora right above the cabin

Heather and Gary were excellent communicators and made us feel like any problem we had would be solved as quickly as possible. The cabin was clean, very warm and a really fun way to explore Alaska for the first time. We would highly recommend this to anyone and we would also definitely return!
Seriously the BEST place to stay! Plus the BEST location! The sweetest people! 10/10 recommend. We loved it.
Wonderful little cabin that was conveniently located, yet offered the outdoorsy feeling of seclusion. Website description was accurate, communication was great, and the stay was amazing.

Heather and Gary's cabin was wonderful. Clean and beautifully designed for a cozy mountain-top vibe. Temps reached -42° while here so it was nice to have a nice warm spot to rest while not out and about. Hosts communicated well and were very accommodating! Can't wait to come back.
A cozy little place. The host was very helpful and shared detail instructions on how to find the place as well as things to do in Fairbanks.
Lovely warm cabin, will definitely come back!
The Sourdough is an amazing cabin! you won't be disappointed.

Terrific place to getaway in Fairbanks. Roughly 20mins from the main town - this is a lovely quiet place that is well equipped and perfect for two people to have some time in the wilderness.
Great communication from the hosts.
Thank you heather and Gary.
Awesome place, felt right at home :)
Great hidden gem!

This cabin is absolutely beautiful!! You will not regret staying here. The area that it’s in is stunning. River is right in front and trails to explore. Heather and Gary are great people!!! They communicate very well from beginning to end of your stay. I really loved it that they had it all nice and cozy smelling good as soon as we walked in !! Especially after a long trip and freezing temperatures outside. Definitely be back again !!!
Heather’s place is amazing, beautiful cabin, great scenery! You can just sit there and watch it snow outside the whole day. Highly recommend!

Really loved this unique stay. Devin was such a great hot and was very responsive. If I ever plan on coming back to Fairbanks this airbnb will be my go to!! It’s so sweet and has a warm and cozy feel to the place 🤍

The treehouse was a very cute and cozy place!! Loved seeing the “off grid” ways to make something like this work well. The water dispenser and the toilet- what a unique and pleasant way to give us amenities far in the trees!! It was fun to stay in the treehouse- certainly a first! Devin did a great job at providing all the details we needed for our stay!!April

This place was a great stay for my husband and I’s weekend getaway. It was tucked away and we easily forgot we were in Fairbanks. We really appreciated the robes for wearing to the bathhouse. Loved the hot tub(s) and sauna. The treehouse space was very clean, uniquely decorated, and had everything we needed. The bathhouse was a quick walk away and was also very clean! We’d stay here again for sure.
All good. I like it.
Super fun and unique stay!
it was great would go there again!
Wow! Such a fun, beautiful and relaxing space. Treehouse and bed were super comfortable. Very beautiful space and amenities! Thanks!
Amazing, cozy cabin with magical views. Equipped with everything you need and extras. Great host with quick communication.
Stay was great annd host was reslly responsive.
Pretty good, special experience, just not convenient for water and bathroom.
Highly recommend!!
We absolutely loved our stay. The treehouse is setup perfectly and had everything we needed.

My husband and I had a wonderful and unique time in the treehouse for our trip. It was perfect for our couple nights stay. We enjoyed the hot tub on one of of the evenings which was relaxing. I can’t say enough about the loft/bed area as it was the most comfortable bed we stayed in on our trip all together. Wish we could have stayed longer.
Had a wonderful time in the tree house was above and beyond our expectations!!!! Highly recommend staying there…

The treehouse was so cool. It looks like the photos, and the bed was very comfortable. Easy to find and parking near the place. Hot tub and sauna near the bathhouse were great. Devin was very communicative and easy to work with. The treehouse wasn’t a lot more than a Sheraton in Fairbanks so it was so much more worth the money to stay here.

Lovely little tree house, just as described. We were there during a brutal cold snap. -35 degrees at night. The place was toasty warm. Unfortunately, there were alot of lights at the site, not good for viewing Northern Lights, which were out. But, after all, this is in Fairbanks. All else was great and I would definitely go back again.
Great stay! Cozy and clean space.
Beautiful treehouse! Very cozy and felt safe! One heck of an experience to stay in a treehouse!

So cute! My friends & I absolutely loved staying in this cozy, modern, chic little tree house during our winter wonderland getaway in Fairbanks! The hot tub & sauna were the cherry on top! Will definitely recommend to all my friends and will stay at again when I return!

This was my first time ever traveling to Alaska and I am forever grateful for this wonderful Airbnb. Devin was our host and my goodness these treehouses is truly the most beautiful experience I’ve done thus far. It’s like fulfilling your inner child while having such an intimate and perfect winter vacation with your partner. I spent my birthday weekend here and I just loved every details about this treehouse. It was warm and had a sense of home as soon as you enter. I am definitely coming back with my partner. We truly had the best time experiencing all of Alaska while being cozy and comfortable at the end of the day.
THANK YOU SO MUCH ❤️❤️
We had a great stay at Fairbanks, thanks to the amazing AirBnB Tree House experience.

Beautiful Airbnb! Would love to stay again someday. It’s small and cozy! Instructions were clear and didn’t have any issues finding our treehouse. Also not too far from stores and restaurants! Again, Thank you for having us! :)

We loved our stay and will highly recommend to our friends and family. The treehouse was exactly as pictured, so cute and every detail was thought out and beautiful. I was a little concerned about the dry toilet when booking, but it was not a problem at all. Very easy to use and not smelly at all. Everything was very clean. The amenities were GREAT! We loved the sauna and luxurious bathhouse. Overall we really enjoyed our stay.
Really fun unique place to stay! Small but so cute! Definitely recommend for a stay in Fairbanks!
I stayed two nights in the grouse house and my expectations were over exceeded! The entire place is beautiful and the bathhouse is very pleasing. I didn’t want to leave! Would recommend to friends.

Such a beautiful, comfy, cozy treehouse 💗 loved every second of my stay and also the hot tub was the perfect way to relax and be warm while still enjoying the snowy weather! Thanks so much for sharing your place

The Grouse treehouse was absolutely amazing. The space is small but it worked fine with 2 of us, I would say no more than 3 people comfortably would be able to stay. The bed was comfortable, the place was clean. The place was heated and perfect, especially since outside ranged from -15° to -26° during our stay! The toilet was nice and instructions were easy to follow but we mostly used the bathhouse!
The hot tub and sauna was great the first night (especially since it was -15° outside!) the bathhouse was clean and easy to access if needed.
We loved the treehouse and would recommend to anyone visiting Fairbanks to see the northern lights!!

Our tree house stay was amazing. The hot tub and sauna were fabulous. The cozy down bed clothes were warm and comfortable. The tiny treehouse had everything we needed for a wonderful stay. If you want a different kind of experience, treat yourself to a treehouse.
Very cozy and it’s definitely a tree house. Not super big but the space is used very well.
Everything was amazing. One of the best places that I’ve stayed at through airbnb!

This property is super unique and fun! The tree houses are very well equipped with everything you'd expect in a unit plus more. They even provided some complimentary beverages on check in which was a nice gesture. There are two hot tubs and a sauna by the bathhouse as well as laundry and multiple nice restrooms inside the bathhouse. The dry toilet in the unit worked fine, essentially like a normal toilet. Don't be deterred by the lack of running water in the tree house, they provide a jug of water with a pump and it's really not an issue.
The staff are absolutely great. I got quite sick while we stayed here, they were super responsive and accommodating.
Very cute tree house, a great experience!

Our stay was something kinda different in a spectacular kinda way! The tree house was simply but tastefully decorated. The hot tub was a hit, even at -20. We enjoyed our stay and look forward to recommending this place to others.
Beautiful tree house, wonderful getaway spot! Will come again🥹💖
Amazing service & place.
It was a very beautiful stay and the host was very responsive and helpful throughout this experience.
The cutest little treehouse! Such a fun way to stay. The bath house was very nice as well. Hot tubs were great. Will be returning!
Very clean, very unique place! Comfortable bed and the complex was very nice.
Great spot to stay in Fairbanks. The tree house was cozy and cute. We enjoyed our stay!

It was a great experience to stay at the TreeHouse. The unite was super clean. Also the shared amenities was super clean as well.
I can not wait to visit again.
I highly recommend it.
Thanks Devin for a great Airbnb

Adorable tiny house but very dirty. The bucket under the sink was half full of used water upon our arrival. The floors were filthy. Both hot tubs had yellowish water and excessive dirt on the bottom. One hot tub did not heat above 85 and the other hot tub smelled really bad. Neither of the floating chlorinators had anything in them. The bathhouse is NOT as pristine as shown in the photos. The showers have typical brown water stains around that caulking but the water in the single sink bathroom came out brown and water in the double sink bathroom shot out of the under sink cabinet from a leak. And the bed in Grouse was soooo uncomfortable.

Had an absolutely fantastic stay in the tree house! Bed was extremely comfortable, toilet was easy to use, and the bathhouse was lovely. I even saw the Aurora both nights of my stay, right from my deck! I can’t wait to stay again!
Cute, fun stay. Plenty of privacy but also enjoyed the common amenities.

Fun place to stay -
Located in a nice spot, had to drive through industrial area but once you got there was a cool location! Very close to the airport. It’s not a in the woods area very much in the town.
Not huge fan of the shared bathrooms but we knew what we signed up for - can tell they definitely kept them cleaned and organized. Not prepared for the shower water, from a well system. It had a distinct smell too it but we used it and got over it.
Tree house was pretty cool! We where 2 adults and a 2 year old and we made it work! Awesome place for a couple to stay with no kids.
Dry toilet worked great, I was worried it would be an issue - no issues at all. No smells in the tree house etc.
Overall great experience, cool set up.
Amazing place. My first treehouse experience. The dream treehouse. You have to do it once in your life.
I never wanted to leave. It was a dream come true. This place made me feel like a kid with many little touches that made it super memorable. Thanks for the best part of our trip!
amazing place

Awesome fun atmosphere! Felt very welcoming. House equipped with everything we needed. Bathroom not great for privacy, but theres a spacious, clean, comfortable bathroom just a short quick walk. The hot tub was great!

Great Stay, Devin was quick with any little needs we had. Certainly quiet and off the beaten path, but only minutes from downtown. Bath house was built to the very highest standards. Great stay, will be back if ever we need a place in Fairbanks. THANK YOU Devin!
A very cool Airbnb experience with extremely updated and new facilities. A memorable stay. I recommend to anyone!
Excellent place. Highly recommended

What an amazing getaway hidden in downtown Fairbanks. We loved the uniqueness and finish work of the tree house. So relaxing and just what was needed with a one month baby at home - great escape just minutes from home. Lots of restaurant choices nearby. Living in Fairbanks and no idea it was here! Fun for guests too!

Devins treehouse made me feel like a kid in a very bougie tree fort. With a bridge that announces visitors ascending the treehouse and a quiet little barrel sauna with a serene view you will feel like royalty. Do yourself a favor and get away for a night to the treehouse right in Aurora Subdivision!
Cute idea, was hoping it would be a little larger. Bathhouse was nice, hot tub was nice as well. Wasn’t a fan of the dry flush toilet.
Fantastic little quirky space. Clean with lots of supplies. Clear instructions for the property. Would return!
Super cute and well designed cabin. Definitely worth staying
Very small! Definitely tight if you bring a lot of luggage but overall the host was very responsive and the place was exactly like the pictures. Super cute and she had everything we needed!!
Definitely a unique experience living in such a tree house!
Had a great couples get away in the Grouse treehouse! Cute, memorable, clean. Great host that even messaged us when he heard the northern lights were out! Exceeded expectations 👍🏻 thank you so much!
My wife and I stayed two nights, the place had everything and more for our stay.

Awesome tiny/three house.
Great location, fun amenities!
Devin has a wonderful spot. I loved sitting in the hot tub and exploring Fairbanks.
Awesome place! Highly recommend the tree house to anyone!

Wonder experience, and first treehouse stay for us both. Very unique and cozy. Bathhouse and amenities were wonderful. They have a great thing going here, though I wish it was more remote or had better views.
Great experience, very clean and accommodating, I would love to stay again, and will recommend to others.

This place is magical. What could be better than sleeping in a treehouse? There is no attached bathroom but it's a short walk to really nice facilities. The space is small but we'll organized and cozy. I can't see putting more than two people in it but there are two houses that are connected via a bridge and common area if you're a party of four.
The minor ding is that the area around the location feels a little industrial but then all if Fairbanks felt that way to me. I absolutely hope to come back.

The Grouse Treehouse is an amazing place to stay. You get a nice Alaska dry cabin "glamping" feel but with the bonus of luxury showers and hot tubs! With a lake nearby and friendly neighbors, this is an excellent way to spend your time in Alaska.
The tree house was an awsome experience, definitely a must try.

Great place to stay while in the Fairbanks area. The description and photos were accurate to the actual lodging. The accommodations where clean and comfortable, while being well stocked with basic items. The complimentary beverages and snacks where a nice touch. This is a place I would stay again and recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay. Devin is a fantastic communicator and a great host. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. You won't regret staying here!

Such a cute little tree house! We loved the views from the deck and the indoor swing seat. There were a few things that took some getting used to like the fact that the sink does not have any running water, so you use a water jug with a pump to wash your hands or to wash dishes, and they run out of water pretty fast and you have to go down the stairs to a different building to get refills, but we managed and tried to avoid dishes. We really loved the hot tub and the fact that the bath house with the showers is right next to it. It was also nice that robes were provided. The tree house does have a toilet, but you can only use it a certain amount before you get charged more, so we had to walk down the stairs and to a different building every time we needed to use the restroom, but the bathrooms in the other building were very nice! That’s also where you go to do laundry and the washers and dryers are very nice. Overall we had a great time!
A very neat experience with a very central location. The place and facilities were all very clean and the hot tub was always nice to use at the end of the day.

If I could give this place 10 stars I would! Truly everything about it from location to the actual treehouses was such an amazing experience! Devin was a great host who was very informative and helpful with everything and really made our stay wonderful! We would love to come back and stay again!

What a unique treehouse experience. Steps to the loft would be a little steep for someone with knee problems or the elderly. There is no running water but they had a gallon jug with a pump and we managed just fine. I cooked breakfast every morning and it was not a problem. Expect a quiet, serene stay. The bed and pillow were so comfortable. The sofa bed was a little small, but we managed fine. Sitting outside on the deck, especially in the morning and late at night was so relaxing. All in all a great experience. Devin was a wonderfully responsive host. We had absolutely no problems at all. Really enjoyed it.
Cute little treehouses, very clean, very nice snacks and finishes. I didn't realize how small they were so certainly read all the information that they list in reference to their property.
Really appreciate the quiet location. Easy to communicate Theodora. The stay went very smoothly.
Enjoyed staying here, beautiful surroundings and very peaceful!
Definately a beautiful place if you want some peaceful surroundings 😊
Great secluded location to see the northern lights
Perfect start to our Alaskan adventure. Cozy cabin surrounded by a picturesque forest.
We loved this house. Cozy, good location and peaceful. Saw northern lights from deck. Would stay here again.
This was a quiet, comfortable home in the perfect location for viewing the northern lights from the porch! We had a great stay.

The home was secluded and extremely cozy. Theodora let us check in early and was very responsive. We woke up around 1:30am to see the northern lights outside and were able to capture them through our phones. We will definitely stay again!

Absolutely perfect. Booked (and stayed) for a quick weekend trip and it was everything we were hoping and more. Everything was great, instructions were clear, and the flexible (self) check-in and check-out was perfect with our late arrival and early departure. The house was incredibly clean, the neighborhood was extremely quietly and peaceful, and our host even had the drive/entry cleared of snow before we came which was so thoughtful and I really appreciated that detail that I'm sure goes unnoticed.
As we traveled home we already started to discuss plans to come back in the future and we will only stay at one place (here!). Thank you very much, Theodora and family, for sharing your beautiful home with us!
Great house in a very convenient location! We were able to catch the northern lights just 15 minutes out from the house. It was a very beautiful experience and a pleasant stay. Thank you!
Will be visiting again.

This is such a charming Airbnb surrounded by picturesque woods. It is a beautiful and secluded retreat, offering tranquility and privacy. Great stay!
Beautiful house in a great location.

Perfect if you are looking for a location that is quiet and away from the city lights.

Staying in this cabin was an amazing experience, my only regret is that we didn't stay longer than 2 nights. The space is very well appointed and very cozy and clean. The drive to town is only 15 minutes, where you can find some good eats if you don't feel like cooking - you have the best of both worlds if you are looking for some serenity, but are close enough to other amenities that Fairbanks has to offer. Jordann and Jeff are amazing hosts, very responsive and kind. I def plan to come back and recommend this cabin without any hesitation. This is a great place!

I absolutely loved staying at Jordann's cabin. It was a little getaway while my oldest son played soccer games. The cabin was immaculate, with such amazing little touches. You can tell thought was put into every detail. The covered wrap around deck was perfect for sipping coffee in the morning. It wasn't too far from Fairbanks so going shopping didn't take long. I will definitely be back if I need to stay in Fairbanks again! Thank you Jordann!
Can you give six stars?!
Beautiful place loved our stay!

What a wonderful place to stay! Very clean, comfortable, and spacious. Loved the location; just far enough out of town to be private and quiet, but close enough that it's a very easy drive into Fairbanks. Had all the amenities of home and sure beats staying in an overpriced gross hotel. Host was super responsive and gave clear instructions. Absolutely loved staying here and would definitely stay again!

Thank you for sharing your beautiful home with us. I really enjoyed the deep tub which was perfect to soak in and warm up after long nights of watching the aurora borealis! The home was spotless and well stocked with all the necessities. Jordann was a wonderful host. I highly recommend her home!

Jordann was a really top host! Always aware of everything we need. We found the place even better than what we saw on the pictures. The location is perfect if you want to have a quite time. We were in Fairbanks to chase northern lights, so the location was ideal for us, near to some of the places they reccomend to see them. Also within the house we found magazines and information with tips to chase them that were really helpful, we actually were able to see them 2 nights in a row!!The house has everything you need; really brand new and cozy. We hope to come back for spending more time and also visit in summer season.

I really enjoyed my stay at Jordann’s cabin for my aurora viewing trip, it exceeded all my expectations. The place is very clean and everything feels like new. It’s situated on a large private lot surrounded by birch and spruce trees, only 10 minutes drive to town if you need to. It’s conveniently located to drive to popular aurora viewing locations outside of town such as Cleary summit, Chena Hot Springs, Chena lake recreation area in North Pole, etc. Jordann is very responsive and considerate. Highly recommend this cabin if you’re planning a trip to Fairbanks.

Even though my travel was for work, it was great to have this space to return to every evening. This was my second stay in this location with this host and it was great. I will be looking to book this location as it's available since I travel to this location frequently. Thank you very much for the clean, peaceful, well equipped and furnished place.

The place is wonderful. Appears that they just built it and they really did an amazing job. New appliances, furniture, bedding. Really nicely done. Makes you feel like you are at your own home. Jordann and Jeffrey are super nice and helpful. They gave us some info that was very useful and she actually bought deck furniture while we were there and put them out so we could sit on the deck and relax. I wish all AirBnB hosts were like these folks. They will be Super Hosts in no time. We would absolutely stay here again if we come back to Fairbanks. It’s maybe 15-18 minutes into Fairbanks on a main road. No issues at all running back and forth. They also have a huge property surrounded by woods. Loved it
We had a wonderful time at this Bnb and will book again. The communication and information provided was the best I have received so far.
I loved the place, slept comfortably and good.
Great place, clean, private area. updated and modern appliances throughout.
This property is well cared for and spacious. Very peaceful and only a short drive to anything you need or want. The host is very friendly.

This is a unique home in Fairbanks—it is very groovy! Our large family—from the kids to grandma—stayed here. It was centrally located. Our only hiccup was that it didn't have air conditioning, but that was my fault... I didn't realize that most homes in AK likely don't have it as it's likely only utilized a few times a year... but we stayed at the beginning of the summer months. We like sleeping in the cold. There were box fans, which helped immensely! :)
Otherwise, it is a nice and unique setting!
Awesome mid-century home with a beautiful space, hot tub, and viewing area!
Very unique and cozy place. Plenty of room for the whole family! Even Grandma and Grandpa! We will be back! Thank you!
Awesome place! Would definitely stay again when we are in Fairbanks.
Eric was a great host, anything that we needed help with he was quick to respond and help.
Very unique home! Definitely an interesting place to stay with my friends. Appreciate the art and dedication of the host to set up their home like this :)

This house was an amazing find. Close to everything in Fairbanks while still feeling private. Our kids especially loved the game room and hot tub. If anyone is looking for a unique house where you are sure to make memories, this is the house!

Beautiful Airbnb - just as shown in the photos! The hosts were also great - incredibly responsive to our questions and provided many recommendations of activities and restaurants to explore in and around Fairbanks. Would definitely stay here again if we are ever in the area!
My family and I really enjoyed our time there. This place made our vacation to Alaska magical highly recommend and can't wait to go back again. Thank you.
Great place, perfect for our family. Eric had great communication.

The house was perfect for our combo adventure/kickback vacation. He communicated directly on access and house details so we relaxed immediately. When we weren’t out and about, we played records, puzzled, and had video game battles! The kitchen was small but had everything we needed for 6 adults.

This was a great place for our family of 5- 2 adults and 3 teenagers - everyone had their own space but also had community stews to hang out together as well. The game room was a huge hit! Especially w the old school games. I’m not sure who loved it more- the kids or my husband!
The hot tub and dome outside was a fun touch.
Eric was really responsive and very accommodating!
Location was close enough to everything but felt pretty private. Would stay here again if we were ever back in Fairbanks.
Great vacation home! We had great time enjoying home, including jacuzzi. Highly recommend for larger groups.
Great property and host. Very helpful and responsive with answering questions and suggesting activities and shopping.

Star Base was the perfect place for our crew to gather and celebrate! This Fairbanks homestead was perfectly situated between town, the University of Alaska, and the airport. It felt just removed enough from downtown but close enough to civilization to not feel too isolated. Viewing the Northern Lights from the hot tub in the backyard was a core memory for my children and I know this wouldn't have been possible at any other rental in Fairbanks. Grateful to the Star Base command center for keeping the place ship shape and our crew well informed throughout our stay!
Loved staying at Starbase! The hot tub on a cold night in the snow was bucket list worthy!

Eric (and Sarah) was genuinely a great host. From the initial communication to taking care of a few little issues upon arrival. We were happy with the house and enjoyed the fireplace tremendously! We did arrive a few minutes early and hadn't read in the messages that early check in required that we contact them, but once we did, they were able to set the entry time to earlier so we could get in. We really were impressed with their responsiveness (timely and helpful) and desire to provide the best possible stay to their guests. Beds in and under the loft near the kitchen were really comfortable! The dome was cute, but we didn't use it because it was so cold out. We also didn't use the gaming room, but if you are into that it would be really cool! We did use the grill which worked great! House was stocked with all the necessary items. the location was near town, but felt very private and in the woods. Eric was very helpful in recommending local spots and tours too! Fun place!1
Very cool place. Super vibey. Solid kitchen and a lot of things to cook with. Great hot tub. Only complaint is the bed sheets were so bad. Stiff and hard.

We had a nice stay at the house, despite some hiccups at the beginning. Eric was extremely responsive and helpful and made sure to do what he could to help rectify the situation. The beds were relatively comfortable and the house was well stocked with dishes, utensils, etc. Unfortunately, the dome door was broken and completely unusable, which we were not made aware of prior to our stay. Additionally, the hot tub chemicals were off; the hot tub smelled and the water was murky. Eric was able to send a cleaner out our first night to fix it, but we didn’t feel comfortable using it the rest of the weekend. Location is good, about 15-20 minutes to anywhere we wanted to go in town. Overall we had a nice stay and were lucky enough to see the northern lights!

February 9 to 17, 2024
Thank you, Captain Eric and the Star Base team, for such a wonderful stay! Your hospitality made our journey truly unforgettable. We appreciate the attention to detail and the warm welcome. We are eagerly looking forward to our next adventure with you.
During our stay, we had the pleasure of witnessing the stunning aurora from the backyard – truly amazing! Celebrating Valentine's Day with my family amidst such a beautiful setting was an experience we will cherish forever.
Thank you, Eric, Ellen, and Sarah, for this special vacation.
The BRUNI family
P.S. We couldn't resist mentioning that we also enjoyed listening to the Beatles during our stay!

We had a wonderful stay at the Star Base! We loved the mid century modern feel. Our favorite part of the stay was the hot tub, which we enjoyed every night and had a great view of the sky. It was a very private location but close driving distance to great local restaurants and activities. Eric was a fantastic host and quick to respond with any questions we had. We highly recommend!!!

This was SUCH a fun stay! The house was beautiful and quirky and incredibly fun. We loved the game room of course, but also loved all the other board games, puzzles and books. All the details and decorations made it an immersive retro experience that we really enjoyed. Finally, our host was incredible and communicative and helpful. If you stay, make sure you read the old newspaper article about the original couple who built the house in the 1960s, it’s in the back of the guidebook. Also, the hot tub was still hot and delightful at -45.
Clean and fun space. Cabin vibes

We had a great time in Fairbanks! The house was very clean and cozy. We loved the decor and it was the perfect place to come back to warm up in the cold weather. The beds were comfy and we all slept super well.
Eric was extremely responsive during our stay. He typically responded within a couple minutes and was proactive in helping up solve any problems and answer our questions.
We had a great time and would definitely stay here again if we return to Fairbanks.

I don't think I can find the right words to describe how magical our trip was. Mt husband and I have fallen madly in love with Fairbanks, and Eric's home played a huge roll in that. The home and its surroundings are absolutely breathtaking. Everything was extremely clean, and our hosts were phenomenal. We had zero issues with the place, but Eric would still check in regardless to make sure everything was going smoothly. We enjoyed the jacuzzi every night, went snowmobiling, dog mushing, and even got to witness the aurora!! We couldn't be happier with the location of Eric's home. This will definitely not be the last time we stop by.

One of the best stays I have had. Eric was such an amazing host, always got back with prompt responses and made sure we were comfortable at the airbnb from time to time.
The house is so beautiful and cozy. Made us feel at home with all the exciting stuff like arcade games the sauna and board games. We felt safe at the accommodation. The washrooms were super clean. Overall a very well maintained house. Highly recommend this place. 💯
10/10 recommend. Surrounding area is nice and quiet
This is such a great place that I will definitely recommend it to my friends who are planning to visit Fairbanks
Great place and great host. Eric and Sarah responded quickly and helped us solve the problem within half an hour.

The house is unique, the surroundings are breathtaking, and the fireplace and hot tub set off the -22° day nicely.
It is conveniently located to the many shops and restaurants Fairbanks has to offer.
Being from the south, it was nice they anticipated things we would need, like a place to plug in the cars engine heater.
KEURIG pods provided really was a nice touch since we arrived late and did not get to stop for coffee.
There is room for plenty of folks. We slept in the upstairs loft, plenty of privacy and toasty warm. At first the beds seemed extremely firm, but we quickly realized that they were really comfortable.
The bathrooms must be recently remodeled, it seemed they had heated floors. Lots of nic3 fluffy towels and extra pillows.
We are a group of retired folks and there are some stairs. We were extremely cautious on the steps into the living room.
Overall, a very good value and if I ever trek to the last frontier again, I would stay here.
Totally would come and also recommend
Best Airbnb in Fairbanks, super cozy! How tub is amazing, especially with the view! And the host is super nice and always response so quick!
Very nice place too stay would highly recommend too anyone worth every penny I paid

Deanna is the best host, most friendly & most accommodating person I have ever met. She was very responsive even when planning our trip, she shared & helped us to recommend best places to go/visit & restaurants.
We are traveling with our 9 & 7 year olds & they loved spending time with her cute horses & newest addition, little horse Phoebe. She left carrots in our fridge to feed the horses… For our last evening she prepared a beautiful fire outside with S’mores. Kids absolutely loved it & loved her! Even though we didn’t cook there, the kitchen is fully equipped, there’s wonderful local coffee, water in the fridge, etc… everything is there & the cabin is beautifully decorated. You feel right at home & wanting to stay longer & definitely come back!
Thank you Deanna, you made our Fairbanks/North Pole experience more than worth while! Thank you 🥰
Family Van Broekoven (from Belgium/Switzerland)

Deanna was the best AirBnB host we’ve ever had! Her place is beautiful and charming. She welcomed us with warm hugs and a warm freshly baked banana bread! I must add, she’s a great baker! She made this trip so special for us for helping me organize a small surprise birthday party for my husband. She baked his cake herself! It was very special and her loc recommendations are bang on! Definitely worth a visit!! And if you visit Fairbanks, Deanna’s place is where you have to stay if you want a cozy comfy home away from home!

This property has so much character and perfect for our main reason to visit-to see the Northern lights. First off, when we booked the property, Deanna reached out to give us important information before we even started to plan our trip. She was very responsive. On our first day, we were welcomed with homemade fresh baked banana bread and it was delicious!! My 8yo enjoyed feeding the horses on the property with the carrots Deanna provided. She also invited us on our first night to a fire in the back of the property as we sat out to watch for the Northern Lights. The beds are comfy, the kitchen is well stocked, and we could even view the auroras from indoors through the big windows. We highly recommend staying here for anyone who is looking for a hospitable host and want to explore Fairbanks and it's surrounding areas. Thank you Deanna!!!
Best host ever!! Dianna is very friendly and kind. Her place is clean and comfortable. Can not wait to come back again 😊

We cannot say enough great things about Deanna and her property! The place is beautiful, inside and out! It is built and situated so that you can see the Northern Lights right from your bed! The cabin was clean , and stocked with lots of amenities, and plenty of extra goodies! She goes above and beyond any other host to make you feel welcome and comfortable..including some homemade goodies; and a campfire with all the fixings for s’mores! From my very first inquiry, Deanna answered LOTS of questions and gave us so so many ideas for activities and eateries; and all the advice of a lifelong Alaskan. We left planning our next visit, and to stay in touch with someone we will now call our forever FRIEND! Can’t wait to go back in the summer to experience the lake that’s right outside the cabin and canoe and kayak! If you’re considering visiting Alaska, think no more, and book this Airbnb cabin now! You won’t be disappointed!

What a beautiful place to stay! You can’t beat the view from the cabin! I loved staying in the loft, being able to look out the window while laying in bed was amazing. I even set up my camera and was able to capture the northern lights and a moose! We will be visiting again soon!
Thank you Deanna for everything. Can’t wait to hang out more next time.

As our week long stay comes to an end, I find myself emotional about leaving. We’ve fallen in love with Deanna and Alaska. Deanna is by far the most attentive in all her details. She has a genuine interest and willingness to ensure your best stay. This vacation has by far exceeded any of our Air BnB experience’s. Her Raven themed cabin is cozy and welcoming. The big picture windows in the cabin provide the most serene setting for looking out to the lake. We did not have to want for anything during our stay. We definitely desire to be a repeat guest, maybe for the Summer Solstice next! We highly recommend staying here for anyone visiting Alaska. If we could rate it 10/10, we’d give it an 11!

Deanna loves being an AirBNB host and her passion is evident in everything she does. As a Fairbanks local she can guide you to whatever your interests are: sightseeing, restaurants, tours, etc. We loved the cabin and the raven themed artwork throughout. We saw the aurora 2 nights, and thankfully Deanna alerted us one time when the lights started really late. The cabin also has a beautiful view with regular moose sightings! This is the only place we will stay in Fairbanks. AirBNB is lucky to have hosts like Deanna!

Where do I begin? Let me first say that my husband and I are AVID Airbnb users. None have compared to Deanna as a host. The whole cabin is so incredibly cozy, beautifully designed, feels like a big warm hug. Honestly, it’s a reflection of Deanna! The minute we walked in the door we were greeted with the scent of her freshly baked chocolate chip banana bread. We spent so many nights by the fire sharing laughs, stories, and wonderful conversation. She even brought out a table and we got to make s’mores! Her knowledge, recommendations, attention to detail, and kindness made this trip unforgettable. Deanna became a friend by the end of this trip. We were so sad to leave! But we will definitely be back :)

If you think the picture of this place is beautiful, the actual place is even better. I have never seen a place with such characters. Its location is very peaceful and private. Parking is easy to get in and out. This place is full of amenities, you will think you have over-packed. Deanna is the most wonderful host and person I have ever met. She is very knowledgeable and helpful. She is a Fairbanks' local, so she can give excellent recommendations. There is no doubt if I ever in Fairbanks in the future, I would stay here again. This place made my vacation unforgettable. Thank you for everything, Deanna!!

Words cannot explain the most wonderful experience my husband and I had at our stay with Deanna at Camp Curvy Birch. We chatted so much before we even got there, I felt like we had known her for years and when we arrived we greeted each other with a smile and hug! There's nothing Deanna wouldn't do to make sure we had a wonderful stay and a great time. Her place is beautiful inside and out. The house has these magnificent windows that allow you to rest in the evening with the beautiful sunrises and sunsets, then relaxing and looking out over the property with the horses. Then at night you can look out for the Aurora, all while in the comfort of the beautiful place that Deanna has created to be the most awesome, lovely, comfortable place to be in the North Pole. If you want to do something or go somewhere, she knows the best places and will make sure it's what you want. The house had everything you needed and more! The house and scenery are absolutely breathtaking!

Deanna is the best host ever! Upon booking, she reached out with a guide of activities and restaurants that made our planning so easy! The cabin is one of the most beautiful I have seen, so cozy and surrounded by the most magical landscape. Deanna welcomed us with a delicious chocolate chip bread, still warm from the oven and we loved hearing her stories about the place and the horses. The place has everything we needed, and Deanna made us feel home immediately. Throughout our stay, Deanna made recommendations for restaurants based on our itinerary.
I will definitely recommend this stay to our friends and to anyone who is considering to visit Alaska! Thanks Deanna for these days, we will never forget North Pole, your cabin, the northern lights and this magical experience! 🩷

Had an amazing place to stay. Very comfortable and enjoying experience and surroundings. Deanna was a very humble and accommodating hostess. Very friendly and willing to help you find things to do while you’re staying with her. Will be coming back!

This place was wonderful, Deanna was on top of everything and duper nice. The place is close to great places to see and waking up in the morning to the beautiful snowy lake and horses was magical. Can’t wait to ckme back!

Deanna's place is very nice and well-provisioned. Our stay was during an incredible cold snap and Deanna went out of her way to make sure that we were taken care of. This is a lovely location adjacent to a pond and we were lucky enough to see a moose nearby and the aurora borealis right through the window.

We had a wonderful week at Deanna's cabin. The location and home were beautiful, and everything inside was new/well-maintained and homey. We came for the northern lights (3/7 nights) which came with cold weather (-30s throughout the week), but the cabin was nice and warm, and Deanna's freshly baked banana bread certainly helped out. She was an amazingly thoughtful host, and we'd love to come back and see the area during the summer months.
Cannot recommend this place enough!

Being that this was my dream trip…booking with Deanna definitely made it extra special. She was so sweet and full of knowledge about Alaska. She gave me suggestions on food places as well as who was good to book our rental car from, and every activity we did. She literally gives you the best of the best. The cabin was cozy and felt like home away from home. Anything that we could have needed was there! And a perk was feeding the horses carrots!! Highly highly highly recommend Deanna and Camp Curvy Birch

A really exceptional experience! Host is super friendly and responsive! And the whole cabin is clean and comfortable. The interior exactly matches with the pictures. Definitely will come back in summertime and highly recommended!

Our family had a wonderful experience. She was very helpful with fabulous local restaurants and local attractions. Even though we were there for Christmas she knew what was open for the holidays . We had to do no searching. Definitely would stay again.

This Airbnb experience has truly been the most exceptional one I’ve ever had!
Deanna is an incredibly warm host who not only welcomed us warmly but also shared so much about what makes Fairbanks so special.
During our stay, Deanna went above and beyond by surprising us with a delectable chocolate cake that melted our heart, making us feel truly cherished. Her attention to detail and thoughtfulness added to the incredibly unforgettable travel experience.
The accommodation itself was an art piece—outstanding—elegant, cozy, clean, comfortable, and equipped with everything we needed and beyond. Its convenient location made it easy to explore the many interesting attractions and activities nearby.
Deanna’s Airbnb has etched indelible memories in our hearts, and I wholeheartedly recommend this place to anyone planning a visit to Fairbanks. Thank you, Deanna, for the exceptional experience!

Wow! What an amazing day at Deanna’s cabin. The area is secluded, and quite peaceful. We had the pleasure of meeting Deanna while on our trip, and she was very friendly and made us feel right at home! We also had fun feeding Denali, Pirate, and Rebel. Definitely would recommend this cozy cabin to stay at, and Deanna will give you tons of recommendations even before your stay! (Which was a lifesaver).

This is the most beautiful cabin for a cozy winter getaway. Deanna is by far the best host we’ve ever met and gave us a really special week in Alaska.
When we arrived at a very late hour, there was the most delicious warm loaf waiting for us in the cabin (I don’t know how this was pulled off!) and the cabin smelled amazing.
Deanna provided us with a wealth of local knowledge and recommendations, all of which were just perfect for us.
The property is stunning! From watching the northern lights to feeding the horses, it was just the most incredible time.
The cabin has beautiful views of the lake and night sky. It has everything you’ll need and feels like a home. It’s obvious this is also a passion project.
Staying here is way more than just a place to stay. Deanna made it an experience we’ll never forget.

Deanna is a wonderful host with a beautiful place. Her recommendations for nearby places and things to do were spot on. The place was exactly as described and we had an amazing stay. I will definitely be coming back in the summer months. Highly recommended.

When you book at Camp Curvy Birch, you get an incredible host, a beautiful, isolated cabin, and s'mores by the fire on a lake! We could not have found a better location to spend our three days in Fairbanks!
Our nights were quiet, and we always felt well-rested. Although the cabin *is* by a road, there is a treeline between the two, and the road itself is very lightly traveled.

The cabin was well stocked with everything we could have possibly needed, and Deanna was always very responsive. She gave us wonderful recommendations for everything from rental cars to dog sledding adventures to local businesses/coffee shops and diners.
We absolutely loved Camp Curvy Birch and highly recommend it!

Deanna is an incredible person, she will make your trip easy and unforgettable, she does her best to make you feel at home. I will always be grateful to her. This trip changed my life and all my wishes were fulfilled thanks to her. God bless you always Deanna I will never forget this trip.
It is the best decision to enjoy your vacation here, I will return soon!
Thanks for everything!!

We enjoyed the fact that the location was remote with easy access to amenities. Deanna thought of everything from needs to kitchen to bedding to laundry. She was extremely helpful in making sure we got to see the aura borealis. Deanna was extremely knowledgeable about all local services. She is a great communicator and she has great stories. And she truly cares about her guests. We are already thinking about coming back. THANK YOU DEANNA YOU ARE A ROCKSTAR!!

I couldn’t even begin to express how happy we were to stay with Deanna. Everything an AirBnB should be. To add the cherry on top, our host Deanna was the best you could hope for. A local, she knows all the best spots and her recommendations were right on. She made our stay one to remember and if I ever make my way to Fairbanks again I would make it a point to stop and say hello. This experience was a total package that is rare to find, I couldn’t imagine anything more we could have wanted.

We had a great, relaxing stay at Deanna’s place! She is a wonderful host who truly cares about the wellbeing of her guests and is very thoughtful about helping visitors get the best experiences from their stay. Really well thought out little cabin. Nice view of the host’s lake and everything was very comfortable. So sweet and nice.

If you're looking for a beautiful place to stay with a host who goes above and beyond, we HIGHLY recommend this Airbnb!

What a great experience. As locals to Alaska, we travel a lot to Fairbanks. This spot was by far one of the best stays we’ve had. Super clean, fresh baked goodies, and well stocked. The host is a great human and I’m pretty sure we’d be great friends if we lived closer!
We will book again asap.

Deanna was very friendly, she had our check in ready with a fresh loaf of banana bread and was very responsive and available! Her home is right on the property, while it is private from the neighbors, and the view and horses are lovely.

I have nothing but positive things to say about our stay here! Not only was Deanna’s cabin clean absolutely BEAUTIFUL and in a GORGEOUS location but she could not have been a better host! If you’re going to Alaska make it a priority to stop at camp curvy birch and stay with Deanna I promise you won’t regret it! Thank you for everything and making us feel at home! I know we will be back!

Deanna and her lovely cabin was such a highlight to our Alaska adventure! She was such an amazing host and was so welcoming to us (& with some homemade warm banana bread), which was a delightful touch. This place was the best ever place we stayed in our 8 days of Alaskan trip. I was so happy about this place as this place is in exact right place for seeing a northern lights and also few places to visit in Fairbanks and Chena.

Would definitely recommend this stay. And we already miss Deanna and her Cabin.

Can’t say enough good things about Deanna’s place! We got in pretty late the first night but it was still easy to navigate and the second I walked in I said I didn’t want to leave.
The cabin / house is adorable. I stayed up in the loft with no challenges and the bed was super comfortable.

Deanna is super responsive and helpful for even the smallest questions. 10/10 would recommend and can’t wait to go back!
The place was sensational. We felt extremely comfortable 😊

I would have given Deana 100 stars, if I could have. Not only was her cabin unique, artsy, and welcoming, but it was in a beautiful setting on a private lake with kayaks and horses.
