This Airbnb is great! Deanna is a wonderful host. The banana bread lived up to all the expectations.

Deanna’s place is unlike any other! The property is so serene and beautiful. We loved waking up and looking out and the lake and listening to the birds. The cabin is immaculate with extra “touches” everywhere. We walked in to smell freshly baked bread waiting for us! Deanna was always super helpful and offered excellent suggestions including restaurants, activities, and shops. Kayaks were always ready by the lake if we wanted to take them out. There is also a fire pit….we just ran out of time to use it. Book this property! You will love staying here!

I can’t recommend this stay enough, this airbnb was by far one of the best places I have ever stayed at! The location was absolutely stunning! There were horses you can feed within a few feet of your stay and a lake where you can relax while taking in the beautiful views on your kayack. This was such a peaceful place to be, Deanna was so kind and helpful! She gave me recommendations on where to eat and visit and she ensured that I was comfortable during my whole stay! The bnb itself was very cozy and comfortable and absolutely stunning with everything you need at your disposal. To say the least, I have no complaints at all. Deanna was so welcoming and passionate about what she does I will definitely be visiting again!

The lovingly designed cabin by the lake is a good starting point to explore the surrounding area. It is worth a hike to the nearby forests (Chena River) or to the brewery in Fairbanks. Many moose in the area, beavers live in the lake and the kayaks invite you to cruise on the lake. Everything is perfectly equipped and Deanne provided us daily not only with good info about the area and restaurants, but was also a pleasure to talk with her. Must be a dream in the colder months with northern lights!

What can say....Deanna is the most impeccable host in the most beautiful, idyllic Alaskan oasis. Do not let the size listed be a deterrent....the high angled ceiling and thoughtful placement of things make the space seem way bigger! Everything was perfect, from the easy communication and great local recommendations, to the freshly baked bread at check in, s'mores at the fire, taking my 2 kids (9 & 13) out on the lake to see the beavers in kayaks, the amazing horses (okay, Pirate is a teenage brat!), and the gorgeous property, this ranks as my top Air BnB I have stayed in. The place is FULLY stocked to cook, very clean space, and unreal views. Cannot wait for a repeat winter trip!!

I don’t even know where to start. I never leave reviews because I never know if people read them. This time is different. Different because when something good happens you need to write about it. THIS WAS THE BEST EXPERIENCE EVER! Deanna was the kindest host—from warm homemade banana bread, lovely cozy accommodations to her care for her property and the people (us, especially my two young kids!) who stay in it—made this a place we will come back to again and again. If there was a hall of fame for hosts, she would be a first ballot hall of famer!

Deanna’s place was just perfect for our family of four. The guest house is beautifully decorated and so homey! Deanna was a gem. We had such a wonderful time interacting with her and our kids felt right at home. They fed the horses and kayaked in the lake. We can’t wait to come back.
This place made my trip ❤️❤️❤️
Beautiful and serene

The Airbnb (camp curvy birch) far exceeded all of our expectations! The listing was exceptional to start and imagine topping that - which it clearly did!! So amazed! The host Deanna was the best of the best hosts we have ever had! She was very friendly, helpful and fun through your stay! Great Lake to kayak and sit beside fireside. What a grand stay!

This cabin was absolutely beautiful and well worth the drive from Anchorage! It was clean, modern but with a cozy feel, had a beautiful lakefront, a fire waiting for us when we arrived and the cutest horses! We had fresh baked banana chocolate chip bread (absolutely delicious, I need to try to replicate it!), an abundance of carrots to feed the horses and pet them, there were kayaks set out and it wasn't a hassle to find some good resteraunts close by. Chena was also very close which was a big plus! I had reserved when she had one night slots available and despite that not being the norm for her she graciously let us stay and went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and comfortable in her gorgeous space. I will definitely have to come again whenever I visit Fairbanks/North Pole. I highly recommend!
Deanna is an amazing host that will go out of your way to have a memorable Alaskan vacation. Will have the fire pit and kayak available if asked

Deanna was a fantastic host and Camp Curvy Birch was wonderful.
Spotless, beautiful, and peaceful.
Her recommendations were spot on and she was great. Her chocolate chip banana bread was great too.
We all loved feeding the horses carrots. Looking forward to going back in the winter to chase the Norther Lights. 😊

Fantastic stay! The moose managed to dodge us for our entire stay but they had tracks all around.
Would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a quiet spot that’s still conveniently close to everything in the area.

Honestly the best air bnb experience that I have ever had. Not only is the property beautiful but the host was beyond amazing! She went above and beyond to ensure that our trip was one to remember. Literally did not have to do much because she let me know all of the local spots to eat and activities centers to have a great time. Was always available to answer any questions and give guidance. All and all amazing 10/10 Please book! Trust me it does not disappoint. Just a wonderful place to stay.

Seeing the northern lights, feeding the horses carrots, the friendly hostess, the warm chocolate banana bread was a nice touch, the lake, the moose on the lake, all this made for a great experience. Tom and Theresa Dunn
The hostess with the mostest! Deanna is friendly, communicative and extremely helpful. She definitely goes out of her way to make you feel welcome and at home. Gorgeous property. Beautiful home.

Absolutely amazing! Far exceeded our expectations. The cabin was beautiful and the property even more beautiful. Deanna made sure everything was perfect and had all the little extras. After a long day of traveling walking in to the smell of the nest choc chip banana bread was so welcoming. 5 stars aren’t enough. A million stars earned. I hope we can visit again soon.

Deanna’s place was amazing! We’ve stayed in many AirBnBs and this was probably our most favorite. She was friendly, responsive & the place was immaculate!! Will definitely stay again should we visit Fairbanks area again.

WOW!! Where do I even begin?! Camp Curvy Birch was absolutely amazing. The location is stunning!! We were able to see the aurora the first two nights we were there. The location of the cabin makes it so you can see the northern lights right from the living room (and even from the lofted bed!) The cabin was stocked with everything we needed, and was incredibly comfortable and home-y! Deanna was an absolutely incredible host - she is so nice!! She gave us some wonderful local recommendations on food, activities. She even went above and beyond and offered us laundry service in her own home when the washer in the cabin was out of service. I would HIGHLY recommend this cabin to anyone!!! We will definitely be back! A truly memorable stay 😁

We had a fantastic stay, the place felt like new and was well stocked for people who like to cook. Beds were comfy. We broke something and Deanna was super easy to work with to fix it. The Airbnb is so charming and I loved feeding the horses the carrots that were left in the fridge. Winter was great, I bet summer is also fantastic! Would def return.

Gorgeous little home just as pictured. Close enough to town for meals out, but far enough to feel secluded, private, and far from lights! Unfortunately the weather was uncooperative… snowy and cloudy, so we didn’t get an Aurora show. But we had a blast dog mushing, going to Chena Hot Springs, and seeing the international ice carving championships. Deanna was an extraordinary host, including turning on the lights and heat in the house in preparation for our late night arrival after missed flight connections. Fantastic stay. Highly recommended!

My husband and I had an amazing vacation! Deanna was a super host, best recommendations and beautiful property. The locals are very friendly. We are definitely coming back. Wish we could have stayed forever. 🥰

Absolutely the best AirBnb I’ve ever stayed in. Nothing even compares to the quality of stay that Deanna provided. I just finished my stay here and I am honestly at a loss for words for how to describe her hospitality and the beauty of the property. It truly felt like a home away from home and immersed me into the feel of Alaskan living. From the reviews it looks like she has had many return guests, no doubt I will be one of them! Deanna made this trip one I will never forget! 🤍❄️

Can't say enough AMAZING things about our stay at Deanna's cabin!! Was the best experience we have had at an Airbnb!! She is a GEM!! So sweet, caring, and super thoughtful! Made us feel right at home and gives the best recommendations to places!! She is easy to contact for anything and makes you feel like family.
Her cabin is close to everything and very easy to get around! The views are impeccable- we love the snow and were blown away!! She has horses to feed carrots to and are so sweet! 😊
You can tell she puts so much love into her cabin and provides her guests with the best experience possible!!
We had the BEST honeymoon and Deanna was a great part in that!!
Plus we saw the Nothern lights on our last night and she was so helpful with it all and made us an amazing fire to watch!
Don't miss out on staying at her place- you won't regret it!! We can't wait to come back!!
This was my second year in a row at Deanna’s Camp Curvy Birch, it’s that awesome!

This house is the perfect spot to see Northern Lights. You don't have to go to other places chasing and waiting, just relax waiting for the Northern Lights to come out.
Deanna is such a great host, she always responds to our questions in no time.
This is our second time staying at this lovely house. For sure we will come back again when we visit Fairbanks next time.

We really love this cabin! Every night, we saw northern lights in the cabin. Deanna is so helpful and kindness, gave us lots of support and suggestions during our stay. We have tea, coffee, cupcakes mix, and hot chocolate ！ Deanna prepared all what we need for us! The view outside is amazing, definitely we would come back!

Deanna’s stay at the North Pole was perfect combo of comfort, cozy and cleanliness. We were greeted as soon as we arrived and she even baked us a delicious banana 🍌 chocolate bread, which was still warm upon our arrival. Beautiful high ceilings, comfy couch and cozy loft for sleeping. Deanna communication was on point. She knew all the cool spots to see during our stay. Would definitely stay here again when I visit the North Pole in the future! Thank you 😊

Such an amazing trip. Deanna was welcoming and very helpful in planning our trip. She truly cares about her guests. Highly recommend staying here if you are traveling to the Fairbanks/North Pole area.

There really aren't enough words to describe our stay at Camp Curvy Birch. The hostess was incredibly helpful from dining recommendations months ahead (for those that would require a reservation) to excursions to directions, timing, shopping locations, we could not have asked for more. The location is beautiful, the cabin feels exactly like home followed you to this snowy destination and the personal touches the hostess provides are second to none. No one would regret staying here, we can't wait to visit again!
Deanna was a fabulous host and the location was absolutely beautiful. We enjoyed every minute of our stay.

Perfect!! All the amenities you will need plus the best banana chocolate chip bread!! Deanna was there for us all the way!! Our 1st night she messaged me “the lights were coming across the lake”!! The Auroras were my bucket list and Deanna told me how to see them or I never would have. After that we saw them every night!!! She was always giving us recommendations which we did them all!! We were not able to have a fire with Deanna and her daughter or feed the horses, but hope to come back when it’s warm!!! One last thing, cause I could go on and on! Our last day, our flight was moved up and Deanna told us to just stay as long as we needed which was a blessing for us. Her next renters were coming the next day so we were so lucky!! Go stay in Deanna’s homey cabin, any season, you will be glad you did!!!

Deanna was a great host. The cabin was exactly as described, it was perfect for us. We were welcomed to warm banana bread. We stayed for about a week and Deanna had plenty of recommendations for things to do and places to eat. We had a fire one night and she supplied all the fixings for the s’mores and the cabin was well stocked for us! We appreciate what Deanna does and would love to come back again some day. If the time is open book the cabin, it was worth it.

We can not say enough great things about our time at Deanna’s place! The cabin is perfect and had all the things we needed for our getaway to the North Pole. The location was amazing! On a great little lake (which we got to see freeze over in the few days we were there 😮) and close to so many great things to visit. And Deanna and Gracyn are wonderful. They provided a campfire and shared in a night we’ll never forget-we were fortunate enough to see the Northern lights and Deanna and Gracyn were great company. Deanna was so very helpful with her guidebook as well as personally recommending places to eat and visit. And even though they live on the property they were very respectful and gave us our own space. We definitely plan to return someday and came home considering Deanna and Gracyn our new friends!

Deanna’s place is incredible! My daughter and I enjoyed the property so much and Deanna’s personal touches made us feel at home from the moment we arrived. If you’re planning a trip to the Fairbanks area, you NEED to stay here!

“Four Word”
Charming/Clean/Cozy/Thoughtful
A relaxing home away from home with all the little extras you wont find in other Airbnbs.
Deanna knew we had a late flight so she made sure the place ready for our arrival. The beds were turned down, fresh home made banana bread (which was a DELIGHTFUL treat), and all the extras to kick off your morning.
We were all luck to watch Lady A together by the a warm cozy fire not once but twice. Capturing and sharing photos and stories as we waited into the night.
Thank you for the memories and will forever be cherished.

Words cannot explain how wonderful our stay at Deanna’s cabin has been! From the location, to the cabin to the amazing time and effort Deanna has put into every aspect of the cabin. Deanna is also one of the kindest people we have met! As we are from Australia, we do not drive and Deanna was kind enough to take us to get groceries and take us to some popular places around town! We didn’t expect this but we are so thankful as it make our trip so much better! On top of the already wonderful stay and location, we were able to see the northern lights on our last night! Absolutely adored our visit and wish we could have stayed longer!

This place is really something special. It will captivate your heart, relax your soul, release your inner-child and clear space for amazing memories. Deanna is an amazing host and incredible human being and she will move mountains to make your stay the best thing that ever happened.

My daughter and I absolutely adored staying here! Deanna keeps the place immaculate, she gives great tips on where to go, works so hard, and doesn't hover and gives you space to relax. We loved feeding her horses carrots everyday! Was a fantastic memory made with my daughter! Cannot go wrong staying here!!!! XOXO

I don’t even know where to start. This place was beyond magical. From the moment we got there our host took care of us like we were family. The home itself was one of the best airbnbs we’ve ever stayed at. Clean, cozy and fully stocked full of the essentials and more. The lake view was breathtaking with the sunsets and sunrises, and don’t even get me started on the northern light show…if you’re looking for the Alaska experience, but want to feel at home this is the place for you. If you’re lucky you’ll even get to sit by the fire with an adorable horse.

This place is AMAZING ! Highly recommend. Our host thought of every detail that would make our stay special. The land is peaceful and serene. Every detail has been thought through. S'mores by the fire was an exceptional touch. Thank you Deanna. We will be return guests for certain.

The very special cabin that makes the very memorable moments of our trip in Alaska. We got to meet Deanna who is the most friendly host we ever got to meet and learned so much about the local life from. The banana bread was fresh out of the oven when we arrived and there were carrots in the fridge that we could grab at o feed the horses! Full case of water and bowl of chocolates, so much care and love! Not to mention the custom built and bird themed cabin with birch branches and big windows looking over the lake. We wish we stayed longer, but a good excuse to come back!

What a great experience, an amazing cabin with an equally amazing host!! Great place to view the northern lights and close to everything you would want to see near Fairbanks. Has everything you could want and more. When we come back to Fairbanks we will definitely be staying at the Raven cabin. -Thank you again Deanna😊

Deanna is an outstanding host and made the stay feel like home. it's true, the chocolate chip banana bread is amazing and the house smells like it when you walk in. The location is great with a nice fire pit by the water. I would highly recommend anyone visiting to stay here!!
Beautiful little place. The host was top notch. The kitchen and bath were well equipped. Very clean. Close to a pretty heavily trafficked road, but otherwise it was very peaceful.

Deanna is the embodiment of the Alaskan spirit. She is welcoming, helpful and kind to everyone she meets. We held our wedding reception on her property and she went above and beyond the call of duty- lending a hand wherever she saw a need. The cabin was warmly decorated and smelled like chocolate chip banana bread - which she made for us to begin our stay with. She gave us fresh carrots to feed the horses and kept the fire burning. I’ve never met a more gracious person.

What a wonderful place to stay. The cottage was designed and decorated so well. It has an incredible view and the host was super friendly. There were personal touches everywhere. An incredible time for my family to connect.

Our stay in the Raven cabin at Camp Curvy Birch was five star all around. The owner, Deanna, thought of everything a guest could possibly need, including a selection of locally roasted coffees, large fluffy white hotel towels, homemade banana bread, carrots to feed the horses, and so much more. As an experienced artist herself, Deanna has tastefully decorated the cabin with beautiful works from numerous local artists. Before we booked with Deanna we researched all of the other cabins in the area - as someone who's traveled internationally for the last 15 years and stayed in dozens of Air BnBs, I can promise nothing else even comes close to the comfort and hospitality you will experience at Camp Curvy Birch. Thank you for everything, Deanna!!!

Deanna’s cabin was the perfect space for our family of four to stay while exploring Fairbanks, Chena Hot Springs, and North Pole over several days. Moreover, Deanna was an amazing host, from greeting us on arrival and seeing us off on departure, preparing the banana bread which fed us breakfast each day, and even going out of her way to provide a craft for our kids to do on a rainy day. We’ve already recommended her place to our family in Alaska, and we would absolutely stay again if we are in the area!

Wonderful place to stay! The cabin is sweet! Clean and exactly as described. Deanna is very attentive and responsive. Lots of lovely details to make our stay even more memorable. Unique stay, great guidebook and I would definitely recommend it. Thanks so much Deanna, this was a great break on our northern overlanding adventure.

Truly phenomenal! Deanna has pulled out all the stops to make her cabin getaway an amazing Alaskan experience. The cabin is beautiful inside and out with terrific views. She packed it full of local treats and Alaskan themed decor (plus homemade banana bread when we checked in!). What really set Deanna apart was her friendliness and hospitality. She dropped us off right down the road in her kayaks to float the Chena River through the Alaskan wilderness (we saw a moose!) into town and picked us at the end of the day. I can’t say enough good things. Thanks so much!
Camp curvy birth is a wonderful place to stay. Deanna has a well thought out location and the cabin has everything, you will need! I will be back to stay at her place again!

A few words just doesn’t suffice. We spent our wedding weekend at Deanna’s property and truly could not have picked a more perfect location. From the moment we arrived to her signature chocolate chip banana bread & beautiful cabin we felt at home.
We were able to use the property for our wedding and it was perfect. We had a lakefront ceremony, and then reception all in one location. It’s easy and quick enough for guests to get to, plenty of space, and the horses were the added bonus.
Deanna puts careful consideration and an enormous amount of love into every single aspect of the cabin as well as the entire property. Whether you’re planning a wedding or just here for a weekend getaway; this is the location you want to be.

Deanna was a superb host. She not only made us a welcome loaf cake but also a cake Father's day. My daughter loved feeding carrots to the horses everyday. It was a plus being able to go on the kayaks without having to leave and find rentals. The cabin itself was immaculate and had everything we needed. The kitchen was the best stocked Airbnb I have seen. Deanna thought of everything. But the best part of the cabin were the views. We had such an amazing time and we can't wait to come back again.

The AirBnB cabin and the property it sits on was beyond imagination. The view of and access to the lake and the horses right across was surreal. The unit was very tidy and organized and well, inspiring! We enjoyed the upper bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, and living area. We were in the middle of a long trip so we got to use the washer and dryer. Deanna, our host, was gracious with her stories of her, her family, and her property her and warmth welcomed us the minute we got to the property. She naturally won us over and made our stay feel wholesome. We even opened the fridge and found a bunch of carrots which we were encouraged to feed to the horses and I absolutely loved having them chomp on them from our hands so happily. We followed her recommendations and enjoyed our stay in Fairbanks in-between our time in Seward and Denali. We look forward to planning another stay here at Deanna’s and continue to follow the Camp Curvy Birch FB site to see those additions to the property Deanna has been raving about and eager to share. We 10/10 recommend staying here anytime you’re visiting Alaska! Thank you for the memories Deanna!

The cabin is as gorgeous as the pictures. Deanna left all sorts of goodies for me including sort fresh baked bread. Having the horses on the property and the pond is really nice. Only downside is the property backs up to a road. It’s not super busy but it’s a fast road so there is noise from that and the four wheeling path.

Wow, this place is absolutely amazing! Deanna put so much into this cabin and the personal touches were much appreciated. She helped with the planning of our trip and gave wonderful suggestions and went way above and beyond what a host usually does. This is the best AirBnb we have ever stayed at and can’t recommend it enough. The carrots left in the fridge for us to feed the horses was one of the highlights of our stay along with the thoughtfulness of Deanna with her gifts she left for us for our anniversary. She truly is a great person to get to know and if we come back to this area we will definitely stay here again.

Wow! That’s the best way to describe our time at Deanna’s place. Everything was just perfect. Deanna is a world-class host who considers every detail to make you feel comfortable and welcomed. Her banana bread itself is worth the trip to Alaska!
For us, her place was the exact place we needed to spend our nights as we visited the many nearby sights during the day!
The horses and lake were beautiful - and the place is conveniently located right next to a main road to get you to North Pole and Fairbanks.
I highly recommend!

Deanna is such a great host! She is kind, warm, and thoughtful she gives us so many good things to know how to enjoy our trip to Fairbanks.
The house is so beautiful with a fully equipped kitchen. Outside of the house is a private beach with an excellent view.
We are looking forward to the coming Christmas holidays. Because we already booked 6 days here. Hope can see the Aurora just lying on the bed.

What a perfect little get away! The cabin is absolutely beautiful- Deanna is amazing! My daughter and I stayed for a few days and we couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. Deanna is very sweet and makes you feel at home! Can’t wait to visit again!

Where do I begin.. from check in to check out, Deanna has been nothing but accommodating. She would make sure you felt right at home. I’ve traveled and stayed in many different places. By that being said, this will be a stay that my family and I will never forget. We started as guest and left as family. Deanna and her daughter, Gracyn are both amazing, kind and loving. We’re so lucky to have met you both. Thank you so much for everything!! We cannot wait to book our next stay and come visit.

Camp Curvy Birch was such a beautiful property! Deanna was such a wonderful host! The Banana bread lived up to all the raves! :) My 7 year old son loved playing in the snow. We were able to see the northern lights from there the first two nights we were there. Such a great place close enough to town but just far enough to enjoy nature! We can’t wait to come back for a visit again!

Deanna is the perfect hostess. Why? Because she’s all about the extras, the little things, the small touches that make you feel like YOU are her first guest. If you want to experience an Alaskan stay with heart and soul, Camp Curvy Birch is your place!

Deanna and her daughter provided such an amazing Airbnb experience. I wish we could give more than a 5 star review! They welcome us the moment we got to their property and let us know they were available if we needed anything! The cabin had everything we could’ve needed for a few cozy days in, and a perfect view for watching the northern lights and moose out on the lake! Thank you again for having us, we can’t wait to come back!
Perfect location, amazing views and friendly neighbors!

We can't say how much we enjoyed our time here with Deanna. From the time we arrived, we were received to a beautiful, CLEAN, warm and toasty cabin. Along with a wonderful cinnamon smell from the banana bread, which was delicious! That same first night, we saw the Aurora borealis. Deanna was even kind enough to let us know when the lights were out and when moose were spotted nearby.
In the cabin, we found everything we needed. From coffee, water and even a washer and dryer(which is always a huge plus). Her location is perfect for viewing the lights. Out of the three times we saw them in our trip, two times where in this cabin. In addition, she even has horses that you can feed with carrots left in the fridge, so that's an added experience with your stay. Was hands down one of our fav Airbnb's we've stayed in. Will definitely be back.

This was one of my favorite Airbnb experiences.
Deanna was super sweet.. greeted us the moment we arrived with a very contagious smile and warm welcome. She accommodated our odd travel schedule without hesitation, and after 7 hours of driving we walked into fresh choc. Banana bread. Her property is gorgeous and perfect for northern lights spotting; and there is restaurants very close by! Everything was perfect.

We had a fantastic time at Deanna’s place.
First of all, the cabin itself is of huge value, it’s crystal clean, it has everything we could ever need, even Netflix sub which we didn’t have of our own and we watched a whole season of show while waiting for the northern lights. The interiors design is super stylish, great for taking pictures even just inside of the cabin.
The other big pro of the cabin is its convenience for northern lights watching. You’d need somewhere without light pollution and open space to watch the lights, and Deanna’s cabin is exactly just like that. We waited inside of the cabin, watching out for the aurora map, and when it says it covers Fairbanks area, we turned off the lights and saw there’s northern lights outside then we just get dressed and walked out to the lake to watch it, we stayed in the cabin for only 2 nights in March and we saw the lights 2 nights in a row. I could never imagine waiting and watching northern lights is just this simple.
Another great experience we had is feeding the horses with the carrots Deanna prepared, that was super fun too!
Will definitely come back again!

This is an amazing find! Gorgeous place with amazing view out the windows. Deanna made us feel so special with lots of little extras. Home made chocolate chip banana bread loaf was warm and waiting for us upon arrival. Smelled just baked in the cabin! A whole drawer in the fridge full of carrots to feed the horses! All kitchen, bath, laundry, and other amenities you will need. Deanna even started a fire for us one night and was willing to help us chase the auroras. Spent a whole day snuggled up in the cabin, did not want to leave it was so cozy! Loved the place loved the hospitality- way above and beyond! Staying here is a must if you are in Fairbanks.

We had a wonderful stay at The Raven — such a cute and comforting cabin to come back to every evening on our trip to Fairbanks, Alaska! It is located in a great spot just outside of Fairbanks. It is clean, has great amenities and Deanna is an amazing host. You come as guests and leave as family! Deanna was super helpful when we had an issue with our rental car the first day, and she provided lots of great recommendations for activities and restaurants in the area. If you’re looking for a place to stay while visiting Fairbanks, look no further than The Raven! We hope to make it back to her cabin one day (hopefully that time in the summer).
Beautiful cabin, warm and inviting-excellent hostess!

Deanna is an amazing hostess! She was so helpful before our trip with trip planning and great suggestions. During our trip her caring and friendship were so genuine, Deanne really helped to make our vacation a trip of a lifetime.

Deanna’s air bnb was nothing short of perfect! You can tell she put in so much thought and effort in even the tiniest bit of details that made the cabin feel like home away from home. She gave us her homemade Banana bread that was absolutely delicious! The place is stocked up with everything you need from a bowl of chocolates, coffee, utensils and more! The best part was the stunning views that surrounded the cabin. I definitely miss waking up to the sunrise beaming over the lake and trees covered in snow. We were also lucky to be able to watch the northern lights while sitting right outside of our cabin. Thank you to Deanna and her wonderful family/friends for making this trip unforgettable. We will definitely come back one day! -Shane

Beautiful lakefront property, very clean, and well equipped with all amenities. Deanna is a tremendous host and her suggestions on where to go and eat did not disappoint. The aroma of fresh baked banana chocolate chip bread greeted us as we came in the house and yes this was
our breakfast during our stay. Of course one can see the Aurora borealis during a dark, clear cloudless night! Seeing the mama moose and her baby walking across the lake as well as feeding carrots to Deanna’s horses were pluses to our stay. The Raven’s cabin is good for 2-4 people. Renting a 4x4 during the winter months is recommended. This property is close to North Pole and driving distance to Fairbanks. We will definitely come back!
Best stay we have ever had at an AirBnB… (drop the mic)!

You may see two reviews in a row here because I was able to extend my stay at Camp Curvy Birch. How many days you ask? 13! That should tell you how awesome it is! Also, if you are coming to see the aurora, then you need more than a nignt or two. Don’t miss this gem of a cabin - summer looks awesome, too!

Two of us visited Camp Curvy Birch in February and were thrilled with this lovely cabin in the Arctic! It’s just far enough from Fairbanks to enjoy the dark skies and peace and quiet but also centrally located to go N, S, E or W for adventures. Deanna is a 5 Star Concierge ready with incredible ideas for anything & everything. You won’t find a better hostess anywhere! We even extended our stay and will for sure return. Highly recommended!

Deanna is a great host! She goes above and beyond to ensure her guests are well taken care of. The place is great and cute perfect for a small family. We saw the Northern lights by the windows at night—no need to go out and hunt them in a super harsh cold climate. My kids loved the loft. The beds are comfortable. The kitchen is well stocked with cooking supplies and kitchen wares. And oh there is an unlimited supply of coffee and creamer. We were welcomed with a freshly baked chocolate chip banana bread which is so delicious! And she even baked me a chocolate birthday cake on my birthday. This place is amazing with great views of the lake. Can't recommend it enough to my friends and family.

This was one of our favorite airbnbs we ever stayed at. Deanna goes above and beyond for her guests and has a whole range of recommendations and is incredibly helpful!
We saw the northern lights and the cabin itself is awesome, we were able to cook, relax, get cosy, feed the horses and more.
Highly recommended, and will have to come back in summer!
My wife and I really enjoyed the Vegan chocolate chip banana bread too! Thank you for the generosity! You are awesome!!!
This was the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in! It was amazing, start to finish. Deanna takes it upon herself to ensure her guests have a wonderful experience. Highly recommend!
Deanna is a tremendous host. She is very accommodating and gracious. The cabin has wonderful views and is fully equipped! The horses on the property are the cherry on top. We would love to go back.
Great host and cabin!! it was perfect for the nights we were there to relax! has everything you could need!

This was our second stay at Deanna’s place and it did not disappoint. The hospitality, decor, cleanliness, location, EVERYTHING was amazing. Not sure when are next visit to the area will be but will definitely book this place again. Highly recommended whether it’s winter, spring, summer or fall!

Deanna went above and beyond to ensure we felt welcomed and provided for. We were greeted by delicious warm bread and a personalized note in the Airbnb. Throughout our stay she offered up recommendations for what we could do. She cleared the snow for us during a fierce snowstorm so we could leave and helped us jump our car. She was very accommodating, and everything exceeded expectations. We would love to come back.
This is one of the best rentals we have ever stayed in. The host couldn’t have been better. 5 stars aren’t enough!
Great little spot in North Pole. Beautiful cabin and great amenities. We really enjoyed our stay. and feeding the horses

The cabin is so cute and the view is amazing. We loved the horses on property and being able to feed them carrots!! If you want a cute cabin experience while still being pampered with having running water lol this is it. Deanna is an amazing host! So nice and offers advice on what to do around town! Hands down the best host I’ve had. Oh and her chocolate chip banana bread is amazing! I like the location of being outside of Fairbanks, but still being able to drive into the city to do stuff, but most of the really cool things are located on the out skirts anyways so the location was perfect for the things we had planned. This location is located about 50 miles outside of Chena hot springs which is a beautiful drive anyways and near the Santa Claus House. We will definitely be coming back in the not so cold months! Lol

Deanna is an amazing host! We had a magical time at her cabin. What a joy to wake up to that view over the lake! And to watch the stars (& on one of the nights, hints of Aurora borealis!) from the bed. Deanna went out of her way to help us with any and all questions and needs that came up while we were there, even lent my partner snow boots! The cabin itself was spotlessly clean, super cozy, & just a charming atmosphere with tasteful & artful raven themed touches that I adored discovering :) the kitchen has everything you need to cook! And the wifi was strong enough to take zoom calls & even stream a movie on Netflix, even while the space felt like we were in a remote forest far away from the world.

We had a great stay at Camp Curvy Birch! We were greeted with the warm smell of fresh banana bread. The cabin was well stocked with all the essentials. Deanna was very helpful with recommendations before and during our stay, and was very accommodating to our needs. It was -40, and she was still willing to start a fire outside so we could watch the northern lights. We had a great stay, and would highly recommend to others.

Amazing host and stunning view . Location was perfect to see northern light Deanna is amazing she bake welcome bread for us and it was yummy. Cabin is really cozy and cute there has everything that you want. We will come back here again for sure.

Deanna’s place and sense of hospitality are beyond anything we’ve ever experienced. She really cares about her guests and their experience in Alaska. She went above and beyond for us, like with an incredibly early check in and calling our car rental to about the plug in for our car. The rental is super cozy, clean, and very well stocked and provided well. She was very responsive and has tons of amazing local recommendations. She was even going to make a fire for us if Lady Aurora came out! We are so appreciative of Deanna and would absolutely recommend her place. Book asap!

First, Deanna is an amazing host. She goes above and beyond for her guests. From informing us to ask our car rental company about winterization, activity recommendations, to making us a vegan banana bread to welcome us. And another to see us off! The cabin is in the perfect location to be close to stuff in Fairbanks but still have a quiet location by a lake. The cabin is super comfortable and really well appointed. We were able to make a decent Thanksgiving dinner in the kitchen. Definitely a place to stay in Fairbanks!

An absolute amazing stay with an excellent host! You will not regret staying here. Deanna is such a great host she will make you feel like your family from the moment you walk in. The lake offers breathtaking views of the sunrise, sunset, aurora and stars. (All which you can also see from inside the cozy cabin.) The cabin is a dream, so modern and beautiful. Even just staying in for the day was great. The horse outdoors are so adorable you cannot help but feed them some carrots. Overall an amazing stay in every aspect. We already booked another week before we even left.

Southern hospitality in a northern winter wonderland! We are from Atlanta, GA so we were a bit nervous traveling to Alaska in the winter. But our fears were immediately put to rest after arriving at this beautiful modern cabin in the snow by the almost frozen lake. Deanna is an incredible host who has everything immaculate before you arrive and the scent of the most delicious banana bread welcomes you through the door. She pays attention to the details of what makes a guest's stay comfortable and unique. Not only did she provide coffee and coffee filters, she provided things people like us would have never even considered: an extension cord for the rental car's heating plate, bear spray, a drawer full of carrots for the horses. She started multiple fires in the fire pit by the lake to help keep us warm while watching the northern lights. She also provided us with many helpful suggestions for things to do, places to visit, restaurants, etc. I cannot say enough about how awesome our stay was.
Beautiful experience. The location and cabin are beautiful, the surrounding areas are beautiful, wish we could’ve stayed longer. Until next time! Thank you.

Deanna was a wonderful Host. She was very attentive to our needs. She was even kind enough to let me receive packages there for me and went above and beyond by mailing and shipping packages for us after we left. The cabin was beautiful and spacious. She has a very large library of books in the cabin about Alaska which was awesome during our downtime. The frozen lake was beautiful. It does back up to a road so there is some road noise. But, you’ll be in Alaska so you’ll be out doing things most of the time. The horse paddock is right outside the door which was great for us since we like horses but, might not be for everyone. Definitely a wonderful experience for us. Thank you Deanna.

You will love absolutely everything about this place. It has more than what an Airbnb has to offer. You can feed carrots to the horses, take riding lesson by arrangement, catch Northern Lights over the lake, or simply just relax by the fire pit at night or in the cozy cabin and gazing out the windows. Oh, did I mention how convenient the location of this AirBnb yet? It’s so close to everything: The Pump House, Santa Clause House, Fairbanks airport, etc… you name it. We had so much unforgettable moments at the cabin, met many great people and we look forward to be back to create more memories. Thank you Deanna and her Camp Curvy Birch!

This cabin is adorable! Deanna put her beautiful creative touch in this cozy haven. Not to mention the loving hospitality we received.
Grayson Lake is literally right outside your door! With a cute bonfire, perfect for viewing the Northern Lights. Lady A can be tricky to catch, so we recommend staying 4-5 days (or more honestly, you're not going to want to leave) to enjoy the catch!
Deanna is honestly the greatest hostess. She is attentive, thoughtful, and just all around a great person!
The drive from the airport was about 30 min (We recommend renting a car!) and outside food is close by as well.

Beautiful property, wonderful host! You cannot ask for a friendlier host or more well appointed place to stay! Everything plus more was provided. Very nice, special touches and we saw the Northern lights without even leaving the property! Deanna is a heck of a fire keeper too! It was fun feeding the horses on the property too. We would definitely stay here again! Thanks for making my 50th birthday so special!!

This lovely cabin is a gorgeous piece of modern art and so very cozy!
From the second we turned into the driveway, saw the horses and the lake, we knew we were in for a special experience. Then the owner Deanna greeted us with a welcoming hug and we felt like old friends.
Upon entering the cabin, we were greeted with the an amazing aroma-fresh baked chocolate chip banana bread!
Every single detail of the Raven cabin is intentional to ensure an easy, comfortable stay.
We saw the northern lights on our first night, right over the lake! And when we started to feel cold being outside after midnight staring at the sky we simply walked back in the cabin and gazed at the lights from the loft bedroom.
Deanna and her daughter Gracyn are wonderful hosts and share a sweet bond that is heartwarming to witness. They are full of suggestions for dining and sightseeing, and build the very best campfires!
Alaska is beautiful, the northern lights are amazing and this cabin made our trip even more magical.
Wonderful host, wonderful place.

Deanna is a fantastic host. The cabin is perfectly designed, well built, clean and beautiful. Perfect location to be close enough to get to all of the "must see's" but far enough away to still feel remote. Beautiful landscape everywhere. Northern Lights that magically reflect off of the lake. Great place to visit. Great place to stay. I cannot speak highly enough about the experience my wife and I enjoyed at Camp Curvy Birch. We will be returning for the sights... and Deanna's company.

This place was so amazing! Deanna and Gracyn made us feel like we were on a trip to visit family. They made us feel so welcomed. We have never stayed anywhere more perfect. The nights out by the campfire making s’mores, were the kids favorite time of the whole trip. My daughter (8) loved spending time with Gracyn and the horses. We are already trying to book our trip back. The views of the lake from the cabin are breathtaking! I would highly recommend making this place part of your trip to see the northern lights or just to get away and enjoy Alaska!

I had an unforgettable 2-night stay at Deanna’s airbnb. It was exactly as pictured; beautifully designed, immaculate , and cozy. Some activities were available and offered, but just doing nothing and relaxing inside all day was also a great way of enjoying this place. Highly recommended.

If you get the chance to stay here- do it!! This was probably the best Airbnb my husband and I have stayed at! Deanna could not have been a more friendly, communicative, and helpful host. She had fires for us every night and gave great recommendations. The cabin was so clean and beautiful. We already want to come back!!! Thanks so much Deanna and Gracyn!

This is the Airbnb against which all other Airbnb’s shall be judged forever! It is out of this world! If you are looking at this little gem, and it is available, just book it. You can thank me later. It is like a fairy tale! The cabin is stunning, the views are stunning, the northern lights are stunning and you can see them right here if they are out. No need to drive around chasing them, just stay here and look out the windows, or up over the lake. Deanna is amazing and will help you with any part of planning your trip or recommendations, plus she starts you off with homemade chocolate chip banana bread (the way to my heart is with a baked good). She’s not even a superhost, she’s now a friend. Kitchen has everything you need (and great coffee), the bed and couch are comfy, and there’s tv and WiFi, not that you need it. Seriously the best host ever, the best Airbnb ever, and we can’t wait to come back.

Deanna’s property was exactly as pictured. It was such a wonderful location, and Deanna was extremely welcoming and helpful. We loved every second of our stay there, and would stay again in a heartbeat. I would highly recommend this location for anyone looking to getaway and enjoy a relaxing stay near Fairbanks.

Amazing. Would stay here every time we’re in Fairbanks. Deanna was phenomenal with local knowledge (and tales!), overly gracious with children, a great banana-bread-maker, and incredibly generous with personal touches. The cabin is gorgeous and perfectly functional with all you need and nothing you don’t. The views are inspiring and the location convenient. Can’t say enough!

No words to describe how wonderful this experience was. Deanna was so incredibly hospitable we not only had an amazing place to stay, we have now made connections we can call friends! The cabin was beyond expectations. We are already planning out trip back in 6 months. This is not a place you want to miss!

This cabin on the lake exceeded our expectations. My husband and I fell asleep under the stars and Northern Lights seen through the bedside window 3/4 nights we were there. Everything was neat and clean as this cabin is brand new. Deanna is the best host I have had the pleasure to encounter thus far - communicative & gracious, going above and beyond and providing every little thing you could need. We feel so lucky to have booked our stay in Fairbanks/North Pole at Camp Curvy Birch!

A comfy cabin with all the comforts of home. A king bed with a top notch mattress in a loft upstairs as well as a comfy bed downstairs. You will greeted by 5 horses who will come to expect plenty of carrots.
Deanna is the ultimate host with a campfire and s’mores waiting for her guests as well as fresh-baked bread that makes the cabin smell heavenly. If you can find an open reservation for Deanna’s cabin, you should book it immediately. Because places like this are few and far between.

This place will exceed anyone's expectations. The hostess Deanna went way out of her way for me and my family. If you don't feel comfortable here I don't know what would please you. Our stay there made such an impact on our Alaskan experience!

Deanna was incredible and this home was so beautiful!!! It was clean, beautiful, and such cozy vibes. The views are stunning and Deanna is a wonderful and attentive host. The horses are beautiful and great feels being there.
🥰 Amazing

Camp Curvy Birch is a beautiful spot on a quiet little lake! The house is beautiful inside and out. Getting to feed carrots to the horses was an extra bonus. Loved this place and hope to return and see the Northern Lights!
This place is STUNNING! Deanna has put so many thoughtful and unique touches to this cabin that make it both stylish as well as comfy/cozy! We cannot wait to be back!
Amazing experience! Kayaking on the lake was so beautiful! The cabin is very well equipped and the bed is super comfy. Feeding the horses was a surreal experience! I highly reckoned this Airbnb!

What an amazing place to stay! Agree with all the other raving reviews. It’s a beautiful house with many personal touches. We went in the summer but in the winter the northern lights would be amazing because the house has huge windows. There are kayaks available and Deana made us a fire with s’mores one night. If you’re are in Fairbanks, this is the place to stay!

Easily the best place we’ve ever stayed. From location to the host, Deanna, everything was perfect. We are already planning our next trip out here for the winter. Highly recommend Deanna’s place. She is an amazing host.

Definitely the best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed at! Deanna is an amazing host. The cabin was very clean, with everything (and more) you might need for your stay! Having horses right next to us was a huge bonus! Our girls loved feeding horses with the carrots :)
Deanna made our stay safe, entertaining, and unique. We did kayaking on the lake next to the cabin, and we had an amazing marshmallow night!
Highly recommend, very much loved and appreciated for the hospitality!

Our stay at Deanna’s AirBnB was absolutely PERFECT!! You will feel welcomed with open arms, and will become family by the time you leave. Deanna goes above and beyond for her guests and always makes sure that her guest are happy and entertained. The cabin itself is one of the most beautiful AirBnB’s you could ever find. All custom built and STUNNING!! The location is a little slice of heaven! Literally right off the road, but feels miles away and in the middle of nowhere but perfectly close to everything. The cabin is right on its own private lake and she has horses around as well. You can go out anytime and pet the horses, or go sit around the campfire and enjoy a relaxing evening by the fire. Simply perfection. My husband and I will definitely be coming back to stay again! 💙

This Airbnb is probably the most gorgeous one we have ever stayed in. IT IS BRAND NEW AND BEAUTIFULLY DECORATED. It is spectacular in it’s decor, cleanliness, location and its host. Everything is high-end. Do not miss a chance to stay in this beautiful property on its own private lake, with seven horses and numerous dogs. The host is pleasant, helpful and attentive.
This cabin was just what we needed, and it exceeded our expectations. Great location, scenery, wonderful hosts, friendly…definitely recommend!

Absolutely perfect place to stay in North Pole! Deeana has thought of everything. This is such a cozy cabin with an amazing view. We really appreciated getting to feed the horses. Deeana was incredibly hospitable and helpful.

The house is as describe, furniture was very comfortable and the cabin was well stocked.
The property does back up to a busy road so you will hear road noise day and night. There is not curtains on 2 of the windows. Sleeping in the daylight with all of the road noise was challenging. There isn’t a curtain on the window on the front door so when they are feeding or working with the horses they are steps away from the door and can see right into the cabin.
This was a work trip for me and unfortunately there was no cell reception for ATT (or any other major carriers.) The listing states the cabin has wif but unfortunately the connection was not adequate and upload speeds weren’t fast enough to attach encrypted files. Due to the lack of connectivity I had to relocate after one night. The host was unwilling to offer any discount or reimbursement despite knowing it was a work trip and not disclosing the connectivity issues.

We can't say enough about how perfect this stay was. The location, privacy, horses, beautiful lake/pond, and comfortable, tasteful and well equipped house. We couldn't have asked for anything more and will be returning whenever we visit family.

The property is as beautiful as it looks like in the pictures. The lake is a perfect place to relax and enjoy the fire. The horses on the property are very friendly and playful. The cabin has a lot of thoughtful touches, which give it a very cozy and comfortable vibe. The windows open to one of the best views of the lake.
Deanna is a wonderful host. She helped us with nice local recommendations. She was very quick to respond and we were greeted with a warm banana bread, that made our stays even better. Would surely recommend staying here.

The Curvy Birch was extraordinary. Our cabin, The Raven, was cozy and welcoming and spotless. More than that, it had a natural vibe (thanks to Deanna's top-shelf taste) with touches of birch, stone, and metal which literally brought the beauty of Alaska inside, rather than just out our window. Cupboards were stocked with yummy desserts and snacks and the fridge with coffee creamers and a veggie drawer full of carrots to spoil the horses. The property was picturesque and sprawling surrounded by pines and birches with a full view of a snow covered lake.
The setting aside, the best advantage of the rental is the host, Deanna. She had an innate ability to swoop in with a local suggestion and a much needed ride in the heavy snow and then duck out to give us our privacy. It's rare to find someone with such warmth and commitment. She tirelessly dug out her fire pit and a path to the lake, hauled firewood and built us a blazing fire so we could better enjoy the Northern Lights. We so enjoyed her company that we invited her to join us. On the flight home, we agreed that our vacation would have been less if we had stayed anywhere else. We felt so lucky to have stumbled upon this hidden gem and recommend it wholeheartedly.

I’ve never been so happy to write a review for any place. If you’re questioning this place at all, don’t! From the moment you walk in to the moment you walk out, it’s pure bliss. The location is beautiful, the cabin is so gorgeous, cozy, and properly stocked that you’ll feel dragged out to leave and excited to come back from any and all excursions that you visit.
The cabin is completely modernized without losing that cozy, farmhouse vibe. Deanna makes sure you walk in and instantly feel at home. The fireplace on the screen, the lovely scent that makes you feel like it’s Christmas, and the homemade banana bread and champagne were the cherry on top! (Best banana bread recipe EVER, btw!) The kitchen is fully stocked with anything you need for cooking/baking, the bathrooms have more than enough towels and the shampoo/conditioner/body wash smell amazing! The couch and the bed up on the loft are SO COMFORTABLE, we had a great night’s sleep all throughout the trip. And let’s not forget the horses that we’re allowed to feed and provided carrots for in the fridge to do so. It made us feel more than welcome that Deanna allows her guests to provide such a service to her lovely furry animals!
Aside from the cabin experience, Deanna is truly the most phenomenal host. She provides you with recommendations on excursions and places to eat. But, she truly went above and beyond when we discovered we may not get into town on time as planned. Our flight was delayed about 4 hours, which made us miss our connecting flight, and we almost weren’t able to find a connecting flight into Fairbanks that same day. This would also mean we would miss our helicopter/snowmobile tour at Borealis Basecamp we had planned the next day. Deanna has connections everywhere! She offered to call the airlines for us to try and find us a flight that same day, and also offered to call the basecamp and try to reschedule our tour if need be (thankfully it all worked out for us). It was absolutely lovely to meet Deanna and have her share her stories about the history and future plans of the whole place.
All in all, best location with the best host we’ve ever experienced. We will be back! Thank you, Deanna!!
I can’t say enough about this place and the host. Deanna truly went above a beyond with thoughtful touches and helpful hints. Snow shoeing across the frozen lake was especially fun.

The greatest AirBnb stay we have ever had! If you are coming to Alaska plan at least a couple nights to stay with Deanna. I’d go to North Pole just to stay at her place. She is an amazing person and incredibly generous. She did everything she could to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. I can’t recommend her place enough.

We had an AMAZING vacation!!! Deanna & her daughter Gracyn were ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL!!! If I know anyone going to Fairbanks, I will for sure tell them to stay at Camp Curvy Birch!! And when we go back we will stay in no other place than Camp Curvy Birch!!! Thank you for the FANTASTIC vacation & for answering all our questions in record speed!!! You guys are AMAZING hosts!!! THANK YOU!!!

Beautiful property and cabin! Our group had a wonderful stay here! Deanna is a phenomenal host! She is very knowledgeable about the area and has great recommendations! The cabin is very cozy and was perfect for our group of 4. We loved being able to feed the horses as well! Would definitely recommend!

The thoughtful touches on literally every thing we’re more than going the extra mile.
The place is done up in such a thoughtful and experience inducing manner. It’s such a rare find for an exceptional value.
The kitchen was well stocked with all amenities and then some more.
The loft style bed was a beautiful touch to the bedroom.
The freshly baked banana bread and a lovely bouquet of roses was a very heartfelt welcome to this magical place.
We thank Deanna for making our stay so memorable.
I would highly recommend staying here and only here in this area. If the this place is booked adjust your travel dates to match this place’s vacancy.

Deanna was absolutely amazing! Camp Curvy Birch is like living a scene from something you would see on t.v. Deana was an amazing host who really went above and beyond to make sure our experience was great! Deanna is very familiar with the area, she answered all of our questions and made great recommendations. During our stay we enjoyed captivating skies over the quiet lake. Our visit to Camp Curvy Birch provided an authentic Alaskan experience with all of of the comforts of home. From the electric blinds to the cozy loft, the cabin was amazing. We couldn't imagine a better place to stay, or a better host for the experience. Thank you Deanna!!

This has been my favorite airbnb stay! Deanna got everything right from the warm welcome, to the comfy and clean space, to going above and beyond to make our stay with a 9 month old the best it could be. She is so friendly and genuinely wants your stay to be the best it could have been. We are hoping to come back!

This might be long but worth the read. Deanna is honestly the sweetest person Ryan and I have ever met. Before coming to Alaska - I was very nervous of the covid restrictions and things we needed to complete in order to book our flight. Deanna called me the day before we left for our trip and talked on the phone with me for 30 minutes to ensure we would be okay. She gave me tips, recommendations and shared her life story with me. We arrived at our air bnb and the pictures do not do it justice with HOW PERFECT this place is. We would have paid the triple the price just with how beautiful and magical this place really is. Deanna was nothing but a perfect host. We texted throughout our whole stay - checking in with what was best to do & see and she really goes ABOVE AND BEYOND to make sure you have a perfect time. Without her and her cabin our trip to fairbanks would have been nothing but a general vacation. She’s like family at this point and we cannot wait to come back. She even celebrated our engagement with us right after it happened! You’re amazing Deanna. Can’t wait for my whole family to come and meet you.

Deanna went above and beyond for us during our stay. We were welcomed warmly but also given complete privacy. She even graciously let us checkout late after our flight unexpectedly got delayed. It was lovely waking up to a beautiful view and enjoying all the cozy amenities including giant fluffy towels and local coffee. I’m certain this is the best place to stay in the area!
Deanna’s place is so awesome and we had such a wonderful experience. I would love to come back in summer time and stay here again!

What a dream it was to stay here. The kitchen has everything you need, the cabin is very comfortable and the surroundings are gorgeous. We snowshoed on the frozen lake and the trails beyond. We saw the aurora from our bed. Deanna is an amazing host and we checked in with warm freshly baked banana bread.
Highly recommend this place.

Deanna was amazing from the moment I booked this Airbnb. She answered all of my questions about the area. (A lot of questions) She had great recommendations for tours and restaurants. She was very thoughtful and surprised us with delicious bake goods and red roses. 😊 we enjoyed our stay with her and her sweet daughter. I highly recommend her Airbnb.
I highly recommend Deanna’s place! My husband and I give it 5 stars across the board! She made our weekend special and was such a delight to work with and meet!

This place is awesome, brand new , thoughtful decoration , super clean, variety of amenities (great choices of coffee) , close to main road, .... the host, Deanna is great. She responded very fast if we had any questions. On the last day, she offered us to stay as long as we want. We are extremely happy that we stayed there.

Staying at Camp Curvy Birch was amazing! From opening the door and smelling home-made chocolate chip banana bread and amazing scentsys around the cabin, Deanna thought of every homie touch possible. She provided us carrots to feed the horses; suggested places to eat and where to see the northern lights; and offered to build us a fire to have a campfire on the beach. She was an amazing host and so kind to talk to. We look forward to staying there again someday!
This place is a gem. Nothing less than perfection in every touch. They were extremely accommodating and flexible when plans had to change. Seriously the best experience I've had on Airbnb
Amazing cabin! She put so much thought into everything - has anything you could need. Views are amazing. Very cozy, very relaxing!

We had a fantastic stay at Deanna's cabin! It's a beautiful space with all of the creature comforts you need to have a cozy experience. The property is gorgeous and Deanna is an exceptional host who goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable. One of the best Airbnbs I've ever come across. Look no further, this is the place to stay while adventuring in Alaska!
If you want a real cabin in the middle of the forest, this is the site, a super beautiful place with a super beautiful cabin, with a super host Deana.

We highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a place near Fairbanks!
First of all the home is really charming and comfy. We didn’t have much luck with the weather (really cloudy), but enjoyed our stay our stay regardless. There were plenty of amenities and a fully stocked kitchen.
Second, the location is really convenient. It is only a short drive to town or to the Chena hot springs.
Finally, Deanna is such a great host. Her family and the horses are very welcoming. When we have plans to chase the aurora lights again we’ll be sure to check if Deanna this place is available first!

First off wow! There are no words to describe our honeymoon at Camp Curvy Birch! Deanna and Gracyn seriously became like family during our stay! The thoughtful touches were never ending!
When we arrived they had roses and champagne waiting for us as well as an amazing fire and s’mores! We sat out under the stars by the lake (and fire) many nights and took in the stars and each other’s company! We thought we would miss the lights on this trip but the Aurora put on a show on our last night. During our stay we enjoyed Deanna’s family Moose Stew recipe (so delicious), a chocolate cherry cake she made for my 30th birthday (as a surprise complete with a candle), and amazing chocolate chip banana bread!
Not only were we made yummy food but Deanna’s restaurant recommendations were all 10/10! We probably gained 10 lbs while there and no I haven’t stepped on a scale 😂
The thought put into this place is amazing and I cannot wait to see all of Deanna and Gracyn’s dreams for the property come true! The hospitality is like no other! I cannot recommend staying here enough, we cannot wait to come back! ❤️

Our family loved staying at this stylish, modern cabin with absolutely everything you might need! The s'mores & popcorn were a huge hit with the kids! Oh and the horses! By far our most favorite airbnb & we have stayed at so many. Deanna the hostess is amazing!

If I could give this cabin more than five stars, I would.
To start, Deanna is fantastic host. My wife and I traveled to Fairbanks for our honeymoon, so as a welcome gift she left us a bouquet of roses and a bottle of champagne. She also gave us wonderful suggestions for food and activities to make our stay extra special. She had a fire going every night and as a parting gift, she even baked us a loaf of chocolate chip banana bread!
The cabin itself was beautiful. It's obvious that Deanna put a lot of thought into both the interior and exterior design. We loved it and can't wait to stay there again!

Camp Curvy Birch was amazing. The host made sure we had a fire every night, the cabin was clean, and the property was beautiful. S
There were two horses on the property and carrots in the cabin we could feed them! Deanna gave great recommendations on things to do, and we were lucky enough to see the northern lights our last night! We are excited to make this a yearly trip!

The property is close enough to town to not be a pain to get to, but far enough out that you have no light pollution for star gazing or watching for the aurora. The cabin itself is spectacular with amazing detailed finishes, not to mention sparkling clean. There is a fire pit and she even had the makings of smores for us! She also had kayaks for use by the guests on the lake. This is not your average airBnB. While it had all of the standard amenities. There were so many extras that made it spectacular. She had bottled water, coffee, filters, creamers, spices, condiments, as well as tin foil, plastic wrap and ziplocks ready to go for your use. She also has horses on the property (and left carrots in the fridge for us to give them treats). I loved it, but I would recommend caution for those with severe horse allergies as they are close to the cabin. Deanna herself is personable and a fantastic hostess, always looking for a way to make your stay better! I would happily recommend this place to anyone. I would give it more than 5 stars if I could.
Beautiful location. Great stay. Very welcoming host. Would like to go again
