David's place was beautiful and serene. The check-in process was seamless. The cabin was very well-kept. We were able to enjoy the Aurora from the hot tub.

I live in Alaska and have seen the Northern Lights quite a few times, but viewing them from a secluded wood-fired hot tub was nothing short of magical. The cabin was comfortable and David had a fire in the stove when we arrived. I’m planning on making a stay at this wonderful place a yearly event!
Had a great time. It was wonderful to be in the hot tub with such a peaceful serenity around you.

We had an amazing time staying at David's cabin. Frankly, I was a bit concerned about the dry bathroom, but it turns out to be pristine clean and easy to use!!!! The hot tub is amazing too. We had a fun snowshoe hike with David and his super sweet dogs. I am so glad we chose to stay here for 2 nights! It's such a beautiful and peaceful cabin. We appreciate how much work David put into building this meditative experience.
An absolute must stay if you truly want the Alaskan experience! David provided very detailed instructions for anything and everything you would need to know. We would definitely stay here again

Amazing experience. Absolutely recommend this place. David is super attentive and responds very fast. The forest surrounding the cabin is stunning. A winter wonderland. Very private and secluded. The cabin is cozy. Heating works perfectly. Tub is great. It’s an ideal place for reading, writing and resting. Loved the experience.

Absolutely worth it to stay here! David was very prompt with anything you ask, the Hot Tub is amazing!! He gave us a free Snowshoe tour which was adventurous and he’s very knowledgeable about the area and trees along the hike. You’ll never have a dull moment with him touring around he always has LOTS to tell. Will definitely visit the cabin again in summer.
Highly recommend this listing!!

David was super accommodating. He even helped us get our car out of a 4 foot snowbank when we managed to get stuck. The hot tub was phenomenal and a great end to day. very peaceful and quiet and gorgeous especially in the winter. I highly recommend it. It was wonderful.

The cabin is very beautiful and well built. The location is very quiet, a bit out of town and beautiful. The wood fired hot tub made the stay for sure! A little dark inside at night as there is no electricity and only a few battery powdered lights. I’d suggest bringing a good flashlight or extra lanterns.

Don’t hesitate and book this cabin! It’s the true Alaskan experience. Beautiful surroundings, clean and cozy cabin and amazing hot tub. You can’t beat it. Also, the host David was responsive and helpful.

This place during the winter is a must! Not only it is beautiful, the quiet and private environment with nature surrounding hot tub is truly breathtaking scenery to be seen. Everything was easy to use including bathroom, beds upstairs and comfortable couch and kitchen. David was very friendly and nice. Will definitely return!

David was a great host. He is passionate about his cabin and making sure that his guests enjoy it to the fullest. He prepared the hot tub for us several times, communicated very proactively, recommended a great dog mushing place and best of all took us on a 2 hr snow shoe around the property.
The cabin itself is perfect, feels very remote and off the grid, but still only 5 minutes to a great restaurant (the Turtle club), or 10-15 minutes away from everything in Fairbanks. sitting in the hot tub under the stars or hopefully the Aurora is an unforgettable experience. Highly recommend!

David was a great host! Had a good time hanging out with David and his wife and traveling around town, David had plenty of good recommendations. The BF definitely enjoyed his snow shoeing hike. We made a couple new friends and can't wait to come back again!
If you want to experience true off-grid living in a beautiful setting then this is it! The wood fired hot tub was a great way to spend the evening at such a quiet and beautiful place!

Considering the extra assistance you get with building fires and checking the snorkel tub, the services such as trash and waste disposal for staying at a dry cabin— the price is just right.
Tip: I wish I had brought more water to drink since the dry air and fire heated cabin meant for dry dry dry conditions while sleeping at night.

Amazing host! Incredibly kind and hospitable. We got our car stuck in the snow and David came to meet us in the early hours of the morning to help dig us out. His kindness left a forever impact on us. Worth the trip!

David is a passionate host who build this cabin by himself. He’s always responsive and care about our need of stay. We stay for two nights in the snow weather and the hot tub is amazing. We cooked inside the cabin for some hot soups, and the kitchen is no problem. Hear absolutely nothing and found the perfect peaceful moment that exactly we need.
David and his wife just live somewhere near, and we had a good time on snowshoeing with his lovely dogs. The cabin looks like far away from anything in the woods but it’s actually only 10 min drive away from the city. For city people who’ve been longing for a heavenly peace to off-grid few days like us, we highly recommend it and so glad we found this place.
His also very LGBT friendly.

Adored every second of our stay. I was a little nervous about this whole “dry cabin” thing, especially in cold December weather, but David was so helpful and the cabin is so nice, that it was not a huge deal at all! The cabin is very peaceful - in the middle of frozen and snow covered trees, with an awesome wood burning fireplace, and a cozy wood fired hot tub. The kitchen is easy to cook in with a stove and oven (pots, pans, kettle, knives, and even tons of spices all provided). The ice box stayed cool for two nights with two bags of ice. It was just so chill hanging out with the fire and candles and home cooked food. The outhouse is not too far at all and very clean. The property is huge, with tons of areas to snowshoe and explore. Driving up was not a problem at all in our AWD rental. Also, David and his dogs were awesome. He answered a million of my questions, was so friendly, and even led us snowshoeing on the property. I was sad to leave at the end of our 2 nights! Def 100% book!

Another magical stay in this gorgeous little cabin..! David is a wonderful host and has made this place a true little gem. It is close to town yet feels really remote and private. The cabin is cozy and offers everything you need for a comfortable stay… and the hot-tub is such a treat! We even got to enjoy some northern lights during our stay. We highly recommend this beautiful little getaway, whether you are passing through or calling Fairbanks home!

David was a great host! I wasn’t sure if I was going to come back to Alaska, but it’s definitely on my list so I can come back and stay at David’s place! Beautiful spot and David is a fantastic host. Always going the extra mile. A must stay!!

Beautiful cabin! Secluded but close to town. David made us feel very welcome. While we were out, he took care of the hot tub and plowed the driveway for us. We enjoyed the hot tub while our dogs played in the snow. We will definitely be back!

David's cabin was cozy and wonderful. Enjoyed the hot tub, wood burning stove, and book selection! The surroundings were beautiful and very private. David was very responsive to questions and knowledgeable about the flora on the property. I would definitely recommend spending some time here.

If you are in Fairbanks, you must stay here! The cabin was stocked with everything you might need. It felt like you were far way in the middle of nowhere, and yet a short drive to town. David was very responsive and a great host.
David’s cabin is absolutely amazing! We are so grateful to have gotten a peaceful and cozy night alone. 100% recommend

Had an amazing time at David’s place! Such a nice, secluded, peaceful getaway and a great Alaskan experience! The hot tub was so nice to soak in under the stars and David maintained it for us! He also loves to show people around the beautiful snowy property and wish we would’ve had more time to explore more!
Loved this stay! We will be back. 10/10 recommend

We loved the cabin and the remoteness! We did not get to see the northern lights but we did get to hot tub on the deck in -5* which is an experience to say the least! David is very communicative and accommodating which we really appreciated! Would love to come back!

We loved this stay, my boyfriend and I are into bushcraft so this was the perfect off-grid stay. Unfortunately we only stayed a few hours and weren’t able to use the beautiful hot tub (poor trip planning on our part). We would love to be back again someday!

AMAZING!! This is the place to stay if you are in Fairbanks. The communication was amazing. Any questions I had, David answered them right away. The cabin has everything you would need to stay warm in the winter and cool in the summer. Can’t wait to book a trip to go back!
The place was amazing perfect of you’re looking for an off the grid cabin! David was great had quick turn around on problems and communicated often. A great place for vacation

This house was truly magical. We had a most amazing time there and it will be a trip to remember for a long time. David has thought of everything from the lanterns to the candles to headlamps, you name it, he's got it! The hot tub was the highlight for us as we used it both nights we were there - especially on the second night when we got quite the northern lights viewing! We also explored the grounds a bit ourselves and the cabin is an easy drive into town for food and other needs. Cell service is GREAT at the cabin so even though you may not have Wifi, you are still connected with the outside world for those that cannot fully unplug. This place is a little slice of heaven - can't recommend it enough.
A very nice view, hot tub and location. Highly recommended!
Amazingly beautiful place to stay. Must see private hiking trails if desired, hot tub, comfy house and bed. Definitely will be back.

This was my first experience in a dry cabin and probably one of the most memorable times in my life. This experience has given me a different perspective, which is exactly what I was looking for when coming to alaska. I’m realizing less is more in some circumstances and I’m thankful for hosts like you who put so much thought and effort to keeping us guests comfortable. This place is mesmerizing…the cabin, the scenery, the auroras, even the outhouse! That was the nicest outhouse I’ve ever used! All photography and decorations fit in so perfectly with the cabin. It truly is worth it even with it being a dry cabin. The hot tub made the stay even better! I’m very impressed and would recommend it to anyone! If you’re on the fence about staying in a dry cabin, just do it!
A great place to escape for the weekend and enjoy the outdoors!

If you like the idea of a dry cabin, DO NOT SKIP THIS PLACE! Staying at the Aurora Outpost was the highlight lodging of our Alaska trip and my favorite ever Airbnb experience. It feels like a remote escape in all aspects, yet it is a short drive to anything you need in Fairbanks. We stayed for 2 nights in September. The temps ranged from mid-30s at night to low 50s in the day, and the cabin was always very comfortable with the heating elements easily and appropriately implemented. The aesthetic of the interior (and exterior, for that matter) is so lovely and tasteful. The hot tub was FANTASTIC- fun and relaxing, maintains temperature well, and we even got to view the Aurora one night! The outhouse is also the most pleasant outhouse I’ve ever used, and more comfortable than I expected during the chillier parts of the evening. We cooked a few simple meals in the kitchen (stocked with a considerable variety of spices, oil, and basic cookware) with ease. We slept well on the comfortable bed in the loft with a perfect variety of blankets to meet your warmth preference. David has really created a masterpiece with this cabin and we felt so lucky to be able to stay there. Honestly, we couldn’t even think of a way for cabin to be improved, it’s wonderful. Overall 10/10 amazing romantic getaway, and I hope we can return in the future for a longer stay in another season!
Relaxing and beautiful. Very clean
If you want a space disconnected from the hustle and bustle of the city, it is the perfect place, the cabin is cozy, warm and has everything you need for a few days of rest.

Wonderful cabin hideaway close to Fairbanks! The location is peaceful and private and the hot tub is amazing. Great place to read, relax, and unwind. We saw the northern lights - which was quite a treat - and were very toasty in the cabin at night. Everything was very clean (including the outhouse!) and with all the little touches, it felt like a little home away from home. David the host was super responsive and helpful.
Great accommodation in an amazing location, perfect for a romantic escape!

A beautiful off the grid stay! We loved relaxing in the outdoor hot tub and enjoying the views after a long day of travel. David was quick to answer any questions and had nice little touches throughout the cabin. A wonderful and relaxing way to begin our honeymoon!
We had a great time at the cabin! The hot tub works well and the outhouse is conveniently attached to the cabin and super clean. David is a great host!
We really enjoyed the hot tub here. Would come back in the winter just for that hot tub and peaceful atmosphere. Thanks for having us :)

STUNNING! This place was amazing. The home itself is beautiful, but David really put his heart into this place and ensuring we had a great stay! He was super responsive and helpful. We enjoyed the hot tub and being off the grid. The home is so peaceful! We greatly enjoyed our stay and would come back in a heart beat!!
Definitely worth the stay! Very relaxing getaway to unplug and forget.
Best honeymoon suite ever. We arrived late after our beautiful wedding then reception dinner. We showed up to find a perfect little cabin, an immaculate outhouse, and steaming hot tub.

It's an amazing little cabin, that David put a lot of thought and attention into. Hot tub was an absolute game-changer! It was a pleasure meeting him and his fiance, when they took us blueberry picking and showed us around the vast and beautiful property. If we're ever in the area again, we'll definitely come knocking! Thanks again, David!

Not usually a review guy. But David’s cabin deserves a five star review with fancier words than I have. Everything was perfect and I cannot recommend it enough if you’re looking to get away. This can be for a single night or longer. The perfect place to unplug and unwind.
Magical place to stay!
This place is amazing! Quiet, private cabin in a birch and aspen forest. Wood fired hot tub was great! This is the best air bnb I’ve ever stayed at!
Beautiful view and cozy. Will be back!

We very much enjoyed our stay. The cabin was clean and cozy. Definitely had an authentic Alaska feel while maintaining great cell coverage. The hottub was great place to relax and soak in the beauty of nature. David was a great host and great with communication

We enjoyed a wonderful weekend at this beautiful cabin. The cabin is even cuter in person and the views even more fantastic. The proximity to town is convenient but it feels totally private and isolated, nestled in the forest. There are so many personal touches including interesting books and flower pots lining the deck. The hot tub is perfection and is positioned for an epic soaking view. David was super helpful and communicative and we appreciated the helpful suggestion for activities around town. We’d love to return in the winter.
This stay is a must for everyone! The hot tub, scenery, and privacy is amazing. Absolutely recommend!

A true escape that is unique and beautiful. Driving down the gravel road towards the cabin feels like waving goodbye to the modern world. As a stopover in the middle of our trip, a soak after several long days of driving was truly a blessing. The water temperature is perfect, and you get such a peaceful view of this private land. I wish we could stay a few days longer and explore the area more according to the helpful map that David left in the cabin. Next time, blueberries!
Almost forgot to mention, David is an awesome host that is super accommodating. We had a last minute change to our reservation and he still gladly accepted it. Communication is fast and clear, which made our stay even better!
Loved our stay and the hot tub! Great place to start our vacation!!
This cabin is clean, nice, and cozy. David was responsive and helpful with all of our questions. A great location to escape from the city!
Beautiful surroundings, a hot tub that is to die for, and an cute and comfy cabin stocked with all the necessities. I would love to stay here again!
This place is absolutely amazing and I recommend it to anyone and everyone. One of the best hosts I have ever talked to. super knowledgeable and a one of a kind experience.

Awesome remote cabin on a beautiful property. Nice, secluded, and peaceful. We went in spring and the hot tub was perfect after a long flight, a day of hiking, or for a warm soak on the more chilly mornings. It's next to the Chena River State Park which has lots of great trails, fishing and boating/canoeing/kayaking.
peaceful, secluded dry cabin (no running water) with beautiful view. Nice hot tub that David helps keep warm. He is available for anything you need.
This cabin is the perfect getaway!! Its a hidden treasure with beautiful views. David is a great host with great communication that keeps everything very clean and maintained.

This little cabin is true gem! I stayed there for the first time this winter and enjoyed it so much that I booked it again for my parents who are in town for a visit. They absolutely loved their time there. It is close to town yet feels very private and remote. The wood-heated hot tub is amazing, and the cabin very charming and comfortable. It is a perfect little getaway for visitors and locals alike!
The cabin is definitely one-of-a-kind experience. We especially love the hot tub and the view outside.
simply the best.

This spot is very unique, and we would consider it a "Once in a lifetime" kind of stay. The hot tub is one of the best and most unique we've ever used. The outhouse is so clean and so well kept, you almost forget you're using an outhouse. The view of the sunsets are stunning, and I can only imagine what the place looks like when the northern lights are fully displayed. We wished we could've experienced them from this cabin. However, our experience was just as perfect without having had that experience. David is so kind and helpful and he has a lot of good advice for things to do and places to go in the area.
Overall, we really loved this stay and highly recommended this as a must if you plan to stay in the Fairbanks area!
Amazing weekend at David’s cabin! Absolutely beautiful property, hiking trails and cedar hot tub. Will definitely be back again!

Just go!!! Don’t think about it! This will be for sure one of the best experiences of your lives (it was one of ours). I’ve been to 46 states of the USA, Alaska was my favorite and David’s place has a point on that. We saw the Aurora, it was magical!

Great getaway!! So close to Fairbanks, and yet you feel like you are a million miles away. David was an amazing host, super responsive and helpful. Provided snowshoes for us to explore property. This 'dry' cabin had everything we needed. Well appointed kitchen. The hot tub was awesome. Got to soak under snowflakes, and one night we even got treated to the Auroras. Highly recommend. We will be back!!
Great experience! Would highly recommend!

David was an outstanding host. My fiancé and I got engaged at the cabin and it was the perfect place to start the rest of our lives together. Definitely recommend the snowshoeing tour, cedar hot tub, and amazing views of the night sky. We’ll definitely be back.
The view from the cabin is amazing, and the hot tub was so relaxing. We will definitely be coming back. David keeps the cabin very clean and has great communication with his guests.

My husband and I wanted to do a weekend getaway in a dry cabin. It was an amazimg experience. The view was breathtaking! The cabin is very clean and cute! The hottub was clean and warm our whole stay! I would recommend staying here for the Alaskan experience! Will be returning!
What an amazing property! We loved our stay, the hot tub and snowshoeing experience were highlights, we will for sure be back!
Great spot and friendly host- would recommend.

My stay was absolutely wonderful, and David definitely deserves the super host title. I stayed for two nights while traveling solo, with no rental car, and his hospitality gave me great comfort knowing if I needed anything he’d be able to help at any time. The space itself was super cute, cozy, and comfortable, and the hot tub was perfect day and night. The peace and solitude definitely made for a great place to relax, unwind, and just sit in the hot tub and enjoy nature—especially when the northern lights made an appearance! Overall highly recommend this place, and if you’re at all iffy about it being a dry cabin don’t be. He’s spared no detail ensuring the place has everything you need to feel comfortable. Can’t wait to come back!

This was our 2nd stay and it was so wonderful to be back. This has become a place that we look so forward to. A complete “check out” from society where our dogs and us can relax and explore. Thank you David for your great communication and providing us with everything we need!

This cabin is amazing. Although being off the grid, it’s got pretty much everything you need. Among them all of course, the hot tub is the star. Soaking in it surrounded by snowy forests is an unforgettable experience. David is super nice, patient and responsive. I can tell how much time and care he spends keeping this place in the best condition possible.

What an amazing experience. The cabin is super cozy and you will have the best host ever. David is such a great person, he really care about his guess. We went to Alaska for our anniversary and we decided to tried a dry Cabin, it was the best idea we could ever have, David guided us and answered all our questions making everything easy for our stay, cabin has also all you need to enjoy your time on. We were able to see the northern light from the hot tub and took a great picture of it. I highly recommend the snowshoes tour and aurora photography lesson with David.
We will definitely be back.

We had a great time at the cabin and would recommend it 100%. The cabin was clean and cozy, and David is a great and really nice host. Between the wood burning stove and propane heater, we were more than warm. The hot tub was fantastic & we enjoyed it every night. It was a perfect place to watch the Northern lights (we saw them 3 of our 5 nights). The outhouse was super clean and not an issue for us at all. David left snowshoes on the front porch, and we enjoyed using them to explore part of the 100 acres. When we planned the trip, we knew that being off the grid was the best way for us to experience the Northern Lights and David’s cabin was the perfect choice. We are already planning a return visit.

Aurora Outpost is a must!! This cozy cabin makes for the perfect romantic-rustic getaway. The cabin itself comes supplied with all the essentials (drink-serve-cookware; candles, towels, blankets). The wood burning stove and wall heater keep you warm on cold winter nights.
The secluded property makes the cabin even better!!! The hot tub will get so much use, you will start to wonder where you can fit one of your own back home. The scenery was a wonderland of snow-covered trees, making snowshoeing on the property an excursion in itself! Far enough out of town for the night sky to be filled with lights like us East Coasters have never seen before, yet close enough to town that you're only a short drive away from the city center of Fairbanks.
David is truly what makes the Aurora Outpost a slice of paradise. His hosting goes above and beyond. He welcomes you to his cabin and truly allows you to feel at home.

Wether you’re looking for a romantic getaway, complete seclusion (or both) to take in all the raw beauty Alaska has to offer all while being within driving distance from all things in Fairbanks - this is your place! The wood burning hot tub was the cherry on top and David made sure we felt at home. We hope to return one day in the near future!

This was a perfect little escape, and by far the coziest dry cabin I’ve ever stayed in! The location feels remote, and the land is mesmerizing! Truly a little slice of heaven. David was such a great host! We had all the information we needed before we even arrive, and all the instructions he gave us were very descriptive! We had zero issues!
If you are from out of state, I would highly recommend staying more then one night! This is a great little Alaskan experience, and an extremely comfortable one! It honestly doesn’t get much better then this!
I’m already looking forward to my next visit!
5/5 would stay here again.

Hubby and I really enjoyed our stay at David's cabin.
He provided us with all the information we needed before we even arrive. The outdoor hot tub was excellent!!
Cabin is very clean and comfortable and has everything you could need for a dry cabin. I️ would 100% recommend a stay here. I have already told a few close friends and now they want to stay there as well!!
Great Air bnb experience. Clean and Cozy. David kept the hot tub going for us for our whole stay. beautiful cabin. we would definitely stay there again!

Can you imagine anything more romantic than a little cabin deep in the woods of Alaska during a snowy winter evening? Or sitting in a cedar hot tub while watching the northern lights while it's -30*F? David's cabin was simply phenomenal, especially for couples looking for a private cabin getaway. Thank you!

Fantastic cabin to visit; while it's dry and no electricity David does a great job keeping it stocked with water, candles, battery powered lights and plenty of fire wood. We were there in -30 weather and stayed very warm; with the cold weather we had clear skies both nights and had killer views of the Aurora. Would definitely come back.

What a gem! Dave was a great host, very responsive and helpful. We loved every minute of our stay in his beautiful little cabin. It’s close to town yet feels really remote. The cabin is cozy and warm, with an efficient wood stove that is easy to operate. It is tastefully decorated and everything is set-up to make the best of your off-the-grid stay. Soaking up in the hot-tub toasty water while it was so cold outside was a real treat. We will be back!

beautiful piece of secluded property among tall white birch trees. David is very thoughtful and detail oriented. Very accommodating, he even offered me a late check out since I got in very late. Certainly a hidden, cozy gem of a place

We had a great time at the cabin. It’s not like a public use cabin-it’s filled with useful amenities and comforts that make for a cozy stay. The cabin is super close to Fairbanks but without losing its isolated, wilderness vibe. My wife and I loved our stay and we’ll be back.
David was very accommodating and gave us very detailed and clear instructions on how to run the cabin. I highly recommend this place for someone that is looking for a true “off the grid” experience.
Awesome place! Recommend staying more than 1 night to fully appreciate the place. David was super nice and helpful. place was super clean and great location.

We loved the cabin! The hot chocolate was definitely nice on a cold snowy night. The cabin was cozy and one of the best places we’ve stayed! David was very responsive and provided all the answers to our questions.
David definitely earns his top host rating. Such a gem of a getaway. Can’t wait til I can get another weekend away.
Best experience for a true Alaska stay
Lovely cabin, but watch your head if above 6'3". The jacuzzi while snowing is a hallmark moment and worth the trip alone!

This was a fantastic stay! The cabin is interior-Alaska-luxurious with great decor and dry cabin amenities. Being able to sit in the hot tub in the snowy weather while looking at the stars is Alaska at its best!

David’s cabin is perfect. He is very accommodating and answers very quickly. The hot tub is amazing, the cabin is super clean and cozy, and not too far from town. Hands down nicest/easiest dry cabin we’ve ever stayed in, highly recommended
Excellent location, feels like you're out in the woods even though you're just minutes from town. The hot tub wasn't credible and life-changing! Now I'm coveting one. Will be back soon.

Such a gorgeous cabin! David has put a lot of effort into making this a relaxing getaway. The hot tub is amazing! We saw the aurora from it one night! He did an incredible property tour with us as well. We will be back!
We had an amazing time at the cabin! Secluded with tons of character. Stunning views of the northern lights!
Amazing stay! Easy checkin and smooth communications. Cozy cabin, it kept warm through the night. The hot tub was amazing.

This cabin was EVERYTHING we could’ve asked for and more. David was extremely helpful and gave us plenty of tips on how to see the lights and made sure we could use the hot tub. He provided cooking ware and headlamps with lanterns. The outhouse was well kept. The attention to detail was amazing! We saw the northern lights and stayed up all night in the hot tub. Truly a once in a lifetime experience!

This off grid cabin is amazing. The hot tub is the best. Only problem is the place is so perfect it was difficult to leave on day trips. David was amazing and always responded quickly. It was 7 days of heaven for us.
Peaceful, quiet Alaskan get-a-way with a chance of seeing some Northern Lights. If this is what you are looking for than this is it! All around a GREAT place to stay a night or two.
David was so very helpful and always immediately responded when we had questions. It was such a beautiful and peaceful place.
A truly amazing Alaskan experience. David thought of everything and provided very detailed instructions, we had no issues.
Our stay here was amazing! The location was perfect, the cabin was so cute and the hot tub and views were super cool!

Absolutely enjoyed my stay at this cabin. The directions and communication were on point. Very good location to the airport and easy access. The cabin had all I needed and I really appreciated all the small touches… like head lamps, battery lighting, kitchen and living area was very cute. The hot tub was the highlight and it was kept warm the entire stay. David is an excellent host!
Great location and lovely little cabin with so much details and amenities.
Beautiful place to stay! Everything was well thought out in what a guest would need and the hot tub was perfect!

This was the perfect get away for my husband and I. David has a beautiful property and created the perfect stay. I would 100% recommend booking. This cozy cabin has everything you need, and we stayed a total of 6 nights. David was great at replenishing and providing us with everything we needed during our stay. Water jugs, kitchen amenities, lanterns, headlights, towels, “bathroom” amenities and more.
The hot tub was absolutely amazing, probably one of the best parts of our stay. David came by daily to get it up and running for us but also provided great direction for us to maintain.
Location was great, 12-15 mins from shopping, food and gas.
No WiFi but cell service is available at the cabin which was nice to map out activites.
If you are renting a car I would prepare for some off roading, which heads up some rentals don’t allow.
Overall such an amazing experience here, we will remember it forever and a big thanks to David for allowing us to stay!

I'm a local, so I've been in lots of dry cabins, and this one is the nicest I've seen. Everything is put together very thoughtfully, and it's a cozy setting for two people. The hot tub was glorious, much nicer than a chlorinated jet tub. The location feels quiet and remote even though it's very convenient to town; we occasionally heard a plane or car traffic, but it was much quieter than home. We rented this cabin just to have a relaxing "date night", and it was perfect! We will be back.

This is an awesome place to stay and relax. David is great at getting back to you quickly and always offering local insights on the best things to do, or how to enhance what you want to do. If you’re gonna stay here, I’d recommend at least two nights to get to enjoy it to its fullest.
Everything is as advertised. This is an amazing place to stay! Great off the grid experience, does have cell service and is close to town. Gorgeous cabin and very kind host.

My girlfriend and I enjoyed this rustic yet beautiful cabin in the woods. David was great with communication and was swift to visit the cabin next morning and replaced the firewood for the hottub on our request. The cabin is clean, well equipped and has scenic views. We highly recommend staying here.
What a great experience staying In the Off the Grid Cabin. David, went above & beyond communicating with whatever we needed. Don’t pass up staying here, it is a gem in the woods!!
Great stay! Very quiet area and perfect for relaxing.

We had a great time at David’s cabin, it was a great way to relax. This was the best AirB&B we have ever stayed at and will definetly be back in the future. David was very easy to communicate with and we could tell he took the time to make our stay the best that it could be.

We were so intrigued by the 100 acres and cedar hot tub we drove from Anchorage (after flying from SLC, Utah) just to stay at this cabin… it did not disappoint. We had no other business in Fairbanks; it was absolutely worth the drive.
The peace, the solitude, the abundance of life and biodiversity emanates nothing but magic. Thanks for creating such a rejuvenating place David.
Cheers.

This place is amazing!!! You MUST stay here! It was clean, and amazingly well stocked. It's tucked away and quiet. All you see is trees and amazing sunsets. Soaking in the wood fired hotub and then sitting on the deck to be entertained by squirrels robbing the bird feeders. So relaxing! We will be staying here again!
Great remote place to stay! If you are looking for quiet time this is the SPOT!

David’s place was remote but not too far from the downtown area. Perfect getaway for couples looking to be immersed in nature. The hot tub was great and the cabin was cute and quaint but equipped with anything we might need. Would love to stay here again and highly recommend!

David's cabin is tucked back in a forest which makes you feel like you're in your own private paradise. However, it is a short drive into Fairbanks for anything you're interested in doing there. We loved coming back to the cabin, watching the birds and squirrels and soaking in the super hot hot tub! The cabin had all the amenities you could need and then some. We will definitely be back in the winter to hopefully catch some northern lights, but summer time was beautiful and the cabin is surrounded by wildflowers. You won't regret your stay here! So worth it!
